V03vinv171u:403: Story of Gautama, the progenitor of Ikṣvāku
V03vinv171u:404: [A_356a] karṇasya gautamā rājño dvau gautamo bharadvājaś ca;
V03vinv171u:407: sa pitaraṃ paśyati dharmādharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayantaṃ; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv171u:408: aham api pitur atyayād rājā bhaviṣyāmy aham api dharmādharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā narakaparāyaṇo bhaviṣyāmi;
V03vinv171u:409: kim atra prāptakālam agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajiṣye iti viditvā yena karṇo rājā tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
V03vinv171u:411: tātānujānīhi māṃ pravrajāmi śraddhayā agārād anagārikām iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv171u:412: putra yasyārthe yajñā ijyante homā hūyante tapāṃsi tapyante tat tava karatalagataṃ rājyaṃ;
V03vinv171u:416: tāta na śakyaṃ mayā dharmādharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayituṃ;
V03vinv171u:418: tato rājñā avaśyaṃ nirbandhaṃ jñātvā anujñātaḥ /
V03vinv171u:419: tena khalu samayena anyatamasminn āśramapade kṛṣṇadvaipāyano nāma ṛṣiḥ prativasati;
V03vinv171u:420: tato gautamaḥ kumāro rājñā samanujñāto hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudita udagraprītisaumanasyajāto yena kṛṣṇadvaipāyano riṣis tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:422: kṛtvā kathayati pravrajyārthī pravrajāyasva mām iti /
V03vinv171u:425: tasyāpi gautama ṛṣiḥ gautama ṛṣiḥ iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā /
V03vinv171u:426: yāvad apareṇa samayena karṇo rājā kālagataḥ;
V03vinv171u:427: bharadvājakumāro rājyaiśvaryādhipatye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ pitryaṃ rājyaṃ kārayati;
V03vinv171u:428: yāvad apareṇa samayena gautamo ṛṣir upādhyāyāsya kathayati:
V03vinv171u:429: upādhyāya na śaknomi āraṇyakābhir oṣadhībhir yāpayituṃ; grāmāntaṃ samavasarāmīti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv171u:431: grāme vā araṇye vā prativasatā riṣiṇā sarvathā indriyāṇi rakṣitavyānīti;
V03vinv171u:432: gaccha tvaṃ potalasāmantakena śākhāparṇakuṭiṃ kṛtvā vāsaṃ kalpaya;
V03vinv171u:433: evam upādhyāya ity uktvā gautama riṣiḥ potalakasāmantakena śākhāparṇakuṭiṃ kṛtvā avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:434: tena khalu samayena potalake nagare bhadrā nāma rūpājīvanī prativasati;
V03vinv171u:439: bhadre āgaccha paricāraya iti; sā saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv171u:441: adākṣiṇyaṃ caitad gṛhāgataṃ pratyākhyāyānyatra gamanam iti;
V03vinv171u:443: gaccha mṛṇālasya kathaya āryā kathayati na tāvad ahaṃ sajjā paścād āgamiṣyāmīti;
V03vinv171u:446: sa [A_356b] tāṃ paricārya prathama eva yāme prakrāntaḥ /
V03vinv171u:448: mahatī velā vartate śakṣyāmy ahaṃ tasyāpi cittagrāhaṃ kartum iti;
V03vinv171u:450: gaccha mṛṇālasyārocaya āryā sajjā saṃvṛttā kathaya katarad udyānam āgacchatv iti;
V03vinv171u:452: sa kathayati kṣaṇena tavāryā sajjā kṣaṇenāsajjeti;
V03vinv171u:453: sā dārikā tasyāḥ sāntarā; tayā samākhyātam:
V03vinv171u:456: tayā tvadīyena vastrālaṃkāreṇānyena puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ paricāritam iti;
V03vinv171u:458: tad vigataṃ; vyāpādaparyavasthānaṃ samutpannaṃ; sa saṃjātāmarṣaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:459: dārike gatvā bhadrāyāḥ kathaya mṛṇālaḥ kathayaty amukam udyānaṃ nirgaccheti;
V03vinv171u:463: yuktaṃ nāma tava madīyena vastrālaṃkāreṇānyena puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ paricārayitum iti; sā kathayati:
V03vinv171u:466: tatas tena saṃjātāmarṣeṇa niṣkośam asiṃ kṛtvā jīvitād vyaparopitā;
V03vinv171u:467: tatas tayā preṣyadārikayā mahān kolāhalaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaḥ āryā praghātitā āryā praghātiteti;
V03vinv171u:468: śrutvā samantāj janakāyaḥ pradhāvitaḥ yāvat tasminn evāśramapade gautamariṣiḥ prativasati;
V03vinv171u:469: tato 'sau mṛṇālo dhūrtapuruṣaḥ saṃtrasto rudhiramrakṣitam asiṃ gautamasya riṣeḥ purastāc chorayitvā tasyaiva mahājanakāyasya madhyaṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv171u:470: mahājanakāyaś ca rudhiramrakṣitam asiṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati:
V03vinv171u:472: tatas taṃ gautamariṣiṃ parivārya saṃjātāmarṣāḥ kathayanti:
V03vinv171u:473: bhoḥ pravrajita riṣidhvajaṃ dhārayasi īdṛśaṃ ca karma karoṣīti /
V03vinv171u:476: bhadrayā te sārdhaṃ paricāritaṃ sā ca jīvitād vyaparopiteti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv171u:478: sa śāntavādy api tena mahājanakāyena paścādbāhugāḍhabandhanabaddho rājñe upanāmitaḥ devānena pravrajitena bhadrayā sārdhaṃ paricāritaṃ sā jīvitād vyaparopitā iti;
V03vinv171u:480: yady evaṃ gacchata; enaṃ śūle samāropayata; parityakto 'yaṃ mayā pravrajita iti /
V03vinv171u:481: tato 'sau pravrajitaḥ karavīramālāsaktakaṇṭhaguṇo nīlāṃbaravasanaiḥ puruṣair udyataśastraiḥ saṃparivārito rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṇgāṭakeṣu śravaṇāsukheṣv anuśrāvya dakṣiṇena
V03vinv171u:483: nagaradvāreṇa niṣkāsya jīvann eva śūle samāropitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:484: tasyāsāv upādhyāyaḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ kālena kālaṃ tasyāśramapadam upasaṃkrāmati;
V03vinv171u:485_0: yāvad apareṇa samayenopasaṃkrāntaḥ na paśyati sa itaś cetaś ca samanveṣitum ārabdho
V03vinv171u:485_1: yāvat paśyati śūlasamāropitaṃ [A_357a] sa bāṣpagadgadakaṇṭhaḥ aśruparyākulekṣaṇaḥ
V03vinv171u:487: so 'pi gadgadakaṇṭho marmavedanoparodhajanitaviṣādaḥ kathayaty upādhyāya karmāṇi;
V03vinv171u:491: tāta kṣato 'haṃ kāyena no tu cittena;
V03vinv171u:493_0: upādhyāya satyopayācanaṃ kariṣye śṛṇu yena satyena satyavacanena kṣato 'haṃ kāyena
V03vinv171u:493_1: no tu cittena tena satyena satyavacanena yeyam upādhyāyasya kṛṣṇavarṇā cchavir iyaṃ
V03vinv171u:495: vacanāvasānasamanantaram eva kṛṣṇadvaipāyanasya ṛṣeḥ kṛṣṇavarṇā cchavir antarhitā;
V03vinv171u:497: sāmantakena śabdo visṛtaḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanariṣiḥ suvarṇavarṇaḥ saṃvṛtta iti /
V03vinv171u:498: tasya suvarṇadvaipāyanaḥ suvarṇadvaipāyana iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv171u:501: upādhyāya itaś cyutasya me kā gatir bhaviṣyati kā upapattiḥ ko 'bhisaṃparāya iti /
V03vinv171u:511: upādhyāya gāḍhavedanābhyāhatasya me idānīṃ chidyamāneṣu marmasu mucyamāneṣu sandhiṣu (SBV I 25)
V03vinv171u:518: yāvad asya maithunarāgasamanusmaraṇād dvau śukrabindū sarudhire nipatitau;
V03vinv171u:520: ātmacintā lokacintā satvānāṃ karmavipākacintā buddhānāṃ ca buddhaviṣayacintā iti;
V03vinv171u:532: so 'nusarann itaś cāmutaś ca ikṣuvāṭaṃ praviṣṭo yāvat paśyati:
V03vinv171u:533: dvau kumārau; samanvāhartuṃ pravṛttaḥ; kasyaitau putrāv iti; paśyati:
V03vinv171u:536: tena tāv āsramapadaṃ nītvā āpāyitau poṣitau saṃvardhitau;
V03vinv171u:539: tasmāt sūryagotrāv iti sūryagotrā iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv171u:540: gautamasya riṣeḥ putrau gautamā gautamā iti dvitīyā saṃjñā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv171u:541: svāṅgīnisṛtā iti āṅgīrasā āṅgīrasā iti tṛtīyā saṃjñā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv171u:542: ikṣuvāṭāl labdhā ikṣvākā ikṣvākā iti caturthī saṃjñā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv171u:543: yāvad apareṇa samayena bharadvājo rājā aputra eva kālagataḥ;
V03vinv171u:545: bhavantaḥ kam idānīṃ rājānam abhiṣiñcāma iti;
V03vinv171u:546: apare kathayanti tasya bhrātā gautamo riṣīṇāṃ madhye pravrajitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:552: sa kathayati yuṣmābhir eva praghātita iti;
V03vinv171u:553: maharṣe vayaṃ tasya darśanam api na samanusmarāmaḥ;
V03vinv171u:555: ahaṃ yuṣmān smārayāmi; śobhanaṃ; tena te smāritāḥ kathayanti:
V03vinv171u:556: maharṣe yady evam alaṃ tasya nāmagrahaṇena;
V03vinv171u:565: maharṣe yady evaṃ vayaṃ pāpakarmakāriṇo nāsāv iti;
V03vinv171u:567: tau ca dārakau riṣeḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntau;
V03vinv171u:569: maharṣe kasyetau dārakau kathayati tasyaiva putrau;
V03vinv171u:570: katham etau samutpannau kā vā anayoḥ saṃjñā;
V03vinv171u:573: tais taṃ riṣim anujñāpya tayor jyeṣṭhaḥ kumāro rājyābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktaḥ;
V03vinv171u:576: tasya ikṣvākurājā ikṣvākurājā iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv171u:577: ikṣvākor gautamā rājñaḥ putraprapautṛkayā naptṛpranaptṛkayā punar api potalake nagare ekaśatam ikṣvākurājaśatam
V03vinv171u:585: sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:587: kimarthaṃ deva kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparas tiṣṭhati; sa kathayati:
V03vinv171u:590: deva yady evaṃ kimarthaṃ devasyāgramahiṣī na samanviṣyate;
V03vinv171u:593: ime rājyābhinandinaḥ kumārāḥ; eṣu saṃvidyamāneṣu pratyanīkabhūteṣu ko me duhitaraṃ dāsyati:
V03vinv171u:596: yāvad anyatamasya rājñaḥ duhitā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā pratirūpā devītvena;
V03vinv171u:597: te tāṃ samupalabhya tasya rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ;
V03vinv171u:608: kiṃ tu samayato 'nuprayacchāmi yadi me duhituḥ putro bhavati;
V03vinv171u:610: deva evaṃ bhavatu gacchāmaḥ devaṃ śrāvayāmaḥ;
V03vinv171u:611: tair gatvā virūḍhakasyekṣvākurājasya yathāvṛttam ārocitaṃ; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv171u:612: bhavanto naitat pratirūpaṃ jyeṣṭhatarān rājyābhinandinaḥ kumārān pratyākhyāya kanīyasaḥ pratiṣṭhāpanaṃ;
V03vinv171u:613: deva sandigdho 'yam arthaḥ ānīyatāṃ tāvad devī;
V03vinv171u:614: tayā sārdhaṃ devaḥ krīḍatu ramatāṃ paricārayatu;
V03vinv171u:615: na jñāyate kim asau kumāraṃ janayiṣyatīty āhosvit kumārikāṃ vandhyā vā bhaviṣyatīti; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv171u:621: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv171u:622: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntare devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv171u:623: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv171u:625: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāmeti;
V03vinv171u:626: amātyā deva yasmād ayam ajāta eva (SBV I 28)
V03vinv171u:627: rājyam abhinandati tasmād bhavatu dārakasya rājyābhinandīti;
V03vinv171u:628: sa dārakaḥ aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyaḥ anupradattaḥ pūrvavad yāvad āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajaṃ;
V03vinv171u:634: yadi yathāpratijñātaṃ karoṣi ity evaṃ kuśalaṃ;
V03vinv171u:635: no ced yat te balaṃ vīryaṃ parākramas ### tenāvatiṣṭhasva;
V03vinv171u:640: bhavantaḥ mama tena rājñā evaṃ likhitaṃ; katham atra pratipattavyam iti; te kathayanti:
V03vinv171u:641: deva abhiṣicyatāṃ rājyābhinandī yauvarājye; sa kathayati:
V03vinv171u:642: bhavantaḥ naitad yuktaṃ jyeṣṭhān rājyābhinandinaḥ kumārān pratyākhyāya kanīyaso rājyābhiṣecanaṃ; te kathayanti:
V03vinv171u:644: sthānam etad vidyate yad āgatya niyataṃ rāṣṭrāpamardaṃ kariṣyati;
V03vinv171u:648: deva vayam amātyā hitādhānatatparāḥ adūṣiṇo 'napakāriṇaḥ pravāsayāmaḥ;
V03vinv171u:651: amātyāḥ saṃnipatya parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ:
V03vinv171u:652: bhavanta upāyasaṃvidhānaṃ kartavyaṃ yena rājā kumāreṣu vimukhī bhavati;
V03vinv171u:653: tatas tair udyānaṃ śodhayitvā citram upacitraṃ kāritaṃ;
V03vinv171u:655: tatas tair amātyais tad udyānaṃ tathābhisaṃskṛtaṃ dūrād dṛṣṭaṃ;
V03vinv171u:659: iti; te kathayanti devasya; te pratinivartitum ārabdhāḥ; amātyāḥ kathayanti:
V03vinv171u:664: devo vā krīḍet kumāro vā ko 'tra virodhaḥ; te praviśya krīḍitum ārabdhāḥ; amātyai rājābhihitaḥ:
V03vinv171u:672: deva kumārāḥ; yady evaṃ parityaktā mayā kumārāḥ; amātyāḥ pādayor nipatya kathayanti:
V03vinv171u:676: te pravāsayitum ārabdhāḥ rājñaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayanti:
V03vinv171u:677: deva yady evaṃ yo 'smābhiḥ sārdhaṃ parijano gacchati sa yathā na nivāryate tathājñāṃ dātum arhasi;
V03vinv171u:682: saptadivasaṃ potalakasya nagaradvāram apāvṛtaṃ sthitaṃ janakāyasya nirgacchataḥ;
V03vinv171u:684: deva yadi nagarasya dvāraṃ nāvriyate na cirāt potalakaṃ nirāvāsaṃ bhavatīti;
V03vinv171u:686: tatas te kumārāḥ svakasvakā bhaginīr ādāyānupūrveṇa himavatpārśvaṃ nadyā bhagīrathyās tīraṃ kapilasya riṣer āśramapadasya nātidūram anuprāptāḥ;
V03vinv171u:687: te tasmiṃś chākhāparṇakuṭīrakāṇi kṛtvā vāsaṃ kalpitavantaḥ mṛgāṃś ca praghātya praghātya jīvikāṃ kalpayanti;
V03vinv171u:688: triṣkālaṃ ca kapilasya riṣer āśramapadam upasaṃkrāmanti;
V03vinv171u:689: abhinavayauvanamadākṣiptāḥ kāmarāgeṇātyarthaṃ bādhyamānāḥ utpāṇḍūtpāṇḍūkāḥ kṛśālakāḥ [A_359a] saṃvṛttāḥ;
V03vinv171u:690: yāvad apareṇa samayena kapilena riṣiṇā tathāvidhā dṛṣṭāḥ pṛṣṭāś ca:
V03vinv171u:693: svakasvakā bhaginīs tyaktvā vaimātṛkābhir bhaginībhiḥ sārdhaṃ vāsaṃ kalpayata;
V03vinv171u:696: tatas te riṣivacanaṃ pramāṇam iti kṛtvā kāmarāgādhyavasitāḥ prītiprāmodyajātāḥ vaimātṛkābhir bhaginībhiḥ sārdhaṃ (SBV I 30)
V03vinv171u:698: teṣāṃ tābhiḥ saṃkrīḍatāṃ ramamāṇānāṃ paricārayatāṃ putrā duhitaraś ca jātāḥ; te vṛddhiṃ gatāḥ
V03vinv171u:700: The cities of Kapilavastu and Devadṛśa
V03vinv171u:701: kapilariṣiḥ śabdakaṇṭakatvād dhyānānāṃ cittaikāgratāṃ nārāgayati; sa kathayati:
V03vinv171u:702: bhavantaḥ avalokitā bhavata; aham anyatra gamiṣyāmi; maharṣe kimarthaṃ; cittaikāgratāṃ nārāgayāmi,
V03vinv171u:709: tena sauvarṇaṃ bhṛṃgāram ādāya nagarākāreṇa udakadhārāpātair nagaraṃ māpitaṃ;
V03vinv171u:710: kapilena riṣiṇā teṣāṃ vāsāya vastu parityaktam iti kapilavastu kapilavastv iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv171u:714: teṣāṃ cetasā cittam ājñāya devatābhir anyapradeśa upadarśitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:715: tais tatra gatvā dvitīyaṃ nagaraṃ māpitaṃ;
V03vinv171u:717: tatas te saṃgamya samāgamya saṃjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ:
V03vinv171u:718: bhavanto yad vayaṃ nirvāsitāḥ tat sadṛśabhāryopādānāt;
V03vinv171u:719: tad asmākaṃ na kenacid dvitīyā sadṛśī bhāryā upādātavyā;
V03vinv171u:721: te ekām eva sadṛśīṃ bhāryāṃ pariṇamayanti;
V03vinv171u:723: athāpareṇa samayena virūḍhako rājā priyān putrān samanusmaran amātyān āmantrayate:
V03vinv171u:724: hambhoḥ grāmaṇyas te kumārāḥ kva sāṃprataṃ;
V03vinv171u:727: te svakasvakā bhaginīr ādāya itaḥ prakrāntāḥ;
V03vinv171u:728: anuhimavatpārśve nadyā bhagīrathyās tīre kapilasya riṣer āśramapadasya nātidūre vāsaṃ kalayanti;
V03vinv171u:729: svakasvakā bhaginīḥ pratyākhyāya vaimātṛkābhir bhaginībhiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti;
V03vinv171u:730: teṣāṃ krīḍatāṃ ramamāṇānāṃ paricārayatāṃ putrā (SBV I 31)
V03vinv171u:734: atha virūḍhakaḥ ikṣvākurājaḥ pūrvaṃ kāyam abhyunnamayya dakṣiṇabāhum abhiprasāryodānam udānayati;
V03vinv171u:737: maheśākhyena satvena vāṅ niścāritā śākyā bata kumārāḥ;
V03vinv171u:738: paramaśākyā bata kumārā iti śākyā iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā
V03vinv171u:752: opurakasya gopurakaḥ gopurakasya gautamā rājñaḥ putraprapautṛkayā naptṛpranaptṛkayā kapilavastunagare paṃcapaṃcāśad rājasahasrāṇy abhūvan;
V03vinv171u:753: teṣām apścimako daśarathaḥ śataratho navatirathaḥ citraratho bijitaratho dṛḍharathaḥ daśadhanuḥ śatadhanuḥ navatidhanuḥ vijitadhanur citradhanuḥ dṛḍhadhanur;
V03vinv171u:754: dṛḍhadhanuṣo gautamā dvau putrau siṃhahanuḥ siṃhanādī ca;
V03vinv171u:755: yāvantaḥ khalu gautamā jambūdvīpe dhanurdharāḥ siṃhahanus teṣām agra akhyātaḥ;
V03vinv171u:756: siṃhahanor gautamā catvāraḥ putrāḥ śuddhodanaḥ śuklodanaḥ droṇodanaḥ amṛtodanaḥ;
V03vinv171u:757: śuddhā śuklā droṇā amṛtikā ceti duhitaraḥ;
V03vinv171u:758: śuddhodanasya dvau putrau bhagavān āyuṣmāṃś ca nandaḥ;
V03vinv171u:761: āyuṣmāṃś ca tiṣyo bhadrakaś ca śākyarājaḥ;
V03vinv171u:762: droṇodanasya dvau putrau mahānāmā āyuṣmāṃś cāniruddhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:763: amṛtodanasya dvau putrau āyuṣmān ānando devadattaś ca;
V03vinv171u:767: amṛtikāyāḥ śaivalaḥ bhagavato rāhulaḥ putra iti gautamā rāhule mahāsaṃmatavaṃśaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:768: ucchinnā bhavanetrī vikṣīṇo jātisaṃsāro nāstīdānīṃ punarbhavaḥ
V03vinv171u:771: atha bhagavān āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya kathāparyavasānaṃ viditvā utthāya niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:773: sādhu sādhu maudgalyāyana sādhu sādhu khalu tvaṃ maudgalyāyana yas tvaṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ purastāc chākyānāṃ paurāṇaṃ kulavamśam ārabhya dharmyāṃ kathāṃ kathayasi;
V03vinv171u:774: punar api tvaṃ maudgalyāyana abhīkṣṇam api tvaṃ śākyānāṃ paurāṇaṃ kulavaṃśam ārabhya dharmyāṃ kathāṃ kathaya;
V03vinv171u:775: tad eṣāṃ bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya;
V03vinv171u:777: udgṛhṇīta yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ śākyānāṃ paurāṇaṃ kulavaṃśam ārabhya dharmyāṃ kathāṃ dhārayituṃ grāhayituṃ vācayituṃ;
V03vinv171u:779: arthopasaṃhitā bhikṣavaḥ śākyānāṃ paurāṇaṃ kulavaṃśam ārabhya dharmyā kathā;
V03vinv171u:781: yuktam eva bhikṣavaḥ śraddhayā pravrajitena kulaputreṇa śākyānāṃ (SBV I 33)
V03vinv171u:782: paurāṇaṃ kulavaṃśam ārabhya dharmyāṃ kathāṃ dhārayituṃ grāhayituṃ vācayitum;
V03vinv171u:783: atha kāpilavastavāḥ [A_360a] śākyā bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntāḥ
V03vinv171u:786: tena khalu samayena kapilavastuni nagare siṃhahanur nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv171u:787: devadṛśe nagare suprabuddho rājyaṃ rājā kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv171u:788: suprabuddhasya rājño lumbinī nāmāgramahiṣī abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā janapadakalyāṇī;
V03vinv171u:789: devadṛśe 'nyatamo gṛhapatiḥ prativasaty āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī;
V03vinv171u:791: tasyābhirāmatayā rājā kālānukālaṃ tatra gatvā sārdham antaḥpureṇa ratikrīḍāṃ pratyanubhavati;
V03vinv171u:792: lumbinyās taṃ dṛṣṭvā spṛhā utpannā; sa kathayati:
V03vinv171u:793: deva mamaitam ārāmam anuprayaccheti; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv171u:796: yadi tvam ārāmeṇārthinī anyaṃ tavārthāya śobhanataraṃ kārayāmīti;
V03vinv171u:797: tato rājñā suprabuddhena lumbinyā arthāya tadviśiṣṭatara ārāmaḥ kāritaḥ;
V03vinv171u:798: tasya luṃbinīvanaṃ lumbinīvanam iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv171u:800: aho bata me kule cakravartī utpadyeta iti; suprabuddhasyāpi rājño dīrgharātram ayam āśāsakaḥ:
V03vinv171u:801: aho bata me siṃhahanunā sārdhaṃ saṃbandhaḥ syād iti;
V03vinv171u:802: yāvat tasyāpareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv171u:803: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
V03vinv171u:804: dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā; (SBV I 34)
V03vinv171u:805: tasyā rūpaśobhayā suprabuddho rājā sāntaḥpuro devadṛśanivāsī janakāyaś ca paraṃ vismayam upagataḥ;
V03vinv171u:807: kim iyaṃ dārikā āhosvid viśvakarmanirmiteyaṃ māyeti;
V03vinv171u:808: tasyās trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātāyā jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
V03vinv171u:809: kiṃ bhavatu dārikāyā nāmeti; amātyāḥ kathayanti:
V03vinv171u:810: deva devadṛśanivāsijanakāyā rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu vipravadante; kecit kathayanti:
V03vinv171u:811: dārikā evāsau pūrvakarmavipākābhiniṣpannā evaṃ varṇarūpaśobheti; apare kathayanti:
V03vinv171u:813: kiṃtarhi viśvakarmanirmitā sā māyeti tasmād bhavatu dārikāyā māyeti nāma;
V03vinv171u:815: māyā dārikā aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradattā pūrvavad yāvan mahatī saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv171u:819: bhūyo 'py asya krīḍato rammāṇasya paricārayataḥ duhitā [A_360b] jātā pratirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā paramayā varṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā;
V03vinv171u:820: tasyā janmani sarvaṃ tan nagaram udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsitaṃ;
V03vinv171u:821: na cāsyāḥ śakyate sarvathā rūpaśobhāṃ varṇayituṃ;
V03vinv171u:822: yathā māyāyās tasyā api vistareṇa jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate;
V03vinv171u:825: asyā rūpaśobhā yan māyāṃ vyatiricya vartate tasmād bhavatu mahāmāyeti;
V03vinv171u:831: dve duhitarau jāte māyā mahāmāyā ca;
V03vinv171u:834: dvitīyā vyākṛtā putraṃ janayiṣyati dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣanaiḥ (SBV I 35)
V03vinv171u:840: kiṃ tu na dve sadṛśe bhārye ekasyopasthāpayitavye iti yaivaṃ vyākṛtā putraṃ janayiṣyati dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṅkṛtaṃ sa rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartīti,
V03vinv171u:844: tena khalu samayena śākyānāṃ pāṇḍavā nāma khaṣāḥ prativiruddhāḥ;
V03vinv171u:845: śākyāḥ saṃbhūya rājñaḥ siṃhahanoḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv171u:848: sa kathayati bhavanto vṛddho 'haṃ na śaknomi taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayituṃ;
V03vinv171u:850: samayato 'nupreṣayāmi yadi kumārasya yathābhipretaṃ varaṃ prārthayato 'nuprayacchata; te kathayanti:
V03vinv171u:852: rājñā caturaṅgaṃ balakāyaṃ datvā śuddhodanaḥ kumāraḥ preṣitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:854: tataḥ śākyāḥ parituṣṭāḥ siṃhahano rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv171u:855: deva kumāreṇa pāṇḍavā khaṣāḥ hataprahatāḥ vidhvastāḥ kṛtāḥ;
V03vinv171u:858: bhavantaḥ śākyaiḥ kriyākāraḥ kṛtaḥ na kenacid dve sadṛśe bhārye upasthāpayitavye iti;
V03vinv171u:859: deva kiṃ mucyatāṃ kriyākāraḥ; sa kathayati:
V03vinv171u:860: sutarāṃ baddhavyo na moktavyaḥ; kiṃ tu kumārasyaikaṃ varam anuprayacchatha,
V03vinv171u:868: śuddhodanena kumāreṇa dve api pariṇīte (SBV I 36)
V03vinv171u:870: Śuddhodana succeeds Siṃhahanu and the descent of the Buddha
V03vinv171u:871: yāvad apareṇa samayena siṃhahanū rājā kālagataḥ;
V03vinv171u:872: kapilavastuni śuddhodano rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ [A_361a] ca;
V03vinv171u:873: so 'pareṇa samayena mahāmāyādevyā sārdham upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv171u:874: dharmatā hy eṣā tuṣitabhavanastho bodhisatvaḥ paṃcabhir avalokanair lokam avalokayati jātyavalokanena deśāvalokanena kālāvalokanena vaṃśāvalokanena stryavalokanena ca; (1)
V03vinv171u:883: mā me syur atonidānaṃ pare vaktāraḥ bodhisatvena garhaṇīyāyāṃ jātau pratisandhir gṛhīta iti;
V03vinv171u:884: tathā hi bodhisatvenānādikālīnam anākṣepasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma kṛtam upacitam;
V03vinv171u:890: paśyati yo 'sau deśa ikṣuśālimālāgomahiṣīsaṃpanno bhaikṣukaśatakalilo dasyujanavivarjitaḥ āryajanādhyuṣitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:891: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty ayaṃ madhyadeśa ikṣuśālimālāgomahiṣīsaṃpanno bhaikṣukaśatakalilo dasyujanavivarjitaḥ āryajanādhyuṣitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:893: mā me syur atonidānaṃ pare vaktāraḥ bodhisatvena (SBV I 37)
V03vinv171u:895: tathā hi bodhisatvenānādikālīnam anākṣepasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma kṛtam upacitam;
V03vinv171u:900: kīdṛśe kāle bodhisatvā jaṃbūdvīpe pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti;
V03vinv171u:901: utkarṣe vartamanāyāṃ prajāyām aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyām ūrdhvaṃ pratisandhiṃ na gṛhṇanti;
V03vinv171u:902: apakarṣe śatavarṣāyuṣāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ [prajāyām arvāk pratisandhiṃ na] gṛhṇanti;
V03vinv171u:903: kena kāraṇena bodhisatvā aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi manuṣyāṇām ūrdhvaṃ pratisandhiṃ na gṛhṇanti?
V03vinv171u:905: duḥsaṃvedyā jaḍā mṛdvindriyāḥ pramattāḥ sukhabahulāḥ satyānām abhājanabhūtāḥ;
V03vinv171u:906: apakarṣe 'py arvāg varṣaśatasya pañcakaṣāyā udriktā bhavanti;
V03vinv171u:907: tadyathā āyuḥkaṣāyaḥ kleśakaṣāyaḥ satvakaṣāyo dṛṣṭikaṣāyaḥ kalpakaṣāyaś ca;
V03vinv171u:908: mā me syur atonidānaṃ pare vaktāraḥ pañcakaṣāyodrikte kāle bodhisatvena pratisandhir gṛhīta iti;
V03vinv171u:909: tathā hi bodhisatvenānādikālīnam anākṣepasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma kṛtam upacitam;
V03vinv171u:915: paśyati yat kulam uccasaṃmatam anupākruṣṭacāritraṃ yāvad āsaptamaṃ mātāmahaṃ paitāmahaṃ yugam upādāyeti;
V03vinv171u:916: tasyaitad abhavad ayaṃ śākyavaṃśa uccakulasaṃmato yāvan mahāsaṃmatam upādāyānupākruṣṭacāritraś ca yanv ahaṃ rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya kule pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇīyāṃ;
V03vinv171u:917: mā me syur atonidānaṃ pare vaktāraḥ pratyavare kule bodhisatvena pratisandhir gṛhīta iti;
V03vinv171u:918: tathā hi bodhisatvenānādikālīnam anākṣepasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma (SBV I 38)
V03vinv171u:924: kīdṛśyā striyāḥ kukṣau bodhisatvāḥ pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇantīti;
V03vinv171u:925: paśyati yā strī rūpavatī bhavati śīlavatī kulavatī kulinā kulavardhanī pūrvabuddheṣu kṛtapraṇidhānā aho batāhaṃ buddhasya mātā syām iti;
V03vinv171u:928: tasyaivaṃ bhavati iyaṃ mahāmāyā yāvad āsaptamaṃ mātāmahaṃ mātāmahaṃ paitāmahaṃ yugam upādāyānupākruṣṭacāritrā rūpavatī śīlavatī kulinā kulavardhanī;
V03vinv171u:931: tathā hi mahāmāyā pūrvabuddheṣu kṛtādhikārapraṇidhānā aho batāhaṃ buddhamātā syām iti;
V03vinv171u:932: mā ca me syur atonidānaṃ pare vaktāraḥ alakṣaṇasaṃpannāyā striyāḥ kukṣau bodhisatvena pratisandhir gṛhīta iti;
V03vinv171u:937_0: atha bodhisatvaḥ pañca vyavalokanāni vyavalokya ṣaṭ kāmāvacarān devāṃs trir anuśrāvayati
V03vinv171u:937_1: ito 'haṃ mārṣās tuṣitād devanikāyāc cyutvā manuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ grahīṣyāmi rājñaḥ
V03vinv171u:939: yo yuṣmākam amṛtenārthī sa manuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇātu bhūyo madhyadeśa iti;
V03vinv171u:940: evam uktās tuṣitakāyikā devā bodhisatvam idam avocan:
V03vinv171u:941: yat khalu bodhisatva jānīyā etarhi kalikaluṣo lokaḥ krūrasantānaprajā ākulīkṛtaś ca jaṃbūdvipaḥ ṣaḍbhis tārkikaiḥ ṣaḍbhir ānuśravikaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ samāpattṛbhiḥ;
V03vinv171u:944: maskarī gośāliputraḥ sañjayī vairaṭṭīputraḥ ajitaḥ keśakaṃbalaḥ kakudaḥ kātyāyano nirgrantho jñātiputra;
V03vinv171u:945: ṣaḍ ānusravikāḥ katamas tadyathā kūṭatāṇḍyo brāhmaṇaḥ śroṇatāṇḍyo brāhmaṇaḥ,
V03vinv171u:946: cogī brāhmaṇaḥ brāhmāyur brāhmaṇaḥ [A_362a] puṣkarasāri brāhmaṇaḥ lohityaś ca brāhmaṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:949: arāḍaḥ kālāmaḥ subhadraḥ parivrājakaḥ sañjayī māṇavaḥ asitariṣiḥ urubilvākāśyapaś ca jaṭilaḥ;
V03vinv171u:950: iha tu bodhisatvasya dvādaśayojanāni dharmaśravaṇārtham āsanaprajñaptiḥ prajñāpyate;
V03vinv171u:952: yam asmākaṃ tuṣitabhavanastho bodhisatvo dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati taṃ vayaṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā tathā tathā pratipatsyāmahe;
V03vinv171u:953: yathāpitad asmākaṃ bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāyeti;
V03vinv171u:954: evam ukto bodhisatvaḥ tuṣitakāyikān devān idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:955: tena hi mārṣā sarvavādyāni prahaṇyantām iti
V03vinv171u:958: tuṣitakāyikābhir devatābhiḥ sarvavādyāni prahatāni; bodhisatvenāpi saṅkham āpūryābhihitaṃ:
V03vinv171u:961: yathāyaṃ mārṣāḥ śaṅkhaśabdaḥ sarvavādyāny abhibhūyāvasthitaḥ evam evāhaṃ jambūdvīpam avatīrya ṣaṭ tārkikān,
V03vinv171u:967: nairātmyasiṃhanādaṃ nadiṣyāmī iti viditvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv171u:972: yo yuṣmākaṃ mārṣā amṛtenārthī sa madhyadeśe pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇātu;
V03vinv171u:975: ayaṃ bodhisatvo bhagavān mahāmāyāyāḥ devyāḥ kukṣāu pratisandhiṃ grahītukāmaḥ;
V03vinv171u:976: yanv aham asyā ojopasaṃhāraṃ kuryāṃ kukṣiṃ ca viśodhayeyam iti viditvā śakreṇa devānām indreṇa mahāmāyāyā devyāḥ ojopasaṃhāraṃ kṛtavān;
V03vinv171u:978_0: tatas tuṣitabhavanastho bodhisatvaḥ pañcāvalokitāni vyavalokya ṣaṭ kāmāvacarān devāṃs
V03vinv171u:978_1: trir anuśrāvya gajanidarśanena rātryā madhyame yāme māhāmāyāyā devyāḥ kukṣim avakrāntaḥ; āha ca
V03vinv171u:984: Conception; auspicious signs in the dream
V03vinv171u:985: tathā hi mahāmāyā caturaḥ svapnān paśyati; (1)
V03vinv171u:986: ṣaḍdanto me śveto hastināgaḥ kukṣiṃ bhitvā praviṣṭaḥ; (2)
V03vinv171u:992: bhavantaḥ āhūyantāṃ svapnādhyāyavidaḥ naimittikāś ca brāhmaṇā iti;
V03vinv171u:993: taiś ca svapnādhyāyavido naimittikāś ca brāhmaṇā āhūtāḥ;
V03vinv171u:994: tato rājñā teṣām svapnāni niveditāni; te kathayanti:
V03vinv171u:996: putraṃ janayiṣyati dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṅkṛtam; saced gṛhī agāram adhyāvatsyati,
V03vinv171u:997: [A_362b] rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī; sacet keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya kāṣāyāṇi (SBV I 41)
V03vinv171u:998: vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajiṣyati,
V03vinv171u:999: tathāgato bhaviṣyaty arhan samyaksaṃbuddho vighuṣṭaśabdo loka iti
V03vinv171u:1004: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye bodhisatvas tuṣitād devanikāyāc cyutvā mātuḥ kukṣim avakrānto 'tyarthaṃ tasmin samaye mahāpṛthivīcālo 'bhūt;
V03vinv171u:1006: yā api tā lokasya lokāntarikā andhās tamaso 'ndhakāratamisrā yatremau sūryācandramasāv evaṃmahardhikāv evaṃmahānubhāvāv ābhayābhāṃ na pratyanubhavataḥ,
V03vinv171u:1007: tā api tasmin samaye udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā abhūvan;
V03vinv171u:1008: tatra ye satvā upapannās te svakam api bāhuṃ pragṛhītaṃ na paśyanti;
V03vinv171u:1009: te tayā ābhayā anyonyaṃ satvān dṛṣṭvā saṃjānate anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ satvā upapannā anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ satvā upapannā iti
V03vinv171u:1017: tathā tadāsīd iyam atra dharmatā // (SBV I 41)
V03vinv171u:1018: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye bodhisatvo bhagavān mātuḥ kuksāv avakrāntaḥ tasmin samaye śakro devendrāś caturo devaputrān mātur ārakṣakān sthāpayaty asihastān,
V03vinv171u:1020: mā kaścid bodhisatvaṃ viheṭayiṣyati manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo veti;
V03vinv171u:1021: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye bodhisatvo mātuḥ kukṣāv asthāt kośogata evāsthād amrakṣito garbhamalena,
V03vinv171u:1025: tadyathā maṇiratnaṃ kāśikaratne upakṣiptaṃ naiva maṇiratnaṃ kāśīkaratnena lipyate,
V03vinv171u:1027: evam eva yasmin samaye bodhisatvo mātuḥ kukṣāv asthāt kośogata evāsthād amrakṣito garbhamalena,
V03vinv171u:1031: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye bodhisatvo bhagavān mātuḥ kukṣāv asthāt tam enaṃ tasmin sasmaye mātā sarvam antaḥkukṣigataṃ paripūrṇaṃ paśyati;
V03vinv171u:1032: tadyathā maṇir aṣṭāṅgo vaiḍūryaḥ śubhro jātimān accho viprasanno 'nāvilaḥ pañcaraṅgike sūtre 'rpitaḥ syāt;
