V03vinv171u:2124: kālakṣemasya śākyasya mṛgajā nāma duhitā; tayā vātāyanasthayā bodhisatvaṃ dṛṣṭvā gāthā bhāṣitā
V03vinv171u:2125: sukhitā bata sā mātā sukhī cāsya pitā hy asau /
V03vinv171u:2126: nirvṛtā bata sā nārī yasyā bhartā bhaviṣyati //
V03vinv171u:2127: nirvāṇaśabdaṃ śrutvā tu dhyāyī sa puruṣottamaḥ /
V03vinv171u:2128: nirvāṇe śāntatāṃ jñātvā tasmiṃś cittam arocayat //
V03vinv171u:2133: rājñā śuddhodanena mṛgajā viṃśatistrīsahasraparivārā bodhisatvasyāntaḥpuraṃ praveśitā;
V03vinv171u:2134: iti tatra bodhisatvasya gopikāmṛgajāyaśodharāpramukhāni ṣaṣṭistrīsahasrāṇy antaḥpuram abhūt
V03vinv171u:2141: sārdham ekadhye sannipatya saṃjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv171u:2143: vyākṛtaḥ śākyamunir bodhisatvo yadi saptame divase na pravrajati,
V03vinv171u:2145: tad asmābhir bodhisatvaḥ sapta rātrindivasān yatnato rakṣaṇīyaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2147: tatas taiḥ kapilavastunagaraṃ saptabhiḥ prākāraiḥ parikṣiptaṃ saptabhiḥ parikhābhiś ca;
V03vinv171u:2150: yāsām udghāṭyamāneṣu dvāreṣu samantād yojanam śabdaḥ sphurati;
V03vinv171u:2151: bodhisatvaś ca harmyatale nṛttagītavāditrai strībhiś cābhirūpamanoharābhir upacaryamāṇo 'vasthāpitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2152: amātyāś ca turaṅgabalakāyasametā bahiḥ prākārasya samantād gulmakeṣu sthāpitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:2154: yat pañcabhiḥ puruṣaśataiḥ sthāpyate antaḥpuradvāraṃ tādṛśaṃ kāritam;
V03vinv171u:2155: yasyodghāṭyamānasya rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhaṃ śabdena sphurati;
V03vinv171u:2156: tacchravaṇād antaḥpurajano nagaradvāraniyuktaś ca apramatto 'vatiṣṭhate bahirnagaraniyuktā amātyāḥ paurājanapadāś ca;
V03vinv171u:2157: tan mahatyā vibhūtyā bodhisatva upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa vīṇāveṇupaṇavasughoṣakādinā upagīyamanas tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv171u:2158: rātrau bahiḥ śuddhodanaś caturaṅgena balakāyena pūrvadvāre 'vahito 'vatiṣṭhate;
V03vinv171u:2160: uttare amṛtodanaḥ; madhye nagarasya mahānāmā śākyaḥ prāhārikaḥ; sa pūrvadvāraṃ gatvā kathayati,
V03vinv171u:2162: ko jāgartīti; rājā kathayati: ahaṃ jāgarmi; jāgṛhi deva,
V03vinv171u:2163: jāgratas te śreyān iti; vidivā gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv171u:2164: supto mṛtasamo lokaḥ supto māravaśaṃ gataḥ /
V03vinv171u:2165: jāgratīha sadā santas tasmāj jāgṛta jāgṛta // iti;
V03vinv171u:2168: ahaṃ jāgarmi; jāgṛhi devaḥ jāgratas te śreyān iti; viditvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate (SBV I 79)
V03vinv171u:2169: supto mṛtasamo lokaḥ supto māravaśaṃ gataḥ /
V03vinv171u:2170: supto mṛtyuvaśaṃ prāptas tasmāj jāgṛta jāgṛta // iti;
V03vinv171u:2172: ko jāgarti ko jāgartīti; śuklodanaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:2174: jāgratas te śreyān iti; viditvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv171u:2175: suptaḥ khalu sadā mattaḥ supto madyāḍhakaṃ pītvā /
V03vinv171u:2176: aṭavīṣu vaneṣu suptas tasmāj jāgṛta jāgṛta // iti
V03vinv171u:2178: ko jāgarti ko jāgartīti; amṛtodanaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:2179: ahaṃ jāgarmi; jāgṛhi deva; jāgratas te śreyān iti; viditvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv171u:2185: ko jāgarti ko jāgartīti; niyuktāḥ kathayanti:
V03vinv171u:2186: vayaṃ jāgṛmaḥ; jāgṛta jāgratāṃ vaḥ śreyān iti; viditvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv171u:2187: dharmaṃ carata mā 'dharmaṃ satyaṃ vadata mānṛtam /
V03vinv171u:2188: mahat tamo praveṣṭavyaṃ tasmāj jāgṛta jāgṛta // iti;
V03vinv171u:2189: tataḥ prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ mahānāmā śākyo rājñe śuddhodanāya ārocayati:
V03vinv171u:2195: ṣaṇṇāṃ rātriṃdivasānām atyayāt kumāraś cakravartī bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv171u:2197: ity evaṃ yāvad ekaṃ rātriṃdivasam avaśiṣṭaṃ;
V03vinv171u:2206: tato bodhisatvasyāntaḥpurasametasya niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa [A_374a] krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayata etad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:2207: bhaviṣyanti me atonidānaṃ pare vaktāraḥ śākyamuniḥ kumāro 'pumān,
V03vinv171u:2208: yena yaśodharāgopikāmṛgajāprabhṛtīni ṣaṣṭistrīsahasrāṇy apāsya pravrajita iti;
V03vinv171u:2209: yanv ahaṃ yaśodharayā sārdhaṃ paricārayeyam iti;
V03vinv171u:2214: atha bodhisatvas tasyāṃ velāyāṃ pratītyasamutpādayogād gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv171u:2216: nāhaṃ punar api vatsye agāre saha yuvatyā // iti:
V03vinv171u:2217: atha tāḥ striyo nṛttagītavāditrapariśrāntā lālāprasrutavadanā prakīrṇakeśyo vikṣiptabhujavāsasaḥ kāny api kāny apy aślīkāni pralapantyo middham avakrāntāḥ;
V03vinv171u:2218: adrākṣīd bodhisatvas tā striyaḥ prasrutavadanāḥ prakīrṇakeśyaḥ vikṣiptabhujavāsasaḥ kāny api kāny apy aślīkāni pralapantyaḥ middham avakrāntāḥ;
V03vinv171u:2219: dṛṣṭvā ca punar asyāntaḥpure śmaśānasaṃjñā samutpannā; sa gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv171u:2233: Dreams of Mahāprajāpati, Yaśodharā and Siddhārtha
V03vinv171u:2235: rāhuṇā candramasaṃ grastam; pūrvasyāṃ diśy ādityam uditaṃ,
V03vinv171u:2247: pūrvasyāṃ diśy ādityam uditaṃ tatraivāstaṃgatam; bodhisatvo 'pi pañca svapnān adrākṣīt:
V03vinv171u:2253: sthitikāṃ tṛṇajātaṃ nābher abhyudgamya yāvannabha āsādya vyavasthitām;
V03vinv171u:2254: sarvaśvetāṃś chakunakān kṛṣṇaśirasaḥ pādayor nipatya yāvajjānumaṇḍalam utthitān;
V03vinv171u:2260: na cirād evānuttaraṃ jñānam adhigamiṣyāmi iti; tato yaśodharayā bodhisatvasya svapnā niveditāḥ:
V03vinv171u:2261: deva adya mayā aṣṭau svapnā dṛṣṭāḥ;
V03vinv171u:2269: pūrvasyāṃ diśy āditya uditas tatraiva astaṃgataḥ iti;
V03vinv171u:2271: yat kathayasi mātṛkāvaṃśo me bhagna iti;
V03vinv171u:2277: svayam eva pratyavekṣasva kiṃ bhagne na veti;
V03vinv171u:2284: yat kathayasi śrīr me gṛhān nirgateti;
V03vinv171u:2287: yat kathayasi rāhuṇā candro grasta iti;
V03vinv171u:2289: yat kathayasi pūrvasyāṃ diśy āditya uditas tatraivāstaṃgata iti;
V03vinv171u:2295: yādṛśāni yaśodharayā svapnāni dṛṣṭāni niyataṃ mayādyaiva gantavyam;
V03vinv171u:2300: deva yatra tvaṃ gamiṣyasi tatra māṃ neṣyasi iti;
V03vinv171u:2301: bodhisatvo nirvāṇaṃ sandhāya kathayaty evaṃ bhavatu;
V03vinv171u:2302: yatra yatra gamiṣyāmi tatra tatra tvāṃ neṣyāmi iti (SBV I 84)
V03vinv171u:2305: atha śakrabrahmādayo devā bodhisatvasya cetasā cittam ājñāya yena bodhisatvas tenopasaṅkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv171u:2322: baddhaṃ ca yantritaṃ caiva samantād rakṣitaṃ tathā //
V03vinv171u:2326: māyaṃ vrajed iti hi rakṣati māṃ janaughaḥ //
V03vinv171u:2330: duḥkhārditaṃ lokam imaṃ ca bhūyas (SBV I 85)
V03vinv171u:2333: yad bhavān vighnanirmukto vanam [A_375b] adyaiva vāsyati // iti;
V03vinv171u:2335: tataḥ śakreṇa devendreṇa svāpanaṃ kṛtvā pāñcikasya mahāyakṣasenāpater ājñā dattā;
V03vinv171u:2340: tataḥ śakreṇa saha kṛtasaṅketo yena chandaka upasthāyakas tenopasaṅkrānto yāvat paśyati chandakaṃ gāḍhamiddhāvaṣṭabdham;
V03vinv171u:2341: bodhisatvena yatnam āsthāya prabodhito gāthābhir gītena coktaḥ:
V03vinv171u:2348: vairaṃ na te kenacid asti saumya /
V03vinv171u:2349: na cāpi śatrus tava kaścid asti
V03vinv171u:2352: na kadācit tvayā chanda mama vākyaṃ vilopitam /
V03vinv171u:2353: mā me'dya carame kāle vākyam etad vilopaya // iti;
V03vinv171u:2355: kumāra rātrir iyaṃ bhayabhairavā; nāham aśvam ānayāmi iti; bodhisatvaḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv171u:2359: tataḥ svayam eva puradvāram udghāṭya kanthakam aśvarājaṃ grahītum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2364: tato bodhisatvena cakrasvastikanandyāvartenānekapuṇyaśatanirjātena bhūtānām āśvāsanakareṇa kareṇa śirasi parāmṛṣṭa uktaś ca: (SBV I 86)
V03vinv171u:2369: dharmatā khalu tiryañco 'py upasāntvyamānā vikṛtiṃ na vikṛtiṃ na bhajante;
V03vinv171u:2371: tato bodhisatvaḥ saṃjātasaumanasyaṃ kanthakam aśvarājaṃ sajjam avasthitaṃ [dṛṣṭvotthitaḥ];
V03vinv171u:2372: śakrabrahmādibhir devaiś catvāro devaputrā bodhisatvaṃ niṣkāsanāya samanuśiṣya sthāpitāḥ,
V03vinv171u:2375: parṇaḥ śabaraś ca; te bodhisatvenābhihitāḥ: bhavantaḥ ko māṃ neṣyati?
V03vinv171u:2376: kathayanti: vayaṃ neṣyāmaḥ; kiṃ yuṣmākaṃ balam?
V03vinv171u:2378: kumāra yāvatī pṛthivyā mṛttikā tām ahaṃ skandhenādāya gacchāmīti; dvitīyaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:2379: yāvac caturṣu mahāsamudreṣu sarittaḍāgodapāneṣu ca salilaṃ tat sarvam ahaṃ skandhenādāya gacchāmi iti; tṛtīyaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:2380: yāvantaḥ pṛthivyāṃ parvatās tān ahaṃ skandhenādāya gacchāmi iti; caturthaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:2381: yāvat pṛthivyāṃ tṛṇakāṣṭhaparṇaśādaṃ tat sarvam ahaṃ skandhenādāya gacchāmi iti;
V03vinv171u:2385: kumāra nāsmābhir vijñātam īdṛśaṃ balaṃ [A_375b] bodhisatvānām iti;
V03vinv171u:2386: yadi vijñātaṃ syān na vayam avasthitā syāma iti;
V03vinv171u:2387: taṃ kathālāpam śrutvā pūrvabuddhaś chandako bodhisatvasamīpam upasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2389: chandake 'śvapṛṣṭhe lagne kanthako 'śvarāja upari vihāyasam abhyudgataḥ:
V03vinv171u:2390: yathāpi tat bodhisatvasya bodhisatvānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena;
V03vinv171u:2392: tāsāṃ rudantīnām aśrubindavaḥ kāye pṛthivyāṃ ca nipatitum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv171u:2394: kumāra udakabindavo nipatanti; kiṃ devo varṣati iti; bodhisatvaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:2395: na devo varṣati; kin tv antaḥpuranivāsinyo devatā madviyogād roditum ārabdhāḥ; tāsāṃ (SBV I 87)
V03vinv171u:2397: tataś chandako 'śruparyākulekṣaṇo dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca niśvasya tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2398: bodhisatvo dakṣiṇena sarvakāyena nāgāvalokitena vyavalokayati; cintayati ca:
V03vinv171u:2399: iyaṃ ca me paścimā rātrir [yadā] mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdhaṃ sahāgāraśayyā iti; bhūyas sa lakṣayati:
V03vinv171u:2400: saced ahaṃ pūrvaṃ dvāram apahāyānyena dvāreṇa nirgamiṣyāmi,
V03vinv171u:2401: rājño bhaviṣyaty anyathātvam carame kāle nāhaṃ kumāreṇa vyavalokita [iti];
V03vinv171u:2403: sa taṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya kathayati: tāta nāgauravāt,
V03vinv171u:2405: nānyatra jarāmaraṇābhimarditaṃ lokaṃ jarāmaraṇaduḥkhabhayāt parimocayeyam iti;
V03vinv171u:2406: yāvan mahānāmā śākyo jāgarakajanaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇas taṃ pradeśam āgataḥ;
V03vinv171u:2412: mahānāman yena mayā tribhiḥ kalpāsaṅkhyeyair anekaiś ca duṣkaraśatasahasraiḥ satvānām arthāya bodhiḥ samupārjitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2416: tato mahānāmā śākyo niṣkaruṇavacanasamudācāraparāhato vikroṣṭum ārabdhaḥ; hā kaṣṭaṃ
V03vinv171u:2417: śākyānām adya sarveṣāṃ rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya ca /
V03vinv171u:2418: āśā bhaviṣyaty aphalā cintitā yā punaḥ punaḥ //
V03vinv171u:2423: iti viditvā sasaṃbhramo yaśodharām utthāpayan kathayati:
V03vinv171u:2424: eṣa gacchati siddhārthas taṃ vāraya patiṃ priyam /
V03vinv171u:2428: kaṣṭaṃ na kaścid api me vacanaṃ dadāty
V03vinv171u:2429: ārto viraumi niśi nātra mamāparādhaḥ // iti;
V03vinv171u:2430: tasyaivaṃ vipralapato 'py antaḥpure na kaścit pratibuddhyata iti
V03vinv171u:2432: araṇyaṃ vā nirākrandaṃ tathā devair adhiṣṭhitam / iti;
V03vinv171u:2433: tato mahānāmā duḥkhadaurmanasyaparītaḥ saṃtvaramāṇo rājñaḥ [A_376a] śuddhodanasya samīpaṃ gatvā rājānaṃ śuddhodanaṃ prabodhayan kathayati
V03vinv171u:2434: eṣa gacchati siddhārthas taṃ balād vinivāraya /
V03vinv171u:2437: tataḥ śakrabrahmādayo devā anekadevatāśatasahasraparivṛtā yena bodhisatvas tenopasaṅkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv171u:2441: agrataḥ śakrabrahmādayaḥ svena svenācāravihāreṇa gaganatalasthāne cānekāni devatāśatasahasrāṇi bodhisatvasyopariṣṭād divyāny utpalāni,
V03vinv171u:2468: mārṣa yas te 'bhūd dīrgharātram āśāsakaḥ kadāsvid ahaṃ vighnanirmuktas tapovanaṃ gaccheyam iti sa te 'dya paripūrṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2469: yadā tvam anuttarāṃ samyakasaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyethās tadāsmān api samanvāharethā iti;
V03vinv171u:2470: tathāstv iti pratijñāya bodhisatvo dakṣiṇena sarvakāyena nāgāvalokanena vyavalokya kathayati:
V03vinv171u:2472: na punaḥ saṃpravekṣyāmi puraṃ kapilavastv aham // iti
V03vinv171u:2473: atha bodhisatvo yāmadvayena dvādaśayojanāni samatikramyāśvād avatīryābharaṇāny avamucya chandakam āmantrayate
V03vinv171u:2482: ekākī bandhurahitaḥ katham ārya kariṣyasi // iti;
V03vinv171u:2500: chandakaḥ kathayati: deva vṛddho rājā putraśokena kālaṃ kariṣyatīti; tathā (SBV I 91)
V03vinv171u:2501: bodhisatvo bodhisaṃbhārasaṃbhṛtatvāt chandakavacanaṃ cittena na karoti;
V03vinv171u:2502: tato bodhisatvena nīlotpalasadṛśaṃ niṣkośam asiṃ kṛtvā cūḍām apanīya upari upari vihāyasi kṣiptā;
V03vinv171u:2503: śakreṇa devendreṇa gṛhītvā mahatā satkāreṇa devāṃs trayastriṃśān nītvā cūḍāmahaḥ prajñaptaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2504: śrāddhair api brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhis tasmin pradeśe keśagrahaṇaṃ nāma caityaṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam adyāpi caityavandakā bhikṣavo vandante;
V03vinv171u:2507: yasyedṛśo vyavasāyo na sa punar api gṛhī agāram adhyāvaseta?
V03vinv171u:2508: no deva; chandakaḥ saṃlakṣayati: kṣatriyābhimānī kumāro, na śakyam anena pratinivartitum iti /
V03vinv171u:2511: tataḥ kanthako 'śvarājo bodhisatvasya pādau jihvayā nirlīḍhe;
V03vinv171u:2513: gaccha kanthaka so 'ham abhisaṃbuddhabodhir bhavatkṛtajño bhavīṣyāmi iti; chandako 'py uktaḥ:
V03vinv171u:2515: evam uktaś chandako bāṣpagadgadakanṭho 'śruparyākulekṣaṇaḥ kanthakam aśvarājam ādāya punar bodhisatvam īkṣamāṇaḥ saṃprasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2516: tau yāṃ bhūmiṃ yāmadvayena gatau tāṃ saptarātreṇa pratinivṛttau;
V03vinv171u:2518: yugapat [yadi] pravekṣyāmo mahatā vipralāpena nātmānaṃ sandhārayiṣyāmi;
V03vinv171u:2521: tacchabdapratisaṃvedī antaḥpurajano 'nyaś ca janakāyaḥ sasaṃbhramo nirgato,
V03vinv171u:2524: dharmatā hy eṣā anye prākṛtās tiryagyonigatāḥ prāṇinaḥ saṃvṛtijñānalābhinaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2526: sa mahājanakāyaviklavaṃ śrutvā antargatenaiva bāṣpeṇoparuddhyamānaḥ kālagataḥ;
V03vinv171u:2527: tena viśrute anyatamasmin ṣaṭkarmanirate brāhmaṇakule (SBV I 92)
V03vinv171u:2529: yadā bodhisatvo 'nuttarāṃ saṃyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate tadā taṃ khaṭuṃkāśvavādena avabodhya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratisthāpayiṣyati
V03vinv171u:2531: The taking of the Yellow Robes
V03vinv171u:2533: anupame nagare 'nyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī;
V03vinv171u:2535: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv171u:2536: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ [A_377a] putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2538: sarvaiś ca pravrajya pratyekā bodhiḥ sākṣātkṛtā;
V03vinv171u:2540: sā tebhyaḥ śāṇakāni cīvarāṇy anuprayacchati; tair abhihitā:
V03vinv171u:2543: kin tu rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya śākyamunir nāma putraḥ kumāro 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate;
V03vinv171u:2546: ityuktvā jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtāḥ;
V03vinv171u:2547: tayāpi vṛddhayā tāni cīvarāṇi maraṇakāle duhitur dattāni;
V03vinv171u:2551: yā devatā tasmin vṛkṣe 'dhyuṣitā sā āyācitā tvayaitāni rājñaḥ śuddhodanaputrasya dātavyānīti;
V03vinv171u:2554: tato jarājīrṇalubdhavarṇam ātmānam abhinirmāya tāni prāvṛtya dhanurbāṇavyagrapāṇiḥ bodhisatvasya pratimārge 'vasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2555: bodhisatvaś cānupūrveṇa taṃ mārgaṃ pratipannaḥ paśyati lubdhaṃ dhanurbāṇavyagrapāṇiṃ kāṣāyavastraprāvṛtam;
V03vinv171u:2556: dṛṣṭvā ca punas taṃ puruṣam āmantrayate:
V03vinv171u:2557: bhoḥ puruṣa etāni sāṇakāni vastrāṇi pravrajitānurūpāṇi;
V03vinv171u:2560: kumāra nāham etāny anuprayacchāmi; mā me syur atonidānaṃ pare vaktāraḥ,
V03vinv171u:2561: tvayā rājakumāraṃ jīvitād vyaparopya etāni kāśikasūkṣmāṇi vastrāṇi gṛhītāni [iti];
V03vinv171u:2566: ko vā śraddhatte tvayāhaṃ jīvitād vyaparopita iti;
V03vinv171u:2568: tataḥ śakro devendro bodhisatvasya pādayor nipatya śāṇakāny anuprayacchati;
V03vinv171u:2570: bodhisatvasya tāni śāṇakāni vastrāṇi na kāyapramāṇikāṇi; tasyaitad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:2571: aho bata me śāṇakāni cīvarāṇi kāyapramāṇikāni syur iti;
V03vinv171u:2572: vākpravyāhārasamanantaram eva bodhisatvasya tāni śāṇakāni cīvarāṇi kāyapramāṇikāni saṃvṛttāni;
V03vinv171u:2573: yathāpitad bodhisatvasya bodhisatvānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena;
V03vinv171u:2577: tatas tāni bodhisatvakāśikavastrāṇi [pratigṛhya] śakreṇa deveṣu trayastriṃśeṣu kāśikamahaḥ prajñaptaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2578: śrāddhair brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhir tasmin pradeśe kāṣāyapratigrahaṇaṃ nāma caityaṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam adyāpi caityavandakā bhikṣavo vandante;
V03vinv171u:2579: tato bodhisatvo muṇḍaḥ kāṣāyavastraprāvṛtaḥ itaś cāmutās ca paryaṭan bhārgavasya riṣer āśramapadam anuprāptaḥ
V03vinv171u:2582: tasmiṃś ca samaye bhārgavariṣiḥ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo [A_377b] vyavasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2583: sa bodhisatvena tathāvidho dṛṣṭaḥ; uktaś ca:
V03vinv171u:2584: maharṣe kim arthaṃ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparas tiṣṭhasi iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv171u:2585: mamāsminn āśramapade tālāḥ sauvarṇaiḥ puṣpaphalair āsan;
V03vinv171u:2588: maharṣe yasyānubhāvād etasminn āśramapade tālāḥ sauvarṇaiḥ puṣpaphalair āsan sa jīrṇāturamṛtasandarśanād udvigno vanaṃ saṃśṛtaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2589: yady asau jīrṇāturamṛtasandarśanād udvignas tapovanaṃ [na] saṃśṛto 'bhaviṣyat tasyaitad udyānam abhaviṣyat;
V03vinv171u:2590: ity evam ukto bhārgavariṣir bodhisatvaṃ nirīkṣitum ārabdhah;
V03vinv171u:2591: tato rūpaśobhāṃ śāntaṃ ca veṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā,
V03vinv171u:2593: bhoḥ pravrajita mā haiva tvam eva saḥ; bodhisatvaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:2595: tato bhārgavena vismayotphulladṛṣṭinā bodhisatvas tatprathamata āsanenopanimantritaḥ puṣpaphalaiś ca;
V03vinv171u:2597: maharṣe kiyad dūram itaḥ kapilavastu nagaram (SBV I 94)
V03vinv171u:2598: iti; sa kathayati: dvādaśayojanānīti; bodhisatvaḥ saṃlakṣayati āsannam kapilavastunagaram,
V03vinv171u:2599: nātrāvasthānaṃ śreyaḥ; śākyāḥ paurāḥ saṃkṣobhaṃ kariṣyanti; yanv ahaṃ gaṅgām uttareyam iti
V03vinv171u:2601: Arrival at Rājagṛha and Bimbisāra's meeting
V03vinv171u:2602: sa gaṅgām uttīryānupūrveṇa cārikāṃ caran rājagṛham anuprāptaḥ:
V03vinv171u:2603: kuśalo bhavan bodhisatvas teṣu teṣu śilpasthanākarmasthāneṣu karavīrapatrapuṭakaṃ kṛtvā śānteneryāpathena rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2604: tasmiṃś ca samaye rājā biṃbisāra upariprāsādatalagataḥ;
V03vinv171u:2605: tenāsau dṛṣṭaḥ prāsādikena abhikramapratikrameṇa ālokitavyavalokitena saṃmiñjitaprasāritena saṅghāṭīcīvarapātradhāraṇena piṇḍapātam aṭan;
V03vinv171u:2608: nāsti kasyacid evaṃrūpa īryāpathas tadyathāsya pravrajitasya; ātha cātra
V03vinv171u:2614: hitvā ca pāpikāṃ vācam ājīvaṃ paryaśodhayat //
V03vinv171u:2620: āroheṇa ca saṃpannaṃ yugamātraṃ ca paśyati //
V03vinv171u:2623: tataḥ saṃcoditā dūtā anvabadhnaṃś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ / (SBV I 95)
V03vinv171u:2624: bhikṣur gamiṣyati kvāyaṃ kutra vāsam upaiṣyati //
V03vinv171u:2625: sa piṇḍapātaṃ carati ṣaḍbhir dvāraiḥ susaṃvṛtaḥ /
V03vinv171u:2629: jñātvā ca vāsopagatam eko dūta upāviśat /
V03vinv171u:2630: apare kṣipram āgamya rājña ārocayaṃs tataḥ //
V03vinv171u:2632: āsīno vyāghraśābo vā siṃho vā girigahvare //
V03vinv171u:2633: dūtānāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā ratham āruhya pārthivaḥ /
V03vinv171u:2635: āyānabhūmiṃ niryāya sa yānād avatīrya ca /
V03vinv171u:2637: rājā niṣadya saṃmodya kṛtvā saṃrañjanīṃ kathām /
V03vinv171u:2642: dadāmi te varān bhogān jātiṃ pṛṣṭo vadātmanaḥ//
V03vinv171u:2643: santi rājan janapadāḥ pārśve himavato gireḥ /
V03vinv171u:2646: kṣatriyṣ me kulaṃ rājan na kāmān prārthayāmy aham //
V03vinv171u:2657: vāntān kathaṃ tān punar ādadeyam (SBV I 96)
V03vinv171u:2661: na tv eva buddhiṃ mama kāmavegā
V03vinv171u:2668: prahāṇāya gamiṣyāmi yatra me raṃsyate manaḥ //
V03vinv171u:2669: rājñā biṃbisāreṇābhihitam: bhoḥ pravrajita anena vratena kiṃ prārthayase?
V03vinv171u:2672: bhoḥ pravrajita yadā tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyethās tadāsmān api samanvāharethā iti;
V03vinv171u:2674: evaṃ bhavatu samanvāhariṣyāmi; ityuktvā rājagṛhān niṣkrāntaḥ
V03vinv171u:2680: [A_378b] yadā te ekapādā divasasya praharam avatiṣṭhante,
V03vinv171u:2681: bodhisatvo dvāv avatiṣṭhate; yadi te pañcatapaḥprayogeṇa divasasya praharam avatiṣṭhante,
V03vinv171u:2682: bodhisatvas tenāpi yogena dvāv avatiṣṭhate; tatas te vismayam āpannāḥ saṃjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ:
V03vinv171u:2683: mahān ayaṃ śramaṇa [iti] mahāśramaṇo mahāśramaṇa iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā; bodhisatvena te pṛṣṭāḥ:
V03vinv171u:2684: bhavanto yūyam anena vratena kiṃ prārthayatha?
V03vinv171u:2685: tatraike kathayanti: śakratvam iti; apare (SBV I 97)
V03vinv171u:2686: kathayanti vayaṃ brahmatvam iti; anye kathayanti māratvam iti; bodhisatvaḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv171u:2687: punarāvartakā hy ete ṛṣaya unmārgapratipannā iti
V03vinv171u:2690: sa taṃ mārgaṃ nālam iti kṛtvā yenārāḍaḥ kālāmas tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2692: sacet te ārāḍa aguru careyam ahaṃ bhavato 'ntike brahmacaryam iti;sa kathayati:
V03vinv171u:2693: na me āyuṣman gautamāguru; vihara tvaṃ yathāsukham iti; bodhisatvaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:2696: yāvad evāyuṣman gautama ākiñcanyāyatanam; atha bodhisatvasyaitad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:2698: mamāpi śraddhā; ārāḍasyāpi kālāmasya vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñā,
V03vinv171u:2700: ārāḍena kālāmena iyanto dharmāḥ sākṣātkṛtāḥ yāvad eva ākiñcanyāyatanam;
V03vinv171u:2701: kasmād aham imān dharmān na sākṣātkariṣyāmi iti;
V03vinv171u:2702: atha bodhisatvas teṣām eva dharmāṇām aprāptānāṃ prāptaye anadhigatānaṃ adhigamāya asākṣātkṛtānāṃ sākṣātkriyāyai eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā vyāhārṣīd;
V03vinv171u:2703: eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā viharann acirād eva tān dharmān sākṣād akārṣīt;
V03vinv171u:2704: sākṣātkṛtvā ca punas tān dharmān yenārāḍaḥ kālāmas tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2706: nanu bhavatā ārāḍena ime dharmāḥ svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtā yāvad evākiñcanyāyatanam; sa evam āha:
V03vinv171u:2707: tathyaṃ mayā gautama ime dharmāḥ sākṣātkṛtā yāvad evākiñcanyāyatanam; bodhisatvaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:2708: mamāpy āyuṣman ārāḍa ime dharmāḥ svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtā yāvad evākiñcanyāyatanam iti;
V03vinv171u:2709: tarhy āyuṣman gautama yāvat tava tāvan mama;
V03vinv171u:2711: ehy āvām ubhāv apīmaṃ gaṇaṃ parikarṣāvaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2713: athārāḍaḥ kālāmo bodhisatvasya pūrvācārya eva san bodhisatvaṃ paramayā mānanayā mānitavān;
V03vinv171u:2715: parameṣu cāsya pratyayeṣu āttamanāś cābhūd abhirāddhaś ca;
V03vinv171u:2718: nālaṃ jñānāya, nālaṃ darśanāya, nālam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
V03vinv171u:2721: atha bodhisatvas taṃ mārgaṃ nālam iti viditvā yenodrako rāmaputras tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2723: sacet te udraka aguru careyam ahaṃ tavāntike brahmacaryam;
V03vinv171u:2727: yāvad evāyuṣman gautama naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam; bodhisatvasyaitad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:2730: udrakasya rāmaputrasya vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñā;
V03vinv171u:2732: udrakeṇa rāmaputreṇa iyanto dharmāḥ sākṣātkṛtā yāvad eva naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam;
V03vinv171u:2733: kasmād aham imān dharmān na sākṣātkariṣyāmi iti;
V03vinv171u:2734: atha bodhisatvas teṣām eva dharmāṇām aprāptānāṃ prāptaye anadhigatānām adhigamāya asākṣātkṛtānāṃ sākṣātkriyāyai eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā vyāhārṣīt;
V03vinv171u:2735: eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā viharann acirād eva tān dharmān sākṣādakārṣīt;
V03vinv171u:2736: sākṣātkṛtvā ca punas tān dharmān yenodrako rāmaputras tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2738: nanu bhavatā udrakeṇa ime dharmāḥ svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtā yāvad eva naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam?
V03vinv171u:2740: mayā āyuṣman gautama ime dharmāḥ sākṣātkṛtā yāvad eva naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam;
V03vinv171u:2742: mayāpy āyuṣmann udraka ime dharmāḥ svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtā yāvad eva naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam iti;
V03vinv171u:2743: tarhy āyuṣman gautama yāvat tava tāvan mama;
V03vinv171u:2745: ehy āvām ubhāv apīmaṃ gaṇaṃ parikarṣāvaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2747: athodrako rāmaputro bodhisatvasya pūrvācārya eva san taṃ paramayā mānanayā mānitavān;
V03vinv171u:2749: parameṣu cāsya pratyayeṣv āttamanāś cābhūd abhirāddhaś ca;
V03vinv171u:2753: atha bodhisatvas tam api mārgaṃ nālam iti kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ (SBV I 99)
V03vinv171u:2756: rājā śuddhodanaḥ putraśokābhibhūto nityam eva bodhisatvaṃ samanveṣaṇāya dūtān preṣayati;
V03vinv171u:2757: tena śrutaṃ yathā siddhārthaṃ kumāra udrakeṇa rāmaputreṇa sārdhaṃ vihṛtya rājagṛhān niṣkrānto upasthāyakavirahitaḥ paribhramatīti;
V03vinv171u:2759: devadṛśe nagare suprabuddhena śākyenaivam eva śrutam;
V03vinv171u:2761: tatra bodhisatvaḥ pañcabhir upasthāyakaśataiḥ parivṛtas tapovane paribhramati; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv171u:2763: yanv ahaṃ pañcopasthāyakān gṛhītvā pariśiṣṭān preṣayeyam iti;
V03vinv171u:2767: atha bodhisatvaḥ pañcabhir upasthāyakaiḥ parivṛto gayādakṣiṇena yenorubilvāsenāyanīgrāmakas tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2768: sa itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramann adrākṣīd ramaṇīyaṃ pṛthivīpradeśam,
V03vinv171u:2770: nadīṃ ca nairañjanāṃ śītalasyandanāṃ sasikatāṃ sūpatīrthāṃ haritaśādvalavistīrṇakūlāṃ nānāvṛkṣopaśobhitāṃ ramaṇīyāṃ;
V03vinv171u:2774: nadī ca nairañjanā śītalasyandanā sasikatā sūpatīrthā haritaśādvalavistīrṇakūlā nānāvṛkṣopaśobhitā ramaṇīyā;
V03vinv171u:2775: aho bata prahāṇārthinā kulaputreṇemaṃ vanaṣaṇḍam niśritya prahāṇaṃ praṇidhātuṃ [yuktam];
V03vinv171u:2777: yanv aham imaṃ vanaṣaṇḍaṃ niśritya prahāṇaṃ praṇidadhyām iti (SBV I 100)
V03vinv171u:2780: atha bodhisatvas taṃ vanaṣaṇḍam abhyavagāhyānyatarad vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya danteṣu dantān ādhāya,
V03vinv171u:2783: tasya cetasā cittam abhigṛhṇato 'bhinipīḍayato 'bhisantāpayataḥ sarvaromakūpebhyaḥ svedo muktaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2784: tadyathā balavān puruṣo durbalataraṃ puruṣaṃ udbāhukaṃ gṛhītvā abhinigṛhṇīyād abhinipīḍayed abhisantāpayet,
V03vinv171u:2786_0: evam eva bodhisatvasya tasmin samaye danteṣu dantān ādhāya jihvāgraṃ tāluni pratiṣṭhāpya
V03vinv171u:2786_1: cetasā cittam abhinigṛhṇato 'bhinipīḍayato 'bhisantāpayataḥ sarvaromakūpebhyaḥ svedo muktaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2791: evaṃrūpāṃ bodhisatvasya duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayataś cittaṃ na paryādāya tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv171u:2793: yanv ahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā vyādhmātakāni [dhyānāni] dhyāyeyam iti;
V03vinv171u:2794: bhūyasyā mātrayā vyādhmātakāni dhyānāni dhyātum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2797: tasya mukhe nāsikāyāṃ cāśvāsapraśvāseṣu saṃniruddheṣv atyarthaṃ tasmin samaye śirasi śirovedanā vartante;
V03vinv171u:2798: tadyathā balavān puruṣo durbalatarasya puruṣasya dṛḍhena vāratrakeṇa dāmnā śirasy āmreḍakam dadyāt,
V03vinv171u:2800: evam eva bodhisatvasya vyādhmātakāni dhyānāni dhyāyato 'tyarthaṃ śirasi śirovedanā vartante;
V03vinv171u:2805: evaṃrūpāṃ bodhisatvasya duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanām vedayataś [A_380a] cittaṃ na paryādāya tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv171u:2807: yanv ahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā vyādhmātakāni (SBV I 101)
V03vinv171u:2809: tad bhūyasyā mātrayā vyādhmātakāni dhyānāni dhyātum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2810: sa vyādhmātakāni dhyānāni dhyāyan mukhe nāsikāyāṃ cāśvāsapraśvāsān saṃniruṇaddhi;
V03vinv171u:2811: tasya mukhe nāsikāyāṃ cāśvāsapraśvāseṣu saṃniruddheṣu atyarthaṃ tasmin samaye
V03vinv171u:2812: [Here there is a gap of about one leaf due to an error of the scribe. The Tib. Transl. That covers this gap has been reproduced below in facsimile, as the Appendix.]
V03vinv171u:2814: tadyathā goghātako vā goghātakāntevāsī vā tīkṣṇayā gokartanyā gokukṣiṃ pāṭayet,
V03vinv171u:2816: evam eva bodhisatvasya tasmin samaye vyādhmātakāni dhyānāni dhyāyato 'tyarthaṃ tasmin samaye kukṣau kukṣivedanā vartante;
V03vinv171u:2821: evaṃrūpāṃ bodhisatvasya duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ khāraṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayataś cittaṃ na paryādāya tiṣṭhati yathāpitad bhāvitatvāt kāyasya; tasyaitad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:2822: yanv ahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā vyādhmātakāni dhyānāni dhyāyeyam iti;
V03vinv171u:2823: sa bhūyasyā mātrayā vyādhmātakāni dhyānāni dhyātum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2824: vyādhmātakāni dhyānāni dhyāyan mukhe nāsikāyāṃ cāśvāśapraśvāsān saṃniruṇaddhi;
V03vinv171u:2825: tasya mukhe nāsikāyāṃ cāśvāsapraśvāseṣu saṃniruddheṣv atyarthaṃ tasmin samaye kāye kāyaparidāhā vartante;
V03vinv171u:2826: tadyathā dvau balavattarau puruṣau durbalataraṃ puruṣam udbāhukaṃ gṛhītvā aṅgārakarṣyām upanāmayete,
V03vinv171u:2828: evam eva bodhisatvasya vyādhmātakāni dhyānāni dhyāyato 'tyarthaṃ tasmin samaye kāye kāyaparidāhā vartante;
V03vinv171u:2833: evaṃrūpāṃ bodhisatvasya duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ (SBV I 102)
V03vinv171u:2834: vedanāṃ vedayataś cittaṃ na paryādāya tiṣṭhati yathāpitad bhāvitatvāt kāyasya; tasyaitad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:2835: yanv ahaṃ sarveṇa sarvam anāhāratāṃ pratipadyeya iti
V03vinv171u:2838: atha saṃbahulā devatā bodhisatvasya cetasā cittam ājñāya yena bodhisatvas tenopasaṅkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv171u:2840: sacet tvaṃ mārṣa mānuṣyakeṇāhāreṇārttīyase jehrīyasi vitarasi vijugupsase,
V03vinv171u:2841: vayaṃ te sarvaromakūpeṣu divyam ojaḥ kāye upasaṃharāmaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2845: devatāś ca me sarvaromakūpeṣu divyam [A_380b] ojaḥ kāye upasaṃhareyuḥ,
V03vinv171u:2848: yan mama syān mṛṣā tan mama syān mithyādṛṣṭiḥ;
V03vinv171u:2849: mithyādṛṣṭipratyayaś ca punar ihaike satvāḥ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyante;
V03vinv171u:2850: yanv ahaṃ devatānāṃ vacanaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ pratyākhyāyālpaṃ stokaṃ katipayaṃ parīttam āhāram āhareyam;
V03vinv171u:2851: yadi vā mudgayūṣeṇa yadi vā kulutthayūṣeṇa yadi vā hareṇukāyūṣeṇa iti
V03vinv171u:2854: atha bodhisatvasya tasmin samaye devatānāṃ vacanaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ pratyākhyāyālpaṃ stokaṃ katipayaṃ parīttam āhāram āharataḥ sarvāṇy aṅgapratyaṅgāni mlānāny abhūvan;
V03vinv171u:2856: tadyathā asītakaparvāṇi vā kālakāparvāṇi vā mlānāni bhavanti;
V03vinv171u:2859: samaye bodhisatvasya alpaṃ stokaṃ katipayaṃ parīttam āhāram āharataḥ śirasi śirastvak mlānābhūt;
V03vinv171u:2863: evam eva bodhisatvasya tasmin samaye alpaṃ stokaṃ katipayaṃ parīttam āhāram āharataḥ śirasi śirastvak mlānābhūt;
V03vinv171u:2869: evaṃrūpāṃ bodhisatvasya tasmin samaye ātmopasaṅkramikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayataś cittaṃ na paryādāya tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv171u:2871: tasyālpaṃ stokaṃ katipayaṃ parīttam āhāram āharataḥ akṣṇor akṣitārake apagate gaṃbhīre gaṃbhīrānugate dūrānugate dūrānu praviṣṭe;
V03vinv171u:2873: tadyathā gaṃbhīrodake udapāne udakatārakā apagatā bhavanti;
V03vinv171u:2874: atyapagatā gaṃbhīrā gaṃbhīrānugatā dūrānupraviṣṭā apīdānīm ākhyāyikābhiḥ śrūyante;
V03vinv171u:2875: evam eva tasmin samaye bodhisatvasyālpaṃ stokaṃ katipayaṃ parīttam āhāram āharata akṣṇor akṣitārake apagate abhūtām;
V03vinv171u:2882: evaṃrūpāṃ bodhisatvasya tasmin samaye ātmopakramikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayataś cittaṃ na paryādāya tiṣṭhati,
V03vinv171u:2884: tasmin samaye alpaṃ stokaṃ katipayaṃ parīttam āhāram āharataḥ pārśukāntarāṇy [A_381a] unnatāvanatāny abhūvan;
V03vinv171u:2885: tadyathā dvivarṣatrivarṣapraticchannāyās tṛṇaśālāyā gopānasyā unnatāvanatā bhavanti;
V03vinv171u:2886: evam eva tasmin samaye bodhisatvasya alpaṃ stokaṃ katipayaṃ parīttam āhāram āharataḥ pārśukāntarāṇy unnatāvanatāny abhūvan;
V03vinv171u:2892: evaṃrūpāṃ bodhisatvasya tasmin samaye ātmopakramikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayataś cittaṃ na paryādāya tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv171u:2893: atha bodhisatvasya alpaṃ stokaṃ katipayaṃ parīttam āhāram āharataḥ pṛṣṭhavaṃśo 'bhūt tadyathā vartanāveṇī;
V03vinv171u:2897: sa pūrvaṃ kāyaṃ parigṛhya paścimakaṃ kāyaṃ saṃsthāpayati;
V03vinv171u:2898: paścimakaṃ kāyaṃ saṃparigṛhya pūrvakaṃ kāyaṃ saṃsthāpayati;
V03vinv171u:2901: tasyobhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ kāyam āmārjataḥ parimārjato 'pīdānīṃ pratimūlāni romāṇi pṛthivyāṃ śīryante; tasyaitad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:2905: atha tisro devatā yena bodhisatvas tenopasaṅkrāntāḥ; tatraikā evam āha:
V03vinv171u:2908: naiṣa kṛṣṇo 'pi tu śyāma iti; tṛtīyā evam āha:
V03vinv171u:2909: naiṣa kṛṣṇo nāpi śyāmo 'pi tu madguracchavir iti;
V03vinv171u:2910: bodhisatvasya yā sā śubhā varṇanibhā sā sarveṇa sarvam antarhitābhūt
V03vinv171u:2913: atha bodhisatvasya tasmin samaye aśrutapūrvās tisra upamāḥ pratibhātāḥ; 1)
V03vinv171u:2914: tadyathā ārdraṃ kāṣṭhaṃ sasnehaṃ jala upanikṣiptaṃ syād ārāt sthalāt;
V03vinv171u:2916: sa tatrādharāraṇyām uttarāraṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpya abhimathnan na bhavyo 'gniṃ saṃjanayituṃ,
V03vinv171u:2918: evam eva tad bhavati yathāpitad ārdrāt kāṣṭhāt sasnehāt;
V03vinv171u:2919: evam eva ye kecic chramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā kāmeṣu na kāyena cittena vā vyapakṛṣṭā viharanti,
V03vinv171u:2920: teṣāṃ yaḥ kāmeṣu kāmacchandaḥ kāmasnehaḥ kāmapremā kāmālayaḥ kāmaniyantrī kāmādhyavasānaṃ [sa] teṣāṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv171u:2921: evam eva tad bhavati yathāpitat kāyena cittena (SBV I 105)
V03vinv171u:2923: kiṃ cāpi te imām evaṃrūpāṃ ātmopakramikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti;
V03vinv171u:2924: atha ca punas te nālaṃ jñānāya,
V03vinv171u:2927: iyaṃ tatra bodhisatvasya tasmin samaye prathamā aśrutapūrvā upamā pratibhātā; 2)
V03vinv171u:2928: tadyathā ārdraṃ kāṣṭhaṃ sasnehaṃ sthala upanikṣiptaṃ syād ārāt jalāt;
V03vinv171u:2930: sa tatrādharāraṇyām uttarāraṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpyābhimathnan na bhavyo 'gniṃ saṃjanayitum,
V03vinv171u:2932: evam etad bhavati yathāpitad ārdrāt kāṣṭhāt sasnehāt;
V03vinv171u:2933: evam eva ye kesic chramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā kāmeṣu kāyena vyapakṛṣṭā viharanti,
V03vinv171u:2934: na tu cittena teṣāṃ tatra yaḥ kāmeṣu kāmacchandaḥ kāmapremā kāmālayaḥ kāmaniyantrī,
V03vinv171u:2935: kāmādhyavasānaṃ sa teṣāṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv171u:2936: kiṃcāpi te imām evaṃrūpām ātmopakramikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti;
V03vinv171u:2937: atha ca punas te nālaṃ jñānāya; nālaṃ darśanāya,
V03vinv171u:2939: iyaṃ tatra bodhisatvasya tasmin samaye dvitīyā aśrutapūrvā upamā pratibhātā; 3)
V03vinv171u:2940: tadyathā śuṣkaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ koṭaraṃ niḥsnehaṃ sthala upanikṣiptaṃ syād ārāj jalāt;
V03vinv171u:2943: sa tatrādharāraṇyām uttarāraṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpyābhimathnan bhavyo 'gniṃ sañjanayituṃ tejaḥ prāviṣkartum;
V03vinv171u:2944: evam etad bhavati yathāpitat śuṣkāt kāṣṭhāt koṭarāt;
V03vinv171u:2945: evam eva ye kecic chramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā kāyena vyapakṛṣṭā viharanti cittena ca,
V03vinv171u:2946: teṣāṃ yaḥ kāmeṣu kāmacchandaḥ kāmasnehaḥ kāmapremā kāmālayaḥ kāmaniyanti kāmādhyavasānaṃ sa teṣāṃ cittāṃ na paryādāya tiṣṭhati;
V03vinv171u:2947: kiṃcāpi te na imām evaṃrūpām ātmopakramikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante;
V03vinv171u:2948: atha ca punas te alaṃ jñānāya alaṃ darśanāya,
V03vinv171u:2950: iyaṃ tatra bodhisatvasya tasmin samaye tṛtīyā aśrutapūrvā upamā pratibhātā;
V03vinv171u:2951: yanv aham ekatilaphalam āhāram āhareyam iti;
V03vinv171u:2954: na tāvad dvitīyaṃ yāvad asya tad ojaḥ kāyān na vigataṃ bhavati;
V03vinv171u:2955: tasyaikaṃ tilam āhāram āharataḥ sutarām aṅgapratyaṅgāni parikṣīṇāni,
V03vinv171u:2963: tāṃ duṣkaracaryāvasthāṃ śrutvā rājā śuddhodanaḥ ardhatṛtīyāni vārtāvāhakaśatāni preṣayati;
V03vinv171u:2965: tayoḥ pratidivasaṃ muhur muhur vārtāṃ kathayanti:
V03vinv171u:2966: bodhisatva īdṛśīṃ duṣkaracaryāṃ carati; ekaṃ tilam āhāram āharati; ekaṃ taṇḍulam,
V03vinv171u:2972: iti śrutvā rājā śuddhodanaḥ putraśokābhibhūto bhūyasyā mātrayā bāṣpopatapyamānahṛdayo 'śruparyākulekṣaṇaḥ santapyate;
V03vinv171u:2974: sārdham antaḥpureṇa yaśodharā devī bhartus tadavasthāṃ pratiśrutya bhartṛśokābhibhūtā bāṣpārdravadanā vinirmuktamālyābharaṇā viṣaṇṇā [A_382a] duṣkaraṃ carati;
V03vinv171u:2975: ekaṃ tilam āhāram āharati; ekaṃ taṇḍulam,
V03vinv171u:2982: yadi yaśodharā pratidivasaṃ bodhisatvasya vārtāṃ śṛṇoti sthānam etad vidyate yad bhartṛśokābhyāhatā anayā duṣkaracaryayā garbhaṃ na dhārayiṣyati;
V03vinv171u:2984_0: tad upāyasaṃvidhānaṃ kartvayaṃ yena yaśodharāyā bodhisatvavārtāṃ na kaścit kathayati
V03vinv171u:2984_1: iti viditvā rājñā śuddhodanena sarvāntaḥpurajanaḥ kriyākāraṃ kārito na kenacit bodhisatvavārtā
V03vinv171u:2986: māṃ muktvā na kasyacid bodhisatvavārtā nivedayitavyeti;
V03vinv171u:2987: śrutvāpi svayaṃ vārtāṃ yaśodharāpekṣayā antarnigūḍhasantāpo 'nyathāntaḥpurajanaṃ vipralaṃbhayati,
V03vinv171u:2988: yaṃ śrutvā yaśodharā devī prāṇān sandhārayati (SBV I 107)
V03vinv171u:2991: atha bodhisatvasyaitad abhavat: ayam api mārgo nālaṃ jñānāya,
V03vinv171u:2994: yanv ahaṃ paramavikṛtam āhāram āhareyam iti;
V03vinv171u:2997: ye te vatsakā acirajātakā mātus stanyena yāpayanti teṣām uccāraprasrāvaḥ;
V03vinv171u:2998: tāvac ca na dvitīyam āhāram āharati,
V03vinv171u:2999: yāvad asya tad ojaḥ kāyān na vigataṃ bhavati;
V03vinv171u:3001: mahāśmaśānaṃ ca gatvā mṛtakaḍebaraṃ śirasy upanidhāya dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayati pāde pādam ādhāyālokasaṃjñī smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan utthānasaṃjñām eva manasi kurvānaḥ
V03vinv171u:3004: apīdānīm grāmakumārakā grāmakumārikāś cāgamyāsyobhayoḥ karṇasrotasos tūlikā āsārayanty api prasārayanty api;
V03vinv171u:3007: pāṃsupiśācakaṃ bata paśyāmaḥ iti; apīdānīṃ pāṃsum api kṣipanti,
V03vinv171u:3010: nābhijānāti bodhisatvas teṣāṃ grāmakumārakāṇāṃ grāmakumārikāṇāṃ vā antike praduṣṭaṃ cittam utpādayituṃ,
V03vinv171u:3011: pāpikāṃ vā vācaṃ niścārayitum; evaṃrūpāṇi bodhisatvasya duṣkarāṇi carataḥ etad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:3012: ye kecid duḥkhaprahāṇayogam anuyuktā viharanti sarve te etāvan nāta uttareṇa;
V03vinv171u:3013: ato bhūyas so 'pi mārgo nālaṃ jñānāya,
V03vinv171u:3019: samāhitaṃ cittaṃ bhavaty ekāgram; tasyaitad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:3022: alam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye iti; tasyaitad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:3023_0: abhijānāmy ahaṃ pituḥ śuddhodanasya niveśane karmāntān anusaṅgamya jambūcchāyāyāṃ
V03vinv171u:3023_1: niṣadya [A_382a] viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ
V03vinv171u:3024: prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya vihartum; syāt sa mārgaḥ,
V03vinv171u:3028: sa tu mayā na sukaram utpādayituṃ yathāpitat kṛśena durbalenāplasthāmena;
V03vinv171u:3029: yanv ahaṃ yathāsukham āśvasyāṃ yathāsukhaṃ praśvasyāṃ,
V03vinv171u:3040: atha teṣāṃ pañcānām upasthāyakānām etad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:3041: ayaṃ bhavantaḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ śaithilikaḥ saṃvṛtto,
V03vinv171u:3043: prahāṇavibhrānto ya eṣa idānīm audārikam āhāram āharaty odanakulmāṣān;
V03vinv171u:3048: anupūrveṇa vārāṇasīṃ gatvā ye loke arhantas tān uddiśya pravrajitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:3049: te pañca samagrāḥ sahitāḥ saṃmodamānā avivadamānā ṛṣivadane viharanti mṛgadāve iti pañcakāḥ pañcakā iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā
V03vinv171u:3052: bodhisatvo 'py anupūrveṇa kāyasya sthāmaṃ ca balaṃ ca viryaṃ ca saṃjanayya anupūrveṇa senāyanīgrāmaṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv171u:3054: tasya dve duhitarau nandā ca nandabalā ca; tābhyāṃ śrutam:
V03vinv171u:3055: śākyānāṃ kumāra utpanno 'nuhimavatpārśve nadyā bhāgīrathyās tīre kapilasya ṛṣer āśramapadasya nātidūre:
V03vinv171u:3056: sa brāhmaṇair naimittikair vipañcanakair vyāktṛaḥ rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī;
V03vinv171u:3057: sa cābhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpannaḥ sarvajanamanoharaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3058: yā nārī dvādaśavarṣāṇi idam evaṃrūpaṃ vrataṃ samādāya vartate tasyā (SBV I 109)
V03vinv171u:3062: tasya samāptau ṣoḍaśaguṇitaṃ madhupāyasaṃ tapaḥparikhinnāya ṛṣaye pratipādyate āgantukāya iti śrutvā ca punas tābhyāṃ gosahasraṃ dohayitvā tad eva gosahasraṃ pāyitam;
V03vinv171u:3063: tatas tad eva gosahasraṃ dohayitvā pañcaśatāni pāyitāni;
V03vinv171u:3064: tatas tāni pañcaśatāni dohayitvā tāny eva [pañcaśatāni] pāyitāni;
V03vinv171u:3065: [tataḥ tāni] pañcaśatāni dohayitvā ardhatṛtīyāni śatāni pāyitāni;
V03vinv171u:3066: tatas tāny ardhatṛtīyāni śatāni dohayitvā [tāny evārdhatṛtīyāni śatāni pāyitani;
V03vinv171u:3067: tatas tāny ardhatṛtīyāni śātāni dohayitvā] pañcaviṃśatyuttaram śataṃ pāyitam;
V03vinv171u:3068: tatas tat pañcaviṃṣatyuttaraṃ śataṃ dohayitvā [tad eva pañcaviṃśatyuttaraṃ śataṃ pāyitam;
V03vinv171u:3069: tataḥ tat pañcaviṃśatyuttaraṃ śataṃ dohayitvā] triṣaṣṭiḥ pāyitā;
V03vinv171u:3070: tatas tāṃ triṣaṣṭiṃ dohayitvā saiva triṣaṣṭiḥ pāyitā;
V03vinv171u:3071: tatas tāṃ triṣaṣṭiṃ dohayitvā dvātriṃśat pāyitā;
V03vinv171u:3072: tatas tā dvātriṃśat dohayitvā tā eva dvātriṃśat pāyitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:3073: tatas tā dvātriṃśat dohayitvā ṣoḍaśa pāyitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:3074: tatas tāḥ ṣoḍaśa dohayitvā tā eva ṣoḍaśa [A_383a] pāyitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:3075: tatas tāḥ ṣodaśa dohayitvā aṣṭau pāyitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:3076: tatas tā aṣṭau dohayitvā tā evāṣṭau pāyitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:3077: tatas tā aṣṭau dohayitvā sphaṭikamayyāṃ sthālyāṃ ṣoḍaśaguṇitaṃ madhupāyasaṃ sādhayitum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv171u:3079: bodhisatvaḥ idaṃ pāyasaṃ bhuktvā adyaivānuttaraṃ jñānam adhigamiṣyati;
V03vinv171u:3080: tatas tejaupasaṃhāraḥ kartavya iti taiḥ sadyobalā oṣadhayaḥ prakṣiptāḥ;
V03vinv171u:3081: tatra ca kṣīre saṃparivartamāne cakrasvastikanandyāvartāni cihnāni dṛśyante;
V03vinv171u:3082: tatra ca upago nāmājīvakaḥ paribhramaṃs taṃ pradeṣam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3083: tena tat pāyasaṃ dṛṣṭam; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv171u:3084: ya etat pāyasaṃ bhuṅkte so 'nuttaraṃ jñānam adhigamiṣyati;
V03vinv171u:3086: sa muhūrtam ekānte prakramya sthito yāvad avatāritam iti;
V03vinv171u:3088: kṣuttarṣaśramapīḍito 'smi; mamaitat prayaccha iti; te kathayataḥ:
V03vinv171u:3091: tatas tābhyāṃ sphaṭikamayyāṃ sthālyāṃ ratnamayyāṃ pātryāṃ prakṣiptam;
V03vinv171u:3093: tasyām avasthāyāṃ brāhmaṇaveṣam abhinirmāya tayoḥ purato 'vasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3095: te śakrāya dātum ārabdhe; sa kathayati:
V03vinv171u:3096: kiṃ mamānuprayacchatha āhosvid yo mamāntikād viśiṣṭataraḥ?
V03vinv171u:3102: kiṃ mamānuprayacchatha āhosvid yo mamāntikāt prativiśiṣṭatamaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3106: te tebhyo dātum ārabdhe; te kathayanti:
V03vinv171u:3109: ayaṃ bodhisatvo bhagavān nairañjanām abhyavagāhya gātrāṇi pariṣicya alpasthāmavatvān na śaknoti pratyuttartum;
V03vinv171u:3113: tadā devatābhir arjunaśākhāvanāmitā yām avalaṃbya bodhisatvo nadīṃ nairañjanām uttīrya cīvarakāṇi prāvṛtya nadyā nairañjanāyās tīre niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3114: tatas tābhyāṃ satkṛtya tīvreṇāśayena tan madhupāyasaṃ tasmai pratipāditam;
V03vinv171u:3120: tato boshisatvena madhupāyasaṃ paribhujya sā pātrī prakṣālya nadyāṃ nairañjanāyāṃ prakṣiptā;
V03vinv171u:3123: śakreṇa devānām indreṇa garuḍaveṣam abhinirmāya nadīṃ nairañjanāṃ kṣobhayitvā,
V03vinv171u:3126: deveṣu trayastriṃśeṣu pātrīmahaḥ prajñaptaḥ; tato nandā nandabalā bodhisatvenokte:
V03vinv171u:3127: anena dānena kiṃ prārthayatha iti; te kathayataḥ:
V03vinv171u:3128: bhagavan yo 'sau śākyānāṃ kumāra utpanno 'nuhimavatpārśve [A_383b] nadyā bhāgīrathyās tīre kapilasya ṛṣer āśramapadasya
V03vinv171u:3129: nātidūre sa brāhmaṇair naimittikair vipañcanakair vyākṛtaḥ rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī iti;
V03vinv171u:3130: so 'smākam anena kuṣalamūlena cittotpādenānnaparityāgena bhartā bhaved iti;
V03vinv171u:3132: pravrajito 'sāv anarthikaḥ kāmair iti; te kathayataḥ:
V03vinv171u:3138: evam astv ityuktvā bodhisatvaḥ madhupāyasaṃ paribhujya santarpitaḥ ṣaḍindriyabalasthāmaprāptaḥ, (SBV I 111)
V03vinv171u:3139: nadyā nairañjanāyās tīre itaś cāmutaś ca niṣadya bhūmiṃ paryeṣate;
V03vinv171u:3141: sa tam abhiruhya viviktāvakāśe pṛthivīpradeśe paryaṅkam ābhujya niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3144: nūnaṃ mayāpakṣālāni karmāṇi kṛtāni yenāyaṃ parvato viśīrṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3145: devatā bodhisatvasya cetasā cittam ājñāya kathayanti:
V03vinv171u:3146: bhagavan na tvayā pāpakāni karmāṇi kṛtāni; api tu dharmatā hy eṣā,
V03vinv171u:3147: sarvāpi dvau pṛthivī na śaknoti dhārayituṃ yaś cocchinnakuśalamūlo yaś cottaptakuśalamūlaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3150: api tu nadīṃ nairañjanām uttīryāmuṣmin pradeśe gaccha vajrāsanam;
V03vinv171u:3151: tatra atītānāgatapratyutpannās sarve bodhisatvā niṣadyānuttaraṃ jñānam adhigatavantaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3157: caraṇanipāte saṃpīditā ceyaṃ mahāpṛthivī kāṃsapātrīva raṭitum ārabhdā;
V03vinv171u:3159: vātabalāhakā api devaputrā mandamandaṃ pravātum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv171u:3160: varṣabalāhakā api devaputrā īṣat pravarṣitum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv171u:3162: yādṛśīni me nimittāni prādurbhavanti adyaiva mayā anuttaraṃ jñānam adhigataṃ bhaviṣyatīti
V03vinv171u:3165: nadyāṃ nairañjanāyāṃ kālikasya nāgarājasya pūrvakarmavipākajaṃ bhavanam abhinirvṛttam;
V03vinv171u:3167: sa raṇantyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ śabdena bhavanād abhyudgataḥ;
V03vinv171u:3168: paśyati bodhisatvaṃ dūrād eva dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṅkṛtam,
V03vinv171u:3173: samantatobhadrakam; sahadarśanāc ca bodhisatvaṃ gāthābhir gītena cābhiṣṭotum ārabdhaḥ:
V03vinv171u:3179: prahṛṣṭacittaḥ sumanā imāṃ giram uvāca ha //
V03vinv171u:3180: pūrvakā hi mayā dṛṣṭās te 'pi buddhā mahardhikāḥ /
V03vinv171u:3181: teṣāṃ tava ca paśyāmi na nānākaraṇaṃ mune //
V03vinv171u:3182: yathokṣipasi pūrvaṃ hi pādaṃ dakṣiṇakaṃ mune /
V03vinv171u:3203: raṇanty, adrākṣīt, buddhaś ca, pūrva, caraṇa, cīvara, sudṛḍha
V03vinv171u:3204: cāṣa, anilāś caiva, tava, kṛtvātha te daśa /
V03vinv171u:3207: tato bodhisatvaḥ kālikanāgarājena saṃstūyamāno vajrāsanābhimukhaḥ saṃprasthitaḥ; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv171u:3209_0: tasya tṛṇaiḥ prayojanam iti śakro devānām indro bodhisatvasya cetasā cittam ājñaya
V03vinv171u:3209_1: gandhamādanāt parvatāt tūlasaṃsparśānāṃ tṛṃānāṃ bhāram ādāya svastikayāvasikavarṇam
V03vinv171u:3212: śakreṇa devendreṇa bodhisatvasya pādayor nipatya sagauraveṇa dattāni;
V03vinv171u:3213: tato bodhisatvaḥ svastikasya yāvasikasyāntikāt tṛṇāny ādāya devatopadiṣṭena mārgeṇa yena bodhimūlaṃ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3214: upasaṅkramya anākulam asaṅkulaṃ tṛṇasaṃstarakaṃ prajñapayitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3215: tatas tāni tṛṇāni pradakṣiṇāni patitum ārabdhāni;
V03vinv171u:3219: iti viditvā vajrāsanam abhiruhya suptoragarājabhogaparipiṇḍīkṛtaṃ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3220: ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhāṃ smṛtim upasthāpya cittam utpādayati; vācaṃ ca bhāṣate:
V03vinv171u:3221: na tāvad bhetsyāmi paryaṅkaṃ yāvad aprāpta āsravakṣayaḥ [A_384b]
V03vinv171u:3222: sa na tāvat bhindati paryaṅkaṃ yāvad aprāpta āsravakṣayaḥ
V03vinv171u:3225: mārasya pāpīyaso dvau dhvajau harṣasthānīyaḥ śokasthānīyaś ca;
V03vinv171u:3227: ārabdhaḥ māraḥ pāpīyān saṃlakṣayati: yathaiṣa kampate dhvajaḥ,
V03vinv171u:3229: sa samanvāhartuṃ pravṛttaḥ yāvat paśyati bodhisatvaṃ vajrāsane niṣaṇṇam; tasyaitad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:3230: ayaṃ śuddhodanaputro vajrāsane niṣaṇṇo yāvan madviṣayaṃ nākrāmati,
V03vinv171u:3231: tāvad asya vighnaḥ kartavyaḥ; iti viditvā uddhūtaśiraskaḥ śaṇaśāṭīnivasitaḥ,
V03vinv171u:3233: yena bodhisatvas tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ; upasaṅkramya sasaṃbhramaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:3238: tatra bodhisatvasya trayaḥ pāpakā akuśalā vitarkāḥ samutpannāḥ; tadyathā,
V03vinv171u:3244: kim arthaṃ me trayaḥ pāpakā akuśalā vitarkāḥ samutpannāḥ; yāvat paśyati,
V03vinv171u:3251: kim arthaṃ tvaṃ bodhimūle niṣaṇṇa iti; bodhisatvaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:3253: kumāra kutas tava anuttaraṃ jñānam iti; bodhisatvaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:3254: tava tāvat pāpīyan ekaṃ yajñam iṣṭvā kāmadhātvīśvaratvaṃ saṃpannam;
V03vinv171u:3255: prāg eva yena mayā triṣu kalpāsaṅkhyeyeṣv anekāni yajñakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇīṣṭāni;
V03vinv171u:3257: so 'ham anuttaraṃ jñānaṃ nādhigamiṣyāmīti kuta etat?
V03vinv171u:3259: sa tāvat bhavān eva sākṣī yathā mayā ekena yajñena kāmadhātvīśvaratvaṃ prāptam iti;
V03vinv171u:3261: yathā tvayā triṣu kalpāsaṅkhyeyeṣv anekāni yajñakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇīṣṭāni;
V03vinv171u:3263: tato bhagavatā cakrasvastikanandyāvartena jālāvanaddhena anekapuṇyaśatanirjātena bhītānām (SBV I 115)
V03vinv171u:3264: āśvāsanakareṇa kareṇa pṛthivī parāmṛṣṭā pṛthivī sākṣiṇī yathā mayā [A_385a] triṣu kalpāsaṅkhyeyeṣv anekāni yajñakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇiṣṭāni;
V03vinv171u:3266: tataḥ pṛthivīdevatā pṛthivīm udbhidya kṛtāñjalipuṭā śabdam udīrayati:
V03vinv171u:3267: evam etat pāpīyan yathā bhagavān kathayatīti;
V03vinv171u:3268: evam ukte māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tūṣṇīṃbhūto madgubhūtas srastaskandho 'dhomukho niṣpratibhaḥ pradhyānaparamo vyavasthitaḥ
V03vinv171u:3270: evam apy ahaṃ kurvan na labhe śākyasya śuddhodanaputrasya avatāraṃ;
V03vinv171u:3271: yanv aham asya bhūyasyās mātrayā vighnaṃ kuryām ityuktvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3272: tatas tena tisro duhitaraḥ preṣitāḥ tṛṣṇā ca ratā ca ratiś ca;
V03vinv171u:3273: tā rūpayauvanamadamattā divyavastrālaṅkāravibhūṣitā bodhisatvasya purastāt strīsādhyāni vidarśayitrm ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv171u:3274: tato bodhisatvenopāyakauśalena tathādhiṣṭhitā yathā vṛddhāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ;
V03vinv171u:3276: māras tās tathāvidhā dṛāṭvā viṣaṇṇaḥ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ:
V03vinv171u:3277: ko 'sāv upāyas syād yena śākyasya śuddhodanaputrasya tapovighnaṃ kuryām iti;
V03vinv171u:3279: svayaṃ cākarṇād dhanuḥ pūrayitvā bodhisatvaṃ parivāryāvasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3280: tato bodhisatvas tān anekarūpān bahuvividhapraharaṇasahitān dṛṣṭvā saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv171u:3281: yas tāvat prākṛtapuruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃraṃbham ārabhate,
V03vinv171u:3283: prāg evāyaṃ kāmadhātvīśvaro yanv ahaṃ pratipakṣaṃ yojayeyam;
V03vinv171u:3285: māraś ca ṣaṭtriṃśadbhūtakoṭisahito bodhisatvasyopari kuntakacakratomarabhiṇḍipālaśarādi nikṣeptum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3287: tāni cāsya praharaṇāni divyāny utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkāṇi bhūtvā bodhisatvasya samantāt patitum ārabdhāni;
V03vinv171u:3288: tato māra upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya pāṃsuvarṣaṃ varṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3290: divyāni māndārakāṇi puṣpāṇi bhūtvā bodhisatvasyopari nipatitum ārabdhāni;
V03vinv171u:3291: tato māreṇa viṣavāyur utsṛṣṭaḥ upalavarṣaś ca;
V03vinv171u:3292: śuddhāvāsakāyikābhir devatābhis tato bodhisatvasyopari parṇikākuṭir abhinirmitā;
V03vinv171u:3293: upalavarṣeṇāpi viṣavāyusametena bodhisatvasya na kiñcit kṛtam iti;
V03vinv171u:3300: iti viditvā bodhivṛkṣaṃ sphaṭikamayam abhinirmāya śrotrāvadhānatatparo 'vasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3301: bodhipatrāṇi [A_385b] sphaṭikamayāni muhur muhuḥ svanitum ārabdhāni;
V03vinv171u:3309: ayaṃ māraḥ pāpīyāṃś ciraṃ bodhisatvaṃ viheṭhayiṣyati;
V03vinv171u:3310: iti viditvā tan mārabalaṃ cakravāṭasyopariṣṭāt kṣiptam iti
V03vinv171u:3314: nadyā nairañjanāyās tīre bodhimūle yuktaḥ sātatye naipakye saṃbodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu bhāvanāyogam anuyukto viharati;
V03vinv171u:3315: sa rātryā prathame yāme riddhiviṣayajñānasākṣātkriyāyām abhijñāyāṃ cittam abhinirṇamayati;
V03vinv171u:3320: tiraḥ kuḍyaṃ tiraḥśailaṃ tiraḥ prākāram asajjamānena kāyena gacchati,
V03vinv171u:3325: ākāśaṃ paryaṃkena krāmati tadyathā pakṣī śakuniḥ;
V03vinv171u:3326: imaū vā punaḥ sūryācandramasau evaṃmahardhikāv evaṃmahānubhāvau pāṇinā āmārṣṭi parimārṣṭi; yāvat, (SBV I 117)
V03vinv171u:3327: brahmalokaṃ kāyena vaśe vartayati; bhūyo māraḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv171u:3329: yanv ahaṃ dūrastha eva śabdaṃ kuryām iti;
V03vinv171u:3331: bodhisatvenāpi tadāvaranāya dvādaśayojanāni kadalīvanaṃ nirmitaṃ yenāsau śabdaḥ parāhataḥ śrūyate;
V03vinv171u:3333: yanv ahaṃ divyaśrotrajñānasākṣātkriyāyām abhijñāyaṃ cittam abhinirṇamayeyaṃ,
V03vinv171u:3334: yena yān śabdān ākāṅkṣāmi śrotuṃ tān śṛṇomi,
V03vinv171u:3336: iti viditvā divyaśrotrajñānasākṣātkriyāyām abhijñāyāṃ cittam abhinirṇamayati;
V03vinv171u:3337: sa divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa ubhayān śabdān śṛṇoti mānuṣān apy amānuṣān api,
V03vinv171u:3343: kena neti katham etaj jñāyate iti; tasyaitad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:3345: sa rātryā madhyame yāme cetaḥparyāyajñānasākṣātkriyāyām abhijñāyāṃ cittam abhinirṇamayati;
V03vinv171u:3348: sarāgaṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti;
V03vinv171u:3349: vigatarāgaṃ cittaṃ vigatarāgaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti;
V03vinv171u:3360: savimuktaṃ cittam [savimuktaṃ cittam] iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti; tasyaitad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:3361: eṣāṃ mārakiṃkarāṇāṃ ko me anyasyāṃ jātau mātṛsaṃbandhaṃ pitṛsaṃbandhaḥ; ko vā vadhakaḥ,
V03vinv171u:3363: pratyamitra iti; katham etaj jñāyata iti; tasyaitad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:3365: sa rātryā madhyame yāme pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānasākṣātkriyāyām abhijñāyāṃ cittam abhinirṇamayati;
V03vinv171u:3388: anekān api saṃvartavivartakaplān samanusmarati; amī nāma te bhavantaḥ satvāḥ yatrāham āsam evaṃnāmā,
V03vinv171u:3396: so 'haṃ tasmāt sthānāc cyutaḥ amutropapannaḥ tasmād api cyutaḥ amutropapannaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3398: sākāraṃ soddeśam anekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmarati; tasyaitad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:3403: sa rātryā madhyame yāme cyutyupapādajñānasākṣātkriyāyām abhijñāyāṃ cittam abhinirṇamayati;
V03vinv171u:3404: sa divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa satvān paśyati,
V03vinv171u:3413: amī nāma te bhavantaḥ satvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatā vāṅmanoduścaritena samanvāgatā āryāṇām apavādakā mithyādṛṣṭayaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3414: mithyādṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetoḥ taddhetutatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātaṃ narakeṣu prapadyante;
V03vinv171u:3415: amī vā punar bhavantaḥ satvāḥ kāyasucaritena samanvāgatā vāṅmanassucaritena samanvāgatās āryāṇām anapavādakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭayaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3416: samyagdṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetos taddhetutatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇāt sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante; tasyaitad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:3417: amī bhavantaḥ satvāḥ kāmāśraveṇa bhavāśraveṇāvidyāśravena [A_386b] ca saṃsāre saṃsaranti;
V03vinv171u:3419: yathā prahīyante tat kathaṃ jñāyata iti; tasyaitad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:3421: ca yuktaḥ sātatye naipakye saṃbodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu bhāvanāyogam anuyukto viharann āsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyāyām abhijñāyāṃ cittam abhinirṇamayati;
V03vinv171u:3422: sa idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti;
V03vinv171u:3425: ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti yathābhutaṃ prajānāti;
V03vinv171u:3434: nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti; iti tatrābhisaṃbuddhabodhir bhagavān kṛtakṛtyaḥ,
V03vinv171u:3439: yadā bodhisatvena ṣaṭtriṃśādbhūtakoṭiparivāraṃ māraṃ maitreṇāstreṇābhinirjitya anuttaraṃ jñānam adhigataṃ,
V03vinv171u:3440: tadā mārasya pāpīyaso hastād dhanuḥ srasto,
V03vinv171u:3442: bhavanaṃ ca kampitam; tato māraḥ pāpīyān ṣaṭtriṃśadbhūtakoṭiparivāro duḥkhī,
V03vinv171u:3446: śākyamunir bodhisatvo duṣkaracaryāṃ caritvā vajrāsanam abhiruhya tṛṇasaṃstare kālagataḥ iti;
V03vinv171u:3447: yat śrutvā rājā śuddhodanaḥ antaḥpurakumārāmātyagaṇasahīyo mahatā duḥkhadaurmanasyena santaptaḥ,
V03vinv171u:3449: gopikā mṛgajā yaśodharā ca bodhisatvaguṇānusmaraṇāt mūrchitāḥ pṛthivyāṃ nipatitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:3450: jalāvasekapratyāgataprāṇās tā antaḥpurajanena sāntvyamānā aśruparyākulekṣaṇā muhur bāṣparodhagadgadasvarā vipralapantyo 'vasthitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:3451: tāṃ vipratipattiṃ dṛṣṭvā buddhābhiprasannābhir devatābhir ārocitam:
V03vinv171u:3453: api tu tenānuttaraṃ jñānam adhigatam iti
V03vinv171u:3456: yat śrutvā rājā śuddhodanaḥ saparivāraḥ kapilavāstavaś ca janakāyaḥ paraṃ harṣam upāgatāḥ;
V03vinv171u:3457: anuttarajñānādhigame ca bhagavataḥ yaśodharāyaḥ putro jātaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3460: atha rājā śuddhodanaḥ tāṃ saṃpattiṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudita udagraprītisaumanasyajātaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3462: candanavāripariṣiktaṃ surabhidhūpasphaṭikopanibaddham āmuktapaṭṭadāmakalāpam ucchṛtadhvajapatākaṃ nānāpuṣpāvakīrṇaṃ ramaṇīyam; (SBV I 119)
V03vinv171u:3463: caturṣu nagaradvāreṣu dānaśālā māpitā madhye ca śṛṇgāṭakasya;
V03vinv171u:3465: dakṣiṇe paścime uttare madhye śṛṅgāṭakasya [A_387a] dānāni dīyante;
V03vinv171u:3470: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya rāhula iti nāmeti;
V03vinv171u:3471: amṛtodanasyāpi tathaiva dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā putrasya nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate;
V03vinv171u:3474: yasmād asya janmani sarvaṃ nagaram ānanditaṃ,
V03vinv171u:3475: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya ānanda iti nāmeti; rājā śuddhodanaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:3476: yo 'yaṃ yaśodharāyāḥ putro jātaḥ naiṣa śākyamuneḥ putraḥ;
V03vinv171u:3478: tatas tayā bodhisatvasya vyāyāmaśilāyām āropya krīḍāpuṣkariṇyās tīre sthitayā satyopayācanaṃ kṛtam:
V03vinv171u:3479: yady ayaṃ bodhisatvena jātas tathāsyāṃ puṣkariṇyāṃ saha śilayā plaveta;
V03vinv171u:3482: sa tūlapicuvat saha śilayā plavitum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3483_0: rājā śuddhodanas tad atyadbhutaṃ [śrutvā] mahājanakāyaparivṛto bodhisatvasya kriḍāpuṣkariṇīgato
V03vinv171u:3483_1: yāvat paśyati rāhulabhadraṃ bodhisatvasya śilāyāṃ niṣaṇṇaṃ tūlapicuvad udake plavamānam;
V03vinv171u:3484: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudita udagraprītisaumanasyajātaḥ sahasā puṣkariṇīm avatīrya rāhulabradraṃ kumāram aṃśenādāya vyutthitaḥ
V03vinv171u:3485: yadā bhagavatā ṣaṭtriṃśadbhūtakoṭiparivāraṃ māraṃ maitreṇāstreṇābhinirjitya anuttaraṃ jñānam adhigatam,
V03vinv171u:3488: yā api tā lokasya lokāntarikā andhās tamaso 'ndhakāratamisrā yatremau sūryācandramasāv evaṃmahardhikāv evaṃmahānubhāvāv ābhayā ābhāṃ na pratyanubhavataḥ,
V03vinv171u:3489: tā api tasmin samaye udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā abhūvan;
V03vinv171u:3490: tatra ye satvā upapannās [te svakam api bāhuṃ pragṛhītaṃ na paśyanti];
V03vinv171u:3493: anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ satvā upapannā anye 'pīha bhavantaḥ satvā upapannā iti; antaroddānam:
V03vinv171u:3495: śākyānāṃ caiva pravrajyā gaṅgāpāla namo 'stu te //
V03vinv171u:3498: atha dvayor brahmakāyikayor devatayor [brahmaloke nivāsinor] etad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:3500: nadyā nairañjanāyās tīre bodhimūle acirābhisaṃbuddhabodhis tejodhātusamāpannaḥ saptāham ekaparyaṅkena atināmayati;
V03vinv171u:3502: yan nu vayam enaṃ gatvā pratyekapratyekaṃ gāthābhir abhiṣṭuyāma iti;
V03vinv171u:3503: atha dve brahmakāyike devate tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃmiñjitaṃ vā bāhuṃ prasārayet,
V03vinv171u:3505: evam eva dve brahmakāyike devate brahmaloke antarhite bhagavataḥ purataḥ pratyaṣṭhātām;
V03vinv171u:3517: ityuktvā tatraivāntarhite; atha bhagavāṃs tasmāt samādher vyutthāya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv171u:3518: yac ca kāmasukhaṃ loke yac cāpi divijaṃ sukham /
V03vinv171u:3520: nikṣipya hi guruṃ bhāraṃ nādadīta paraṃ punaḥ /
V03vinv171u:3526: vimuktiprītisukhasaṃvedī buddho bhagavān saptāham ekaparyaṅkena atināmayati;
V03vinv171u:3528: tena khalu samayena trapuṣabhallikau vaṇijau pañcamātraiḥ śakaṭaśataiḥ sārdham anuvyavaharamāṇau,
V03vinv171u:3530: atha trapuṣabhallikayor vaṇijor anyatamāyāḥ purāṇamitrāmātyajñātisālohitāyāḥ devatāyāḥ etad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:3531: ayaṃ buddho bhagavān urubilvāyāṃ viharati nadyā nairañjanāyās tīre bodhimūle acirābhisaṃbuddho vimuktiprītisukhapratisaṃvedī saptāham ekaparyaṅkenātināmayati;
V03vinv171u:3534: tat syāt trapuṣabhallikayor vaṇijor dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya;
V03vinv171u:3535: yanv ahaṃ svayam evautsukyam āpadayeya yaduta bhagavataḥ piṇḍapātapradānasya hetor iti;
V03vinv171u:3536: atha sā devatā sarvaṃ karvaṭakam udāreṇāvabhāsena sphāritvā trapuṣabhallikau vaṇijāv idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:3537: vaṇijau vaṇijau ayaṃ buddho bhagavān uribilvāyāṃ viharati nadyā nairañjanāyās tīre bodhimūle acirābhisaṃbuddho vimuktiprītisukhapratisaṃvedī;
V03vinv171u:3541: tad yuvayor bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya;
V03vinv171u:3546: yatredānīṃ devatā api tasya bhagavata autsukyam āpadyante yaduta piṇḍapātapratipādanahetoḥ;
V03vinv171u:3547: iti viditvā prabhūtaṃ madhu ca manthāś ca ādāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntau;
V03vinv171u:3548: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthātām;
V03vinv171u:3550: ihāvābhyāṃ bhadanta bhagavantam uddiśya prabhūtaṃ madhu ca manthāś ca ānītāḥ;
V03vinv171u:3551: tān bhagavān pratigṛhṇātv anukampām upādāya iti;
V03vinv171u:3553: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ pāṇau piṇḍapātaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāṃ,
V03vinv171u:3555: yanv ahaṃ samanvāhareyam kutra pūrvakaiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ piṇḍapātaḥ pratigṛhīto hitāya prāṇinām iti;
V03vinv171u:3557: pātre bhadanta pūrvakaiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ piṇḍapātaḥ pratigṛhīto hitāya prāṇinām iti;
V03vinv171u:3558: bhagavato 'pi samanvāhṛtya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate pātre pūrvakaiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ piṇḍapātaḥ pratigṛhīto hitāya prāṇinām iti;
V03vinv171u:3560_0: atha catvāro mahārājā bhagavataḥ pātreṇa pātrakāryam utpannam iti viditvā anyatamasmāt
V03vinv171u:3560_1: pāṣāṇaparvatāc catvāri śailamayāni pātrāṇy amanuṣyakṛtāny amanuṣyaniṣṭhitāny acchāni
V03vinv171u:3562: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte tasthuḥ;
V03vinv171u:3563: ekāntasthitāś catvāro mahārājā bhagavantam idam avocan:
V03vinv171u:3564_0: iha asmābhir bhadanta bhagavataḥ pātreṇa pātrakāryam utpannaṃ viditvā anyatamamāt
V03vinv171u:3564_1: pāṣāṇaparvatāc catvāri śailamayāni pātrāṇy amanuṣyakṛtāny amanuṣyaniṣṭhitāni acchāni
V03vinv171u:3565: tāni bhagavān pratigṛhṇātv anukampām upādāya iti;
V03vinv171u:3567: saced aham ekasya mahārājasyāntikād ekaṃ pātraṃ pratigrahīṣyāmi,
V03vinv171u:3569: dvayor bhaviṣyati cetaso 'nyathātvam; sacet trayāṇām ekasya bhaviṣyati cetaso (SBV I 124)
V03vinv171u:3571: yanv ahaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānām antikāc catvāri pātrāṇi pratigṛhya ekaṃ pātram adhimucyeyam iti;
V03vinv171u:3572: atha bhagavāṃś caturṇāṃ mahārājānām antikāc catvāri patrāṇi pratigṛhya ekaṃ pātram adhimuktavān iti;
V03vinv171u:3573: tatra bhagavatā trapuṣabhallikayor vaṇijor antikāt piṇḍapātaḥ pratigṛhīto hitāya prāṇinām iti;
V03vinv171u:3574: tatra bhagavān trapuṣabhallikau vaṇijāv idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:3575: etau yuvāṃ vaṇijau buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchatām;
V03vinv171u:3577: yo 'py asau bhaviṣyaty anāgate 'dhvani saṅgho nāma tam api śaraṇaṃ gacchatām;
V03vinv171u:3578: etāv āvāṃ bhadanta buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāvah,
V03vinv171u:3580: yo 'py asau bhaviṣyaty anāgate 'dhvani saṅgho nāma tam api śaraṇaṃ gacchāvaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3581: atha bhagavāṃs trapuṣbhallikayor vaṇijos tad dānam anayā abhyanumodanayā abhyanumodate
V03vinv171u:3583: sukhārthaṃ dīyate dānaṃ tat sukhāya bhaviṣyati //
V03vinv171u:3584: sukho vipākaḥ puṇyānām abhiprāyaḥ ca siddhyati /
V03vinv171u:3585: kṣipraṃ ca paramāṃ śāntiṃ nirvṛtiṃ cādhigacchati //
V03vinv171u:3587: na śaknuvanty antarāyaṃ kṛtapuṇyasya kartu vai //
V03vinv171u:3588: saced hi sa vyāyamate āryaprajñayā tyāgavān /
V03vinv171u:3590: atha trapuṣabhallikau vaṇijau bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandya anumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntau (SBV I 125)
V03vinv171u:3592: The Buddha's ailment, and Māra's mischief again
V03vinv171u:3593: atha bhagavān trapuṣabhallikayor vaṇijor antikāt piṇḍapātam ādāya yena nadī nairañjanā tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3594: upasaṅkramya nadyā nairañjanāyās tire niṣadya bhaktakṛtyam akārṣīt;
V03vinv171u:3598: atha māraḥ pāpīyān bhagavato vātābādhikaṃ glānyam utpannaṃ viditvā,
V03vinv171u:3599: yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ; upasaṅkramya bhagavantam idam avocat: parinirvātu bhagavān,
V03vinv171u:3600: parinirvāṇakālasamaya iti; atha bhagavata etad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:3601: māro batāyaṃ pāpīyān upasaṅkrānto yaduta vyākṣepakarmaṇi; iti viditvā māraṃ pāpīyāṃsam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:3603: yāvan na me śrāvakāḥ paṇḍitā bhaviṣyanti vyaktā medhāvinaḥ,
V03vinv171u:3604: alam utpannotpannānāṃ parapravādakānāṃ saha dharmeṇa nigrahītāraḥ alaṃ svasya vādasya paryavadāpayitāraḥ bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇyaḥ upāsakā upāsikāḥ,
V03vinv171u:3605: vaistārikaṃ ca me brahmacaryaṃ bhaviṣyati bāhujanyaṃ pṛthubhūtaṃ yāvad devamanuṣyebhaḥ samyaksuprakāśitam iti;
V03vinv171u:3607: na parinirvāsyati bata śramaṇo gautamaḥ; iti viditvā duḥkhī durmanā vipratīsārī tatraivāntarhitaḥ
V03vinv171u:3610: atha śakro devendro bhagavato vātābādhikaṃ glānyam utpannaṃ viditvā,
V03vinv171u:3611: yasyā jambvā nāmnā jambūdvīpaḥ prajñāyate tasya nātidūre mahad dharītakīvanam,
V03vinv171u:3612: tato varṇagandharasopetā harītakīr ādāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3613: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt:
V03vinv171u:3614: ekāntasthitaḥ śakro devendro bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:3615_0: iha mayā bhadanta bhagavato vātābādhikaṃ glānyam utpannaṃ viditvā yasyā jambvā nāmnā
V03vinv171u:3615_1: jambūdvīpaḥ prajñāyate tasya nātidūre mahad dharītakīvanaṃ tato mayā varṇagandharasopetā (SBV I 126)
V03vinv171u:3623: tena bhagavataḥ kṣemaṇīyataraṃ cābhūd yāpanīyataraṃ ca
V03vinv171u:3626: atha bhagavān yathāsukhaṃ ramyaṃ bodhimūle vihṛtya,
V03vinv171u:3628: upasaṅkramya anyatarad vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇaḥ paryaṅkam ābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtim upasthāpya;
V03vinv171u:3629: tena khalu samayena mucilindasya nāgarājasya bhavane sāptāhika akālameghaḥ samupāgataḥ;
V03vinv171u:3630: atha mucilindo nāgarājaḥ sāptāhikam akālameghaṃ samupāgataṃ viditvā bhavanād abhyudgamya saptakṛtvaḥ kāye kāyaṃ veṣṭayitvā,
V03vinv171u:3632: mā [A_389a] bhagavata imaṃ saptāhaṃ śītaṃ bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv171u:3633: mā uṣṇaṃ mā daṃśamaśakavātātapasarīsṛpasaṃsparśāḥ kāyaṃ paritāpayiṣyanti;
V03vinv171u:3634_0: mucilindo nāgarājo taṃ vigataṃ sāptāhikaṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ kāyena kāyam udveṣṭya
V03vinv171u:3634_1: aṅgadakuṇḍalavicitramālyābharaṇānulepano bhūtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya
V03vinv171u:3635: mā bhagavata imaṃ saptāhaṃ śītam abhūt,
V03vinv171u:3638: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv171u:3642: asmimānasya yo vinaya etad vai paramaṃ sukham // (SBV I 127)
V03vinv171u:3645: atha bhagavān yathābhiramyaṃ mucilindasya nāgarājasya bhavane vihṛtya,
V03vinv171u:3646: yena bodhimūlaṃ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ; upasaṅkramya prajñapta eva tṛṇasaṃstarake niṣaṇṇaḥ,
V03vinv171u:3647: paryaṅkam ābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtim upasthāpya saptāham ekaparyaṅkenātināmayati,
V03vinv171u:3648: idam evaṃ dvādaśāṅgaṃ pratītyasamutpādam anulomapratilomaṃ vyavalokayan,
V03vinv171u:3662: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati;
V03vinv171u:3663: yaduta asminn asati idaṃ na bhavati;
V03vinv171u:3676: evam asya kevalasya mahataḥ duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati
V03vinv171u:3677: atha bhagavāṃs tasyaiva saptāhasyātyayāt tasmāt samādher vyutthāya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthā bhāṣate
V03vinv171u:3707: adhigato me dharmo gambhīro gambhīrāvabhāso durdṛśo duravabodhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3714: yanv aham ekākī araṇye pravaṇe dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārayogam anuyukto vihareyam iti;
V03vinv171u:3720: yatredānīṃ kadācit karhicit tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā (SBV I 129)
V03vinv171u:3722: tadyathā udumbarapuṣpam; tasya cādya bhagavata alpotsukavihāratāyāṃ cittaṃ krāmati,
V03vinv171u:3723: na dharmadeśanāyām; yanv aham enaṃ gatvā adhyeśayeyam; atha brahmā sabhāpatis,
V03vinv171u:3724: tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃmiñjitaṃ vā bāhuṃ prasārayet,
V03vinv171u:3726: evam eva brahmā sabhāpatir brahmaloke antarhitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3728: atha brahmā sabhāpatis tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv171u:3734: kṛcchreṇa me adhigato 'khilo brahman pradālya vai /
V03vinv171u:3747: ye 'śravaṇāt saddharmasya parihīyante; tadyathā bhadanta utpalāni vā,
V03vinv171u:3754: evam eva santi bhadanta satvā loke jātā,
V03vinv171u:3765: yac cāham svayam eva buddhacakṣuṣā (SBV I 130)
V03vinv171u:3767: atha bhagavān svayam eva buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayati;
V03vinv171u:3768: adrākṣīd bhagavān svayam eva buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayan santi satvā loke jātā,
V03vinv171u:3777: dṛṣṭvā ca punar asya satveṣu mahākaruṇā 'vakrāntā;
V03vinv171u:3778: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate
V03vinv171u:3783: atha brahmaṇaḥ sabhāpater etad abhavat: deśayiṣyati bata bhagavān dharmaṃ,
V03vinv171u:3785: iti viditvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudita udagraprītisaumanasyajāto bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraivāntarhitaḥ
V03vinv171u:3789: kasya nv ahaṃ tatprathamato dharmaṃ deśayeyam iti;
V03vinv171u:3791: yanv aham ārāḍasya kālāmasya tatprathamato dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
V03vinv171u:3792: yo māṃ pūrvācārya eva san paramayā mānanayā mānitavān,
V03vinv171u:3794: parameṣu ca pratyayeṣv āttamanāś cābhūd abhirāddhaś ca; devatā bhagavata ārocayanti:
V03vinv171u:3800: ārāḍasya kālāmasya kālakriyāyā; sumahatī bateyaṃ jyānir ārāḍasya kālāmasya kālakriyāyā,
V03vinv171u:3801: ya imaṃ dharmavinayaṃ nāśrauṣīt; saced aśroṣyad ajñāsyat sa imaṃ dharmavinayam iti; (SBV I 131)
V03vinv171u:3802: atha bhagavata etad abhavat: kasya nv chaṃ tatprathamato dharmaṃ deśayeyam iti
V03vinv171u:3805: atha bhagavata etad abhavat; yanv aham udrakasya rāmaputrasya tatprathamato dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
V03vinv171u:3806: yo māṃ pūrvācārya eva san paramayā mānanayā mānitavān,
V03vinv171u:3815: mahatī bateyaṃ jyānir udrakasya rāmaputrasya kālakriyāyā;
V03vinv171u:3816: sumahatī bateyaṃ jyānir udrakasya rāmaputrasya kālakriyāyā,
V03vinv171u:3818: saced imaṃ dharmavinayam aśroṣyad ajñāsyat sa imaṃ dharmavinayam iti
V03vinv171u:3822: kasya nv ahaṃ tatprathamato dharmaṃ deśayeyam iti; tasyaitad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:3823: yanv ahaṃ pañcakānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ tatprathamato dharmaṃ deśayeyam iti;
V03vinv171u:3824: ye māṃ pūrvaṃ duḥkhaprahāṇayogam anuyuktaṃ viharantaṃ satkṛtyopatastuḥ premṇā ca gauraveṇa ca;
V03vinv171u:3826: kutra tv etarhi pañcakā bhikṣavo viharanti iti;
V03vinv171u:3827: adrākṣīd bhagavān divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhena atikrāntamānuṣeṇa pañcakān bhikṣūn;
V03vinv171u:3829: dṛṣṭvā ca punar yathābhiramyaṃ bodhimūle vihṛtya yena vārāṇasī kāśīnāṃ nigamas tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ
V03vinv171u:3832: tena khalu samayena upagur ājīvikas tasminn eva [A_390b] mārge adhvapratipanno 'bhūt;
V03vinv171u:3833: adrākṣīd upagur ājīvako bhagavantaṃ pratipannaṃ (SBV I 132)
V03vinv171u:3834: mārge; dṛṣṭvā ca punar evam āha:
V03vinv171u:3840: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthā bhāṣate
V03vinv171u:3841: na me 'sti kaścid ācāryaḥ sadṛśo me na vidyate /
V03vinv171u:3842: eko 'smi loke saṃbuddhaḥ prāptaḥ saṃbodhim uttamām //

V03vinv171u:3858: na hi santaḥ prakāśante viditvā lokaparyāyam /

V03vinv171u:3863: atha bhagavān kāśiṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran vārāṇasīm anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3864: tena khalu samayena pañcakā bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ viharanti ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve;
V03vinv171u:3865: adrākṣuḥ pañcakā bhikṣavo bhagavantaṃ dūrata eva;
V03vinv171u:3868: ayaṃ sa bhavantaḥ śramaṃo gautama āgacchati śaithiliko bāhuliko bahulājīvaḥ prahāṇavibhrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3869: sa etarhy audārikam āhāram āharati odanakulmāṣān;
V03vinv171u:3879_0: yathā yathā bhagavān pañcakān bhikṣūn darśanāyopasaṅkrāmati tathā tathā pañcakā bhikṣavo
V03vinv171u:3879_1: bhagavatas tejaś ca śriyaṃ ca gauravaṃ ca asahamānā utthāyāsanād eke bhagavato 'rthe
V03vinv171u:3880: pādādhiṣṭhānaṃ caikānte upanikṣipanti; eke pratyudgamya cīvarakāṇi pratigṛhṇanti; evaṃ cāhuḥ:
V03vinv171u:3886: iti viditvā prajñapta eva āsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3887: tatrasvit pañcakā bhikṣavo bhagavantam atyarthaṃ nāmavādena gotravādena āyuṣmadvādena samudācaranti;
V03vinv171u:3888: tatra bhagavān pañcakān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma:
V03vinv171u:3889: mā yūyaṃ bhikṣavas tathāgatam [A_391a] atyarthaṃ nāmavādena gotravādena āyuṣmadvādena samudācarata;
V03vinv171u:3890: mā vo 'bhūd dīrgharātram anarthāyāhitāya duḥkhāya; tat kasya hetoḥ?
V03vinv171u:3891: yaḥ kaścid bhikṣavaḥ tathāgatam atyarthaṃ nāmavādena gotravādena āyuṣmadvādena samudācarati;
V03vinv171u:3892: tat tasya bhavati mohapuruṣasya dīrgharātram anarthāya ahitāya duḥkhāya;
V03vinv171u:3895: tayā tāvat tvam āyuṣman gautama pūrvikayā īryayā caryayā duṣkaracaryayā kiñcid adhigatavān uttaraṃ manuṣyadharmād alaṃ āryaviśeṣādhigamaṃ jñānaṃ vā,
V03vinv171u:3898: kutaḥ punar yas tvam etarhi śaithiliko bahulājīvaḥ prahāṇavibhrāntaḥ sa tvam etarhy audārikaṃ āhāram āharasy odanakulmāṣān;
V03vinv171u:3901: nanu yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ paśyatha tathāgatasya pūrveṇāparaṃ mukhasya vā viprasannatvam,
V03vinv171u:3903: ta evam ūhuḥ: evam etad āyuṣman gautama
V03vinv171u:3906: tatra bhagavān pañcakān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma :
V03vinv171u:3907: dvāv imau bhikṣavo 'ntau pravrajitena na sevitavyau,
V03vinv171u:3911: yaś ca kāmeṣu kāmasukhālayānuyogo hīno grāmyaḥ prākṛtaḥ pārthagjanikaḥ;
V03vinv171u:3913: ity etāv ubhāv antāv anupagamya asti madhyamā pratipac cakṣuṣkaraṇī jñānakaraṇī upaśamasaṃvartanī abhijñāyaiva saṃbhodhaye nirvāṇāya saṃvartate;
V03vinv171u:3922: aśakad bhagavān pañcakān bhikṣūn anayā saṃjaptyā saṃjñapayitum;
V03vinv171u:3923: dvau ca bhagavān pañcakānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pūrvabhakte avavadati;
V03vinv171u:3926: trīṃś ca bhagavān pañcakānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ paścādbhakte avavadati;
V03vinv171u:3932: tatra bhagavān pañcakān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma: 1)
V03vinv171u:3933: idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam iti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasi kurvataś cakṣur udapādi;
V03vinv171u:3937: iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipat āryasatyam iti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasi kurvataś cakṣur udapādi jñānaṃ vidyā buddhir udapādi;
V03vinv171u:3938: tat khalu duḥkham āryasatyam abhijñayā parijñeyaṃ mayeti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasi kurvataś cakṣur udapādi,
V03vinv171u:3940: tat khalu duḥkhasamudayam āryasatyam abhijñayā prahātavyaṃ mayeti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam [A_391b] ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasi kurvataś cakṣur udapādi,
V03vinv171u:3942: tat khalu duḥkhanirodham āryasatyam abhijñayā sākṣātkartavyaṃ mayeti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasi kurvataś cakṣur udapādi,
V03vinv171u:3944: tat khalu duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam abhijñayā bhāvayitavyaṃ mayeti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasi kurvataś cakṣur udapādi,
V03vinv171u:3946: tat khalu duḥkham āryasatyam abhijñāyā parijñātaṃ mayeti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasi kurvataś cakṣur udapādi,
V03vinv171u:3948: tat khalu duḥkhasamudayam āryasatyam abhijñayā prahīṇaṃ mayeti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasi kurvataś cakṣur udapādi,
V03vinv171u:3950: tat khalu duḥkhanirodham āryasatyam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtaṃ mayeti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu yoniśo manasi kurvataś cakṣur udapādi,
V03vinv171u:3952: tat khalu duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam abhijñayā bhāvitaṃ mayeti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasi kurvataś cakṣur udapādi,
V03vinv171u:3953: jñānaṃ vidyā buddhir udapādi; yāvac ca (SBV I 136)
V03vinv171u:3954: mama bhikṣava eṣu caturṣv āryasatyeṣv evaṃ triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ na cakṣur udapādi,
V03vinv171u:3955: na jñānaṃ [na] vidyā na buddhir udapādi,
V03vinv171u:3956: na tāvad aham asmād bhikṣavaḥ sadevakāl lokāt,
V03vinv171u:3959: saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāyā mukto nisṛto visaṃyukto vipramukto viparyāsāpagatena cetasā bahulaṃ vyāhārṣam;
V03vinv171u:3960: na tāvad ahaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddho 'smīty adhyajñāsiṣam;
V03vinv171u:3961: yataś ca mama bhikṣava eṣu caturṣv āryasatyeṣv evaṃ triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ cakṣur udapādi,
V03vinv171u:3963: tato 'ham asmāt sadevakāl lokāt samārakāt sabrahmakāt,
V03vinv171u:3964: saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāyā mukto nisṛto visaṃyukto vipramukto viparyāsāpagatena cetasā bahulaṃ vyāhārṣam;
V03vinv171u:3968: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe āyuṣmata ājñātākauṇḍinyasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam,

V03vinv171u:3971: ājñātaḥ bhagavann ājñātaḥ; ājñātas te kauṇḍinya dharmaḥ?
V03vinv171u:3973: [ājñāto] āyuṣmatā kauṇḍinyena dharma iti tasmād āyuṣmataḥ kauṇḍinyasya ājñātakauṇḍinya ity adhivacanam;
V03vinv171u:3979: etan mārṣā bhagavatā vārāṇasyām ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmyaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartitam,
V03vinv171u:3980: apravartyaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā (SBV I 137)
V03vinv171u:3981: loke [sahadharmataḥ] bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai arthāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇām iti divyāḥ kāyā abhivardhiṣyante,
V03vinv171u:3983_0: bhaumānāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā antarikṣāvacarā yakṣās [tam anuśrāvayanti] cāturmahārājakāyikā
V03vinv171u:3983_1: devāḥ trāyastriṃśā yāmās tuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino devāḥ; tena kṣaṇena,
V03vinv171u:3989_0: etan mārṣā bhagavatā vārāṇasyaṃ ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve triparivartaṃ dvādaśākāraṃ dharmyaṃ
V03vinv171u:3989_1: dharmacakraṃ pravartitam apravartyaṃ śramaṇena brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā
V03vinv171u:3989_2: brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā punar loke sahadharmataḥ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai
V03vinv171u:3989_3: arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇām iti divyāḥ kāyā abhivardhiṣyante;
