V03vinv171u:3994: The Budda explains the four Noble Truths
V03vinv171u:3995: tatra bhagavān dvir api pañcakān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma:
V03vinv171u:3997: duḥkham āryasatyaṃ, duḥkhasamudayo duḥkhanirodho duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam; 1)
V03vinv171u:4005: yad apīcchan paryeṣamāṇo na labhate tad api duḥkham;
V03vinv171u:4012: yad asyā eva tṛṣṇāyāḥ paunarbhavikyāḥ nandīrāgasahagatāyās tatra tatrābhinandinyā aśeṣaprahāṇaṃ pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho (SBV I 138)
V03vinv171u:4013: vyupaśamaḥ astaṅgamaḥ; tasya sākṣātkriyāyai āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo bhāvayitavyaḥ; 4)
V03vinv171u:4018: samyakkarmāntaḥ; samyagājīvaḥ; samyagvyāyāmaḥ; samyaksmṛtiḥ; samyaksamādhiḥ; so 'pi bhāvayitavyaḥ
V03vinv171u:4019: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe āyuṣmata ājñātakauṇḍinyasyānupādāyāśravebhyaś cittaṃ vimuktam;
V03vinv171u:4020: avaśiṣṭānāṃ tu pañcakānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam;
V03vinv171u:4021: tena khalu samayena eko [loke] arhan bhagavāṃś ca dvitīyaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4022: tatra bhagavān avaśiṣṭān pañcakān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma:
V03vinv171u:4024: rūpaṃ ced bhikṣava ātmā syān na rūpam ābādhāya duḥkhāya saṃvarteta;
V03vinv171u:4025: labhyeta ca rūpasyaivaṃ me rūpaṃ bhavatu,
V03vinv171u:4027: yasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo rūpam anātmā tasmād rūpam ābādhāya duḥkhāya saṃvartate;
V03vinv171u:4028: na ca labhyate rūpasyaivaṃ me bhavatu,
V03vinv171u:4030: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñanaṃ bhikṣavo nātmā;
V03vinv171u:4031: vijñānaṃ cet bhikṣavaḥ ātmā syān na vijñānam ābādhāya [duḥkhāya] saṃvarteta;
V03vinv171u:4032: labhyeta ca vijñānasyaivaṃ me vijñānaṃ bhavatu,
V03vinv171u:4033: evaṃ mā bhūd iti; yasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ vijñānam anātmā,
V03vinv171u:4035: na ca labhyate vijñānasyaivaṃ me vijñanaṃ bhavatu, evaṃ mā bhūd iti
V03vinv171u:4036: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo, rūpaṃ, nityaṃ vā [anityaṃ vā]?
V03vinv171u:4037: anityam idaṃ bhadanta; yat punar anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā tan na vā duḥkham?
V03vinv171u:4040: api nu tac chrutavān āryaśrāvaka ātmata upagacched etan mama,
V03vinv171u:4042: no bhadanta; kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā?
V03vinv171u:4043: anityam idaṃ bhadanta; yat punar anityaṃ [duḥkhaṃ] vā tan, na vā duḥkham?
V03vinv171u:4046: api nu tac chrutavān āryaśrāvaka ātmata upagacched etan mama,
V03vinv171u:4049_0: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo yat kiñcid rūpam atītānāgatapratyutpannam adhyātmaṃ vā bāhyaṃ
V03vinv171u:4049_1: vā audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā yad vā dūre yad vā antike tat sarvaṃ naitan mama,
V03vinv171u:4053_0: [evaṃ yā kācid vedanā yā kācit saṃjñā ye kecit saṃskārā yat kiṃcid vijñānam atītānāgatapratyutpannam
V03vinv171u:4053_1: ādhyātmaṃ vā bāhyaṃ vā audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā yad vā dūre yad
V03vinv171u:4057: ] yataś ca bhikṣavaḥ śrutavān āryaśrāvaka imāṃ pañca upādānaskandhān naivātmato nātmīyataḥ samanupaśyati;
V03vinv171u:4058: sa evaṃ samanupaśyan na kiñcil loka upādatte;
V03vinv171u:4059: anupādadāno na paritasyati aparitasya ātmaiva parinirvāti;
V03vinv171u:4064: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyaṃāṇe avaśiṣṭanāṃ pañcakānāṃ bhikṣūṇām anupādāyāśravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni;
V03vinv171u:4068: The conversin of Yaśas, son of Agrakulika
V03vinv171u:4069: tatra bhagavān vārāṇasyāṃ viharati nadyā vārakāyaṣ tīre;
V03vinv171u:4070: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ yaśā agrakulikaputraḥ prativasati;
V03vinv171u:4071: divādivase strīmayena tūryeṇa krīḍitvā ramitvā paricārya śrāntakāyaḥ klāntakāyaḥ prābhārakāyaḥ pratiyaty eva middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4072: tā api striyaḥ śrāntakāyāḥ klāntakāyāḥ prāgbhārakāyāḥ pratiyaty eva middham avakrāntāḥ;
V03vinv171u:4073: adrākṣīd yaśā agrakulikasya putraḥ sarātram eva suptapratibuddhaḥ sarvās tā striyo vilālikā vinagnikā vikeśikā vikṣiptabhujāḥ kāny api kāny api vipralapantyaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4074: dṛṣṭvā ca punar asya sve 'ntaḥpure śmaśānasaṃjñā avakrāntā;
V03vinv171u:4075: atha yaśā agrakulikaputro mahāśayanād avatīrya śatasahasraṃ maṇipādukāyugaṃ prāvṛtya (SBV I 140)
V03vinv171u:4080: atha yaśā agrakulikaputro yena niveśanadvāraṃ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4085: atha yaśā agrakulikaputro yena nagaradvāraṃ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4090: atha yaśā agrakulikaputro yena nadī vārakā tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4091: tena khalu samayena bhagavān nadyā vārakāyās tīre bahir vihārasyābhyavakāśe caṅkrame caṅkramyate yadbhūyasā yaśasam evāgrakulikaputram āgamayamānaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4092: adrākṣīt yaśā agrakulikaputro bhagavantaṃ nadyā vārakāyās tīre caṅkrame caṅkramyamāṇam dūrata eva;
V03vinv171u:4095: atha bhagavān yaśasam agrakulikaputram idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:4099: atha yaśā agrakulikaputraḥ śatasahasraṃ maṇipādukāyugaṃ nadyā vārakāyās tīre ujjhitvā,
V03vinv171u:4100: nadīṃ vārakāṃ pratyuttīrya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4101: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt;
V03vinv171u:4102: atha bhagavān yaśasam agrakulikaputram ādāya yena svo vihāras tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4104: niṣadya bhagavān yaśasam agrakulikaputraṃ dharmayayā kathayā sandarśayati [samādāpayati] samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
V03vinv171u:4105: yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvakālakaraṇīyā dharmyā kathā tadyathā dānakathā,
V03vinv171u:4109: yadā cainaṃ bhagavān adrākṣīd dhṛṣṭacittaṃ kalyacittaṃ muditacittaṃ vinivaraṇacittaṃ bhavyaṃ pratibalaṃ sāmutkarṣikīṃ dharmadeśanām ājñātuṃ, tadā (SBV I 141)
V03vinv171u:4111: tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāni vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati;
V03vinv171u:4112: tadyathā śuddhaṃ vastram apagatakālakaṃ rañjanopagaṃ raṅge prakṣiptaṃ samyag eva raṅgaṃ pratigṛhṇāti;
V03vinv171u:4113: evam eva yaśā agrakulikaputras tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇaś catvāry āryasatyāny abhisameti;
V03vinv171u:4115_0: atha yaśā agrakulikaputro dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā
V03vinv171u:4115_1: tīrṇakāṅkṣas tīrṇavicikitso 'parapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuś śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ
V03vinv171u:4115_2: utthāyāsanād ekāṃśam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:4118: eṣo 'haṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca;
V03vinv171u:4119: upāsakaṃ ca māṃ dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇāgatam abhiprasannaṃ
V03vinv171u:4121: Yaśas's father becomes a lay-disciple and Yaśas an Arhat
V03vinv171u:4122: adrākṣīd anyatamāvaruddhikā sarātram eva suptapratibuddhā yaśāḥ kumāro mahāśayane na dṛśyate iti;
V03vinv171u:4123: dṛṣṭvā ca punar yenāgrakuliko gṛhapatis tenopasaṃkrāntā;
V03vinv171u:4125: yat khalv ārya jānīyā yaśāḥ kumāraḥ sve mahāśayane na dṛśyate [A_393b] iti;
V03vinv171u:4127: māhaiva kumāraś corair vā dhūrtair vā svāpateyakāraṇāt bahir niṣkāsito bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv171u:4129: svayam eva pradīpikāhastaiḥ puruṣaiḥ sārdhaṃ yena nadī vārakā tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4130: adrākṣīd agrakuliko gṛhapatir nadyā vārakāyās tīre śatasahasraṃ maṇipādukāyugam ujjhitam;
V03vinv171u:4133: kumāraś corair vā dhūrtair vā niṣkāsitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4134: tathā hi nadyā vārakāyās tīre śatasahasraṃ maṇipādukāyugam ujjhitam;
V03vinv171u:4135: māhaiva kumāro 'nena tīrthena nadīṃ vārakām uttīrṇo bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv171u:4136: tathā [hi] śatasāhasraṃ maṇipādukāyugaṃ nadyā vārakāyās tīre ujjhitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4137: iti viditvā tenaiva tīrthena nadīṃ vārakām uttīrya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4138: adrākṣīd bhagavān agrakulikaṃ gṛhapatim dūrād eva;
V03vinv171u:4140: yanv ahaṃ tadrūpān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān abhisaṃskuryāṃ yathāgrakuliko gṛhapatir asminn evāsane niṣaṇṇo yaśasaṃ kumāraṃ na paśyed iti;
V03vinv171u:4141: atha bhagavān tadrūpān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān abhisaṃskaroti yathāyrakuliko gṛhapatis tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇo yaśasaṃ kumāraṃ na paśyati;
V03vinv171u:4145: tena hi gṛhapate niṣīda sthānam etad vidyate yad asminn evāsane niṣaṇṇo yaśasaṃ kumāraṃ drakṣyasīti;
V03vinv171u:4147: nūnaṃ ca bhagavatā yaśāḥ kumāro dṛṣṭo bhaviṣyati; tathāhi bhagavān evam āha,
V03vinv171u:4148: tena hi gṛhapate niṣīda sthānam etad vidyate yad asminn evāsane niṣaṇṇo yaśasaṃ kumāraṃ drakṣyasi;
V03vinv171u:4149: iti viditvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudita udagraprītisaumanasyajāto bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte nyaṣīdat;
V03vinv171u:4150: ekānte niṣaṇṇam agrakulikaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmayayā kathayā sandarśayati,
V03vinv171u:4152: samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati; yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvakālakaraṇīyā dharmyā kathā,
V03vinv171u:4153: tadyathā dānakathā śīlakathā svargakathā kāmānām āsvādādīnavasaṃkleśavyavadānanaiṣkramyapraviveka anusaṃsavyavadānapakṣyān dharmān vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati;
V03vinv171u:4154: yadā cainaṃ bhagavān adrākṣīd dhṛṣṭacittaṃ kalyacittaṃ muditacittaṃ vinivaraṇacittaṃ bhavyaṃ pratibalaṃ sāmutkarṣikīṃ dharmadeśanām ājñātuṃ,
V03vinv171u:4155: tadā yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sāmutkarṣikī dharmadeśanā tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ nirodhaṃ mārgaṃ catvāry āryasatyāni vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati;
V03vinv171u:4156: tadyathā śuddhaṃ vastram apagatakālakam rañjanopagaṃ raṅge prakṣiptaṃ samyag eva raṅgaṃ (SBV I 143)
V03vinv171u:4158: evam evāgrakuliko gṛhapatis tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇaś catvāry āryasatyāny [A_394a] abhisameti;
V03vinv171u:4160: tasmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe agrakulikasya gṛhapater virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam;
V03vinv171u:4162: atha bhagavāṃṣ tān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv171u:4166: sa brāhmaṇaḥ sa śramaṇaḥ sa bhikṣuḥ //
V03vinv171u:4167: tena khalu samayena ṣaṭ loke arhantaḥ,
V03vinv171u:4169: adrākṣīd agrakuliko gṛhapatir yaśasaṃ kumāraṃ tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇam;
V03vinv171u:4170: dṛṣṭvā ca punar yaśasaṃ kumāram idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:4171: ehi kumāra niveśanaṃ gamiṣyāvo mātā te śrāntakāyā klāntakāyā paridevitavatīti;
V03vinv171u:4172: atha bhagavān agrakulikaṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:4173: kiṃ manyase gṛhapate yenāśaikṣeṇa jñānena aśaikṣeṇa darśanena catvāry āryasatyāny abhisamitāni,
V03vinv171u:4178: api nu sa punar api gṛhī agāram adhyāvaseta?
V03vinv171u:4181: yathā khalu tvayā gṛhapate śaikṣeṇa jñānena śaikṣeṇa darśanena catvāry āryasatyāny abhisamitāni,
V03vinv171u:4185: mārgaḥ; evam eva kumāreṇa aśaikṣeṇa jñānena aśaikṣeṇa darśanena catvāry āryasatyāny abhisamitāni,
V03vinv171u:4190: lābhā bhadanta yaśasā kumāreṇa sulabdhā yena aśaikṣenā jñānena aśaikṣeṇa darśanena catvāry āryasatyāny abhisamitāni,
V03vinv171u:4195: sādhu bhagavān yaśasā kumāreṇa paścācchramaṇena yenāgrakulikas tenopasaṅkrāmed anukampām upādāya;
V03vinv171u:4198: viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ
V03vinv171u:4200: Yaśa's mother and wife become lay-disciples
V03vinv171u:4201: atha bhagavāṃs tasyā eva rātrer atyayāt nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya āyuṣmatā yaśasā paścācchrameṇena yenāgrakulikasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4202: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmato yaśaso mahallikā purāṇadvitīyā ca madhyamāyāṃ dvāraśālāyām āsthātāṃ yadbhūyasā bhagavantam āgamayamāne;
V03vinv171u:4203: adrāṣṭām āyuṣmato yaśaso mahallikā purāṇadvitīyā ca bhagavantam dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhagavato 'rthe āsanaṃ prajñāpayataḥ;
V03vinv171u:4209: athāyuṣmato yaśaso mahallikā purāṇadvitīyā ca bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇe;
V03vinv171u:4210: ekānte niṣaṇṇām āyuṣmato yaśaso mahallikāṃ purāṇadvitīyāṃ ca bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā sandarśayati,
V03vinv171u:4213: saṃpraharṣayati; yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvakālakaraṇīyā dharmyā kathā,
V03vinv171u:4214: tadyathā dānakathā śīlakathā svargakathā kāmānām āsvādādīnavasaṅkleśavyavadānanaiṣkramyapraviveka anuśaṃsavyavadānapakṣyān dharmān vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati;
V03vinv171u:4215: yadā caite bhagavān adrākṣīd dhṛṣṭacitte kalyacitte muditacitte vinivaraṇacitte bhavye pratibale sāmutkarṣikīṃ dharmadeśanām ājñātum,
V03vinv171u:4216: tadā yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sāmutkarṣikī dharmadeśanā,
V03vinv171u:4217: tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāni,
V03vinv171u:4219: tadyathā śuddhaṃ vastram apagatakālakaṃ rañjanopagaṃ raṅge prakṣiptaṃ samyag eva raṅgaṃ pratigṛhṇāti,
V03vinv171u:4220: evam eva āyuṣmato yaśaso mahallikā purāṇadvitīyā ca tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇe catvāry āryastyāny abhisamitavatyau;
V03vinv171u:4222: atha āyuṣmato yaśaso mahallikā purāṇadvitīyā ca dṛṣṭadharme prāptadharme viditadharme paryavagāḍhaharme (SBV I 145)
V03vinv171u:4223_0: tīrṇakāṅkṣe tīrṇavicikitse aparapratyaye anayaneye śāstuś śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāpte
V03vinv171u:4223_1: utthāyāsanād ekāṃśam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam
V03vinv171u:4225: abhikrānte; ete āvāṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāvo,
V03vinv171u:4227: upāsike ca āvāṃ dhārayādyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopete śaraṇāgate abhiprasanne;
V03vinv171u:4228: tena hi bhadanta ihaiva bhaktakṛtyaṃ kriyatām;
V03vinv171u:4229: adhivāsayati bhagavān āyuṣmato yaśaso mahallikāyāḥ purāṇadvitīyāyāś ca tūṣṇīṃbhāvena;
V03vinv171u:4230: atha āyuṣmato yaśaso mahallikā purāṇadvitīyā ca bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvena adhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavantaṃ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ śucipraṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ santarpayataḥ,
V03vinv171u:4232_0: anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ santarpya saṃpravārya
V03vinv171u:4232_1: bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ nīcataram āsanaṃ gṛhītvā
V03vinv171u:4233: atha bhagavān āyuṣmato yaśaso mahallikāṃ purāṇadvitīyāṃ ca dharmyayā kathayā sandarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4236: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti:
V03vinv171u:4237: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā yaśasā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena antaḥpuramadhyagatasya svasminn antaḥpure śmaśānasaṃjñā utpannā;
V03vinv171u:4238: sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitena ca bhagavato 'ntike arhatvaṃ ca sākṣātkṛtam;
V03vinv171u:4239: yaśasā evaṃ bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni;
V03vinv171u:4241: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
V03vinv171u:4245: api tu upātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante,
V03vinv171u:4247: na pranaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
V03vinv171u:4248: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālam ca phalanti khalu dehinām // (SBV I 146)
V03vinv171u:4251: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ nātidūre riṣiḥ prativasati sma maitryātmakaḥ kāruṇikaḥ sarvasatvahitavatsalaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4255: yāvat paśyati taṃ mṛtakuṇapaṃ vilīnībhūtaṃ vyādhmātakaṃ ca;
V03vinv171u:4260: yo 'sau riṣir eṣa evāsau yaśāḥ kumāraḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv171u:4261: yad anena tatra vairāgyam utpāditam tenaitarhi antaḥpuramadhyagatasya pratyayo dattaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4262: iti hi bhikṣavasḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4264: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇi apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4267: Yaśas's four brothers are converted and become Arhats
V03vinv171u:4268: aśrauṣur vārāṇasyāṃ dvitīya agrakulokaputras tṛtīyaś caturthaḥ pañcama agrakulikaputraḥ,
V03vinv171u:4272: yaśā agrakulikaputraḥ keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajita iti;
V03vinv171u:4273: śrutvā ca punar eṣām etad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:4276: yatredānīṃ yaśā agrakulikaputras tāvat taruṇaḥ tāvat sukhaiṣī keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ; yannu (SBV I 147)
V03vinv171u:4277: vayam api keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajemeti;
V03vinv171u:4278: atha dvitīyo 'grakulikaputras tṛtīyaś caturthaḥ pañcamo 'grakulikaputraḥ pūrṇo,
V03vinv171u:4283: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte tasthuḥ;
V03vinv171u:4284: ekāntasthitā dvitīyo 'grakulikaputras tṛtīyaś caturthaḥ pañcamaḥ agrakulikaputraḥ pūrṇo,
V03vinv171u:4289: labhemahi vayaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam;
V03vinv171u:4291: labdhavantas ta āyuṣmantaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāṃ upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam;
V03vinv171u:4292: evaṃ pravrajitā ekākino vyapakṛṣṭā apramattā ātāpinaḥ prahitātmāno vyahārṣuḥ;
V03vinv171u:4293_0: ekākino vyapakṛṣṭā apramattā ātāpinaḥ prahitātmāno viharanto yadarthaṃ kulaputrāḥ
V03vinv171u:4293_1: keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva [A_395b] śraddhayā agārād
V03vinv171u:4293_2: anagārikāṃ pravrajanti tad anuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānam dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam
V03vinv171u:4293_3: abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvā upasaṃpadya pravedayante: kṣīnā no jātir,
V03vinv171u:4296: nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānīma iti ājñātavanta āyuṣmanto 'rhanto babhūvuḥ suvimuktacittāḥ;
V03vinv171u:4300: The conversion of fifty young men
V03vinv171u:4310: subāhuḥ keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitā iti;
V03vinv171u:4311: śrutvā ca punar eṣām etad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:4312: na batāvaro buddho bhasviṣyati; nāvaraṃ dharmākhyānam; yatredānīṃ prathamo 'grakulikaputro,
V03vinv171u:4313: dvitīyo yāvat purṇo vimalo gavāṃpatiḥ subāhur tāvat taruṇās tāvat sukhaiṣiṇaḥ keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ (SBV I 148)
V03vinv171u:4315: yannu vayam api keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣayāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajemeti;
V03vinv171u:4316: atha pañcāśad utsadotsadā grāmikadārakā vārāṇasyāṃ niṣkramya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv171u:4317: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte tasthuḥ;
V03vinv171u:4318: ekāntasthitāḥ pañcāśad utsadotsadā grāmikadārakā bhagavantam idam avocan:
V03vinv171u:4319: labhemahi vayaṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāṃ upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam;
V03vinv171u:4321: labdhavantas ta āyuṣmantas svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāṃ upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam;
V03vinv171u:4322: evaṃpravrajitās te āyuṣmanta ekakino vyapakṛṣṭāḥ apramattā ātāpinaḥ prahitātmāno vyahārṣuḥ;

V03vinv171u:4323_1: keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣayāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ
V03vinv171u:4323_2: pravrajanti tad anuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā

V03vinv171u:4329: The Buddha goes to the village Urubilvā
V03vinv171u:4330: tatra bhagavān vārāṇasyāṃ viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve;
V03vinv171u:4331: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma: mukto 'haṃ,
V03vinv171u:4333: sarvapāśebhyo ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ;
V03vinv171u:4334: yūyam api bhikṣavo muktāḥ sarvapāśebhyo ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ;
V03vinv171u:4335: tato bhikṣavaś cārikāṃ prakramiśyāmo bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇām;
V03vinv171u:4336: mā ca vo dvāv ekena gamiṣyatha;
V03vinv171u:4337: aham api yenorubilvāsenāyanīgrāmakas tena cārikāṃ prakramiṣyāmi;
V03vinv171u:4339: ayaṃ śramaṇo gautamo vārāṇasyāṃ viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve;
V03vinv171u:4341: mukto 'haṃ bhikṣavaḥ sarvapāśebhyo ye ca divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ;
V03vinv171u:4342: yūyam api bhikṣavo muktās sarvapāśebhyo ye ca divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ;
V03vinv171u:4343: yāvad aham api yenorubilvāsenāyanīgrāmakas tena cārikāṃ prakramiṣyāmīti;
V03vinv171u:4346: pāpīyān māṇavakavarṇam ātmānam abhinirmāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4348: amukto muktasaṃjñī san kiṃ mukto 'smīti manyase /
V03vinv171u:4351: māro batāyaṃ pāpīyān upasaṅkrānto yaduta vyākṣepakarmaṇi; iti viditvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv171u:4352: mukto 'ham sarvapāśebhyo ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ /
V03vinv171u:4353: evaṃ jānīhi pāpīyan nihatas tvam ihāntaka //
V03vinv171u:4355: jānāti me śramaṇo gautamaś cetasā cittam;

V03vinv171u:4561: The sermon of the Buddha on the production and passing away by dependence
V03vinv171u:4562: tatra bhagavān rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāram āmantrayate:
V03vinv171u:4563: rūpaṃ mahārāja utpadyate 'pi; vyayate 'pi; tasyotpādo 'pi veditavyaḥ,
V03vinv171u:4565: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ mahārāja utpadyate 'pi;
V03vinv171u:4569: rūpasya mahārāja kulaputra utpādavyayadharmatāṃ viditvā tad rūpaṃ parijānāti;
V03vinv171u:4570: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya mahārāja kulaputra utpādavyayadharmatāṃ viditvā tad vijñānaṃ parijānāti;
V03vinv171u:4574: nābhiniviśati ātmā me iti; vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ mahārāja kulaputra parijānan nopaiti,
V03vinv171u:4578: rūpaṃ mahārāja kulaputra anupāyantam anupādadānam anadhitiṣṭhantam anabhiniviśantam anātmamamāyamānam aprameyam asaṅkhyeyaṃ nirvṛtam iti vadāmi;
V03vinv171u:4579: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārān vijñānaṃ mahārāja kulaputra anupāyantam anupādadānam anadhitiṣṭhantam anabhiniviśamānam anātmamamāyamānam aprameyam asaṅkhyeyaṃ nirvṛtam iti vadāmi;
V03vinv171u:4583: atha ko nv asau bhaviṣyaty ātmā vā satvo jīvo vā jantur vā poṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā mānavo vā kartā vā kārako vā janako vā saṃjanako vā utthāpako vā samutthāpako (SBV I 158)
V03vinv171u:4584: vā vadako vā vedako vā [pratisaṃvedako vā],
V03vinv171u:4588: yas tatra kṛtākṛtānāṃ kalyāṇapāpakānāṃ karmaṇāṃ vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayate;
V03vinv171u:4589: ya imāṃś ca skandhān nikṣipaty anyāṃś ca skandhān pratisaṃdadhāti
V03vinv171u:4591: The sermon of the Buddha on the unreality of the Self
V03vinv171u:4592: atha bhagavān māgadhakānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ cetasā cittam ājñāya bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma;
V03vinv171u:4593: ātmā ātmeti bhikṣavo bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ prajñaptim anupatito na cātrāsty ātmā nātmīyaṃ vā;
V03vinv171u:4598: tān hetūṃs tān pratyayān pratītya satvānāṃ saṃskārasantatiḥ pravartate;
V03vinv171u:4599: saṃskārasantatipratisandhiṃ khalu bhikṣavas tathāgato viditvā satvānāṃ cyutyupapādaṃ prajñāpayati;
V03vinv171u:4600: paśyāmy ahaṃ bhikṣavo divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa satvān;
V03vinv171u:4601: paśyāmi cyavamānān apy upapadyamānān api suvarṇān api,
V03vinv171u:4608: amī bhavantaḥ satvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatā vāṅmanoduścaritena samanvāgatā āryāṇām apavādakāḥ,
V03vinv171u:4609: mithyādṛṣṭayaḥ mithyādṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetos taddhetutatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyante;
V03vinv171u:4610_0: amī vā punar bhavantaḥ satvāḥ kāyasucaritena [A_407b] samanvāgatā vāṅmanassucaritena
V03vinv171u:4610_2: taddhetutatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante;
V03vinv171u:4611: evaṃ cāhaṃ bhikṣavo jānāmy evaṃ paśyāmi;
V03vinv171u:4612_0: na cāham evaṃ vadāmy ayaṃ me ātmā vā satvo vā jīvo vā jantur vā poṣo vā pudgalo vā
V03vinv171u:4612_1: manujo vā mānavo vā kartā vā kārako vā janako vā saṃjanako vā utthāpako vā samutthāpako
V03vinv171u:4612_2: vā vadako vā vedako vā pratisaṃvedako vā,
V03vinv171u:4613: yo na jantur nābhūn na bhaviṣyati,
V03vinv171u:4615: yas tatra kṛtākṛtānāṃ kalyāṇāpāpakānāṃ karmaṇāṃ vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayate;
V03vinv171u:4616: imāṃś ca skandhān nikṣipaty anyāṃś ca skandhān pratisandadhāti,
V03vinv171u:4617: nānyatra dharmasaṅketāt; tatrāyaṃ dharmasaṅketo yadutāsmin satīdaṃ bhavati; (SBV I 159)
V03vinv171u:4630: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati;
V03vinv171u:4644: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati;
V03vinv171u:4652: tatra bhikṣavaḥ kaḥ parinirvṛto nānyatra duḥkhaṃ,
V03vinv171u:4654: [A_408a] tac chītībhūtam; śāntam idaṃ bhikṣavaḥ padaṃ yaduta sarvopadhipratiniḥsargaḥ,
V03vinv171u:4658: tatra bhagavān dvir api rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāram āmantrayate:
V03vinv171u:4659: kiṃ mayase mahārāja rūpaṃ nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā?
V03vinv171u:4660: anityam idaṃ bhadanta; yat punar anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā tan na vā duḥkham?
V03vinv171u:4663: api nu tac chrutavān āryaśrāvaka ātmata upagacched etan mama,
V03vinv171u:4665: no bhadanta; kiṃ mahārāja vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā?
V03vinv171u:4667: yat punar anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā tan na vā duḥkham;
V03vinv171u:4670: api nu tacchrutavān āryaśrāvaka ātmata upagacched etan (SBV I 160)
V03vinv171u:4671: mama, eṣo 'ham asmi, eṣa me ātmeti?
V03vinv171u:4673: tasmāt tarhi te mahārāja yat kiṃcid rūpam atītānāgatapratyutpannam ādhyātmikaṃ vā bāhyaṃ vā odārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā,
V03vinv171u:4676: tat sarvaṃ naitan mama naiṣo 'ham asmi,
V03vinv171u:4677: naiṣa me ātmety evam etad yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā draṣṭavyam;
V03vinv171u:4678: tasmāt tarhi mahārāja yā kācid vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā yat kiṃcid vijñānam atītānāgatapratyutpannam ādhyātmikaṃ vā,
V03vinv171u:4688: naiṣa me ātmety evam etad yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā draṣṭavyam;
V03vinv171u:4689: evaṃdarśī mahārāja śrutavān āryaśrāvakaḥ rūpād api nirvidyate;
V03vinv171u:4690: vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyā saṃskārebhyo vijñānād api nirvidyate;
V03vinv171u:4693: vimuktasya vimuktam eva jñānadarśanaṃ bhavati; kṣīṇā me jātir,
V03vinv171u:4696: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe rājño māgadhasya śreṇyasya bimbisārasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam;
V03vinv171u:4699_0: atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā
V03vinv171u:4699_1: tīrṇakāṅkṣas tīrṇavicikitso 'parapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuś śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāpta
V03vinv171u:4699_2: utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:4700: abhikrānto 'haṃ bhadantābhikrāntaḥ; eṣo 'haṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi,
V03vinv171u:4702: bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca; upāsakaṃ ca māṃ dhārayādyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇāgatam,
V03vinv171u:4705: ahaṃ [A_408b] bhagavantam upasthāsyami yāvajjīvaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅgheneti;
V03vinv171u:4706: adhivāsayati bhagavān rājño māgadhasya śreṇyasya bimbisārasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvena;
V03vinv171u:4707: atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvena adhivāsanāṃ viditvā,
V03vinv171u:4710: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv171u:4711: kiṃ bhadanta rājñā māgadhena śreṇyena bimbisāreṇa saparivāreṇa karma kṛtaṃ,
V03vinv171u:4712: yasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavato 'ntike satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv171u:4714: bhikṣavo rājñā saparivāreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni;
V03vinv171u:4715: rājñā bimbisāreṇa saparivāreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati;
V03vinv171u:4716: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
V03vinv171u:4719: na vāyudhātau api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca
V03vinv171u:4720: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
V03vinv171u:4721: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
V03vinv171u:4723: The story of the king Kṛki
V03vinv171u:4724: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣava atīte 'dhvani aranābhī nāma śāstā loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamayasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv171u:4725: sa sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4726: tasya mahājanakāyena śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā viviktāvakāśe pṛthivīpradeśe mahān stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4727: tena khalu samayena kṛkir nāma rājā cakravartī aṣṭādaśabhir bhaṭabalāgrakoṭibhir upari vihāyasā anusaṃyān tasya stūpasya samīpam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4731: māhaiva me puṇyaparikṣayaḥ syād iti; tasya devatābhir ārocitam:
V03vinv171u:4733: kintv aranābheḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya etasmin pradeśe stūpam;
V03vinv171u:4736: tataḥ kṛkī rājā aṣṭādaśabhir bhaṭabalāgrakoṭibhiḥ sahāvatīrṇo yāvat paśyati stūpam asaṃmṛṣṭam;
V03vinv171u:4737: tena saparivāreṇa saṃmṛjya gandhair mālyair dhūpaiś cūrṇair vādyaiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā pādayor nipatya saparivāreṇa praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam:
V03vinv171u:4738: yan mayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣinīye kārāḥ kṛtāḥ,
V03vinv171u:4739: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena evaṃvidhānām guṇānāṃ lābhī syām; evaṃvidham eva śāstāram ārāgayeyam,
V03vinv171u:4740: mā virāgayeyam iti; kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena,
V03vinv171u:4741: tena [A_409a] samayena kṛkir nāma rājābhūc cakravartī saparivāra eṣa evāsau rājā bimbisāraḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
V03vinv171u:4744: tasya karmaṇo vipākena anekāni kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi divyamānuṣaṃ ca prativiśiṣṭaṃ sukham anubhūtam;
V03vinv171u:4745: yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām iti;
V03vinv171u:4747: yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam evaṃvidham eva śāstāram ārāgayeyam,
V03vinv171u:4748: mā virāgayeyam iti; aham asmi bhikṣavo aranābhinā samyaksaṃbuddhena samasamaṃ samajavaḥ,
V03vinv171u:4752: śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ; iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
V03vinv171u:4754: vyatimiśrāṇāṃ ca vyatimiśraḥ; tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
V03vinv171u:4755: ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ; ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyaṃ
V03vinv171u:4756: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśāyacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv171u:4757: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā urubilvākāśyapena karma kṛtaṃ,
V03vinv171u:4759: nadīgayākāśyapau tu alpakṛcchreṇa vinītāv iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv171u:4760: ebhir eva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehināṃ
V03vinv171u:4762: The story of the three sons of a Gṛhapati
V03vinv171u:4763_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prayājāṃ
V03vinv171u:4763_1: kāśyapo nāma śāstā loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
V03vinv171u:4763_2: sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
V03vinv171u:4764: sa vārāṇasīnagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve;
V03vinv171u:4765: sa sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4766: tasya kṛkinā rājñā sarvagandhakāṣṭhaiś citāṃ citvā śarīraṃ dhyāpitam;
V03vinv171u:4768: tāny asthīni catūratnamaye kumbhe prakṣipya viviktāvakāśe pṛthivīpradeśe śārīraḥ stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ,
V03vinv171u:4770: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyām anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī;
V03vinv171u:4771: tena sadṛśāt kulāt kalatram ānītam; sa (SBV I 163)
V03vinv171u:4773: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kramaśaḥ trayaḥ putrā jātāḥ;
V03vinv171u:4778: tatas taiḥ putrair nīlapītalohitāvadātair vastraiḥ [A_409b] śibikām alaṅkṛtya śmaśānaṃ nītvā dhyāpitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4779: śokavinodanaṃ kṛtvā pituś ca pitṛkāryāṇi dravyavibhāgasañjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv171u:4783: sa nirbandhaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ; tau kathayataḥ:
V03vinv171u:4791: tatas te kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhaysa pūjāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv171u:4793_0: anena kuśalamūlena yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena uttaro nāma māṇavo
V03vinv171u:4793_1: vyākṛtaḥ bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato
V03vinv171u:4794: tasyāvāṃ śāsane pravrajeva viśesaṃ cādhigacchāva iti;
V03vinv171u:4795: tayoḥ praṇidhānaṃ śrutvā sa jyeṣṭho bhrātā pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4797: anena kuślamūlena mamāpy asau śākyamuniḥ pañcabhiḥ prātihāryaśataiḥ vinīyāt,
V03vinv171u:4800: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ yo 'sau jyeṣṭho bhrātā khaṭuṃkaḥ duḥśraddadhānaḥ eṣa evāsau urubilvākāśyapaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4801: yau tau kanīyāṃsau bhrātarau etāv etau nadīgayākāśyapau;
V03vinv171u:4802: tatpraṇidhānavaśād urubilvākāśyapaḥ pañcabhiḥ prātihāryaśatair vinītaḥ nadīgayākāśyapau tu alpakṛcchreṇa vinītau
V03vinv171u:4806: tadā rājagṛhe 'nyatamo gṛhapatiḥ; tasyārāmaḥ puṣpaphalasalilasaṃpannaḥ; sa tatrātyartham (SBV I 164)
V03vinv171u:4808: yāvad bimbisāreṇa bahirnirgatena tad udyānaṃ dṛṣṭam;
V03vinv171u:4815: na codyānaṃ dadyām iti; bimbisāraḥ kumāraḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:4816: gṛhapate smartavyaṃ te vākyam; yadā ahaṃ rājā bhaviṣyāmi,
V03vinv171u:4817: tadā svayam eva grahīṣyāmīti; sa kathayati: yadā tvaṃ rājā bhaviṣyasi,
V03vinv171u:4819: bimbisāraḥ kumāro hum iti kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4820: yāvad apareṇa samayena mahāpadmo rājā kālagataḥ;
V03vinv171u:4821: bimbisāraḥ kumāro rājye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ tena tad udyānaṃ haṭhāt gṛhītam;
V03vinv171u:4827: yāvad rājā bimbisāraḥ saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye puṣpiteṣu pādapeṣv antaḥpurasahīyas tad udyānaṃ nirgataḥ;
V03vinv171u:4828: sa tatra niṣpuruṣeṇa antaḥpurajanena sārdhaṃ ratikrīḍāṃ pratyanubhūya middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4830: ekā strī khaḍgaṃ rājña ārakṣikā sthāpitā ..................................................... [A_410a] rājñaḥ puṇyānubhāvāt kalandakā nāma pakṣiṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4831: tais tam āśīviṣaṃ parivārya kalakalāśabdaḥ kṛtaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4832: yaṃ śrutvā asidhāriṇyā striyā khadgena jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4836: deva eṣa āśīviṣaḥ devaṃ daṣṭum abisaṃprasthitaḥ kalandakaiḥ pakṣibhiḥ kolāhalaśabdaḥ kṛtaḥ mayā jīvitād vyaparopita iti;
V03vinv171u:4837: rājñas tām avasthāṃ pratiśrutya kumārabhaṭabalāgraḥ rājagṛhanivāsī janakāyaḥ sannipatitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4838: antar bahis tad udyānaṃ mahatā kolahalaśabdena kṣobhitum ārabdham;
V03vinv171u:4840: rājā; bhūyasā antaḥpurajanakāyo 'śruparyākulekṣaṇo vyavasthitaḥ; tato rājā kathayati:
V03vinv171u:4841: bhavanto yo rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktaṃ jīvitenācchādayati,
V03vinv171u:4842: kas tasya vara iti; janakāyaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:4844: bhavantaḥ kalandakaiḥ pakṣibhir mama jīvitaṃ dattam;
V03vinv171u:4845: tad ebhyo dattam upārdhaṃ rājyasya iti;
V03vinv171u:4849: yasminn ete veṇuvane prativasanti tatraiṣāṃ nivāpaḥ prajñapyatām iti; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv171u:4853: tasya veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpa iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā;
V03vinv171u:4854: rājño bimbisārasya mātula ājīvikānāṃ madhye pravrajitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4855: tena tad udyānaṃ tasmai nivāsāya dattaṃ
V03vinv171u:4857: Bimbisāra presents Veṇuvana to the Buddha
V03vinv171u:4858: yāvad bhagavān magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran rājagṛham anuprāpto 'nyatamasmin vṛkṣamūle 'vasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4860: bhagavān māgadhesu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran rājagṛham anuprāpto 'nyatamasmin vṛkṣamūle 'vatiṣṭhatīti;
V03vinv171u:4864: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4865: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ śreṇyaṃ bimbisāraṃ bhagavān ramyayā kathayā sandarśayati,
V03vinv171u:4869: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā sandarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm;
V03vinv171u:4870: atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāra [utthāyāsanād ekāṃśam uttarāsangaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:4871: adhivāsayatu me bhagavāṃś śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena:
V03vinv171u:4872: adhivāsayati bhagavān rājño māgadhasya śreṇyasya bimbisārasya tūṣṇimbhāvena;
V03vinv171u:4873: ] atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāro bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā,
V03vinv171u:4874: bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4875_0: rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāras tām eva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ
V03vinv171u:4875_1: samudānīya kalyam evotthāyāsanāni prajñapya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena
V03vinv171u:4876: bhadanta; sajjaṃ bhaktam yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyate iti; atha [A_410b] bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya,
V03vinv171u:4877: pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṅghapuraskṛto yena rājño māgadhasya śreṇyasya bimbisārasya nivāsas tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4878: upasaṃkramya purastād bhikṣusaṅghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4879: atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ santarpayati,
V03vinv171u:4881: anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ santarpya saṃpravārya,
V03vinv171u:4882: bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ sauvarṇaṃ bhṛṅgāraṃ gṛhītvā tad udyānaṃ bhagavate niryātayati:
V03vinv171u:4887: bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpa iti
V03vinv171u:4890: tena khalu samayena bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe;
V03vinv171u:4892: tena bhagavān gṛhe upanimantritaḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena;
V03vinv171u:4893: tasmiṃś ca samaye anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ rājagṛham anuprāptaḥ kenacid eva karaṇīyena;
V03vinv171u:4894: sa tasya gṛhapater niveśane rātriṃ vāsam upagataḥ;
V03vinv171u:4895: atha sa gṛhapatiḥ sarātram evotthāyāntarjanam āmantrayate:
V03vinv171u:4904: kiṃ punar asya gṛhapater āvāho vā bhaviṣyati,
V03vinv171u:4908: pūgā vā parṣado vā rājā [vā] anena māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena nimantrito bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv171u:4909: iti viditvā taṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:4910: kiṃ punas te gṛhapate āvāho vā bhaviṣyati vivāho vā rāṣṭraṃ vā śreṇī vā pūgā vā parṣado vā rājā vā te māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ?
V03vinv171u:4917: nāpi rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4918: api tu buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṅgho 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ; (SBV I 167)
V03vinv171u:4919: anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater buddha ity aśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā sarvaromakūpāny āhṛṣṭāni;
V03vinv171u:4920: sa āhṛṣṭaromakūpas taṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:4922: asti gṛhapate śramaṇo gautamaḥ śākyaputraḥ śākyakulāt keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4926_0: santi gṛhapate kṣatriyakulād api kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇy [vastrāṇy]
V03vinv171u:4926_1: ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā [agārād anāgarikāṃ] tam eva bhagavantaṃ pravrajitam anupravrajitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:4927_0: brāhmaṇakulād api vaiśyakulād api śūdrakulād api kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi
V03vinv171u:4927_1: vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā [agārād anāgārikāṃ] tam eva bhagavantaṃ pravrajitam anupravrajitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:4929: śvaḥ sa mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṅgho 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4930: kutra gṛhapate sa bhagavān etarhi viharati?
V03vinv171u:4933: tena hi gṛhapate āgamaya tāvat tvam;
V03vinv171u:4934: sthānam etad vidyate yad ihāgataṃ śvo drakṣyasi;
V03vinv171u:4935: anāthapiṇdado gṛhapatis tāṃ rātriṃ buddhālambanayā smṛtyā middham avakrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4937: tena khalu samayena śivikādvāraṃ rātryā dvau yāmau vivṛtaṃ tiṣṭhati,
V03vinv171u:4939: māhaiva āgantukānāṃ gamikānāṃ ca dūtānāṃ vighāto bhaviṣyatīti;
V03vinv171u:4944: iti viditvā tenaiva ālokena nagarān niṣkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4950: māhaiva kaścid viheṭhayen manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā dhūrtako vā asaṃprāptaṃ vā svāt prabhūtam kulaśulkam iti;
V03vinv171u:4951: viditvā pratinivartitukāmo madhuskandhasya devaputrasya sthaṇḍilaṃ pradakṣiṇīkaroti,
V03vinv171u:4952: namaskaroti ca; atha madhuskandhadevaputrasya etad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:4954: adyaivāyaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantam apāsya anyadevatā namaskāraṃ kariṣyati;
V03vinv171u:4955: iti viditvā yāvac ca śivikādvāraṃ yāvac ca śītavanaṃ śmaśānam atrāntarād udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:4957: mā pratikrama; abhikramatas te śreyo bhavati,
V03vinv171u:4959: śatam aśvā śataṃ niṣkāḥ śatam āśvatarīrathāḥ /
V03vinv171u:4969: mā pratikrama; abhikramatas [A_411b] te śreyo bhavati; na pratikramataḥ; tat kasya hetoḥ
V03vinv171u:4974: mā pratikrama; abhikramatas te śreyo bhavati,
V03vinv171u:4975: na pratikramataḥ; athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis taṃ devaputram idam (SBV I 169)
V03vinv171u:4976: avocat: kas tvaṃ bhadramukha; aham asmi gṛhapate madhuskandho nāma māṇavaḥ,
V03vinv171u:4978: so 'haṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanayor bhikṣvor antike cittam abhiprasāya [kālagataḥ] cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ,
V03vinv171u:4979: asminn eva śivikādvāre naivāsikaḥ; tasmād aham evaṃ vadāmi:
V03vinv171u:4980: abhikrama gṛhapate mā pratikrama; abhikramatas te śreyo bhavati,
V03vinv171u:4981: na pratikramata iti; athānāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater etad abhavat: nāvaro buddho bhaviṣyati,
V03vinv171u:4983: yatredānīṃ devatā api autsukyam āpadyante tasya bhagavato darśanāya;
V03vinv171u:4984: iti viditvā yena śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4985: tena khalu samayena bahir vihārasyābhyavakāśe bhagavān caṅkrame caṅkramyate yadbhūyasā anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhaptim āgamayamānaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4986: adrākṣīt anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavantaṃ dūrād eva;
V03vinv171u:4987: dṛṣṭvā ca punar yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4989: kaccid bhagavān sukhaṃ śāyita iti; atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthā bhāṣate;
V03vinv171u:4990: sarvathā vai sukhaṃ śete brāhmaṇaḥ parinirvṛtaḥ /
V03vinv171u:4991: lipyate yo na kāmair hi vipramukto nirupadhiḥ //
V03vinv171u:4994: atha bhagavān anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim ādāya vihāraṃ praviśya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:4995: anāthapiṇdado gṛhapatir bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaṇ;
V03vinv171u:4996: ekānte niṣaṇṇam anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatiṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā sandarśayati samādāpayati [samuttejyati],
V03vinv171u:4997: saṃpraharṣayati; yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūrvakālakaraṇīyā dharmyā kathā,
V03vinv171u:4998: tadyathā dānakathā śīlakathā svargakathā kāmānām aśvādādīnavasaṅkleśavyavadānanaiṣkramyapraviveke anuśaṃsavyavadānapakṣyān dharmān vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati;
V03vinv171u:4999: yadā cainaṃ bhagavān adrākṣīt hṛṣṭacittam kalyacittaṃ muditacittaṃ vinivaraṇacittaṃ bhavyaṃ pratibalaṃ sāmutkarṣikīṃ dharmadeśanām ājñātum,
V03vinv171u:5000: tadā yāsau buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sāmutkarṣikī dharmadeśanā tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārgaś catvāry āryasatyāni vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati;
V03vinv171u:5001: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tasminn evāsane niṣaṇṇaś catvāry āryasatyāny abhisameti;
V03vinv171u:5004: tadyathā śuddhaṃ vastram apagatakālakaṃ rañjanopagaṃ raṅge prakṣiptaṃ samyag eva raṅgaṃ pratigṛhṇāti,
V03vinv171u:5005: evam evānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tasminn eva āsane niṣaṇṇaś catvāry āryasatyāny abhisameti;
V03vinv171u:5006: tadyathā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodho mārga iti;
V03vinv171u:5007_0: anāthapiṇḍado [A_412a] gṛhapatir dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā viditadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā
V03vinv171u:5007_1: tīrṇakāṅkṣo tīrṇavicikitsaḥ aparapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuś śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ
V03vinv171u:5008: yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:5010: eṣo 'haṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca;
V03vinv171u:5011: upāsakaṃ māṃ ca dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetaṃ śaraṇāgatam abhiprasannam;
V03vinv171u:5012: atha bhagavān anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat;
V03vinv171u:5016: tato mām anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir iti janaḥ sañjānīte;
V03vinv171u:5018: asti bhadanta prācīneṣu janapadeṣu śrāvastī nāma kosalānāṃ nigamaḥ; tatrāhaṃ prativasāmi
V03vinv171u:5020: Anāthapiṇḍada invites the Buddha to Śrāvastī
V03vinv171u:5022: ahaṃ bhagavantam upasthāsyāmi yāvajjīvaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena;
V03vinv171u:5025: yatra gṛhapate vihārāḥ santi tatra bhikṣava āgantavyaṃ gantavyaṃ vastavyaṃ manyante;
V03vinv171u:5027: ahaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā śrāvastyāṃ vihārā bhaviṣyanti;
V03vinv171u:5028: bhikṣavaś ca āgantavyaṃ gantavyaṃ vastavyaṃ maṃsyanta iti;
V03vinv171u:5030: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā (SBV I 171)
V03vinv171u:5032: tato 'sya yāvad rājagṛhe kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tat sarvaṃ kṛtvā pariprāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:5033: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:5035: anuprayaccha me bhagavan bhikṣuṃ sahāyakam yena sahāyakena bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ kārayāmīti;
V03vinv171u:5037: katarasya bhikṣor anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ saparivāro [śrāvastīnivāsī ca janakāyo] vidheya;
V03vinv171u:5040: saṃanvāhara śāriputra anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim [saparivāraṃ] śrāvastīnivāsinaṃ ca janakāyam iti;
V03vinv171u:5042: athāyuṣmāṃś chāriputro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'nitkāt prakrānataḥ
V03vinv171u:5045: athāyuṣmāṃś chāriputras tasyā eva rātrer atyayāt pūrvāhāṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat;
V03vinv171u:5046: rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrānto yathāparibhuktaṃ śayanāsanaṃ pratiśamayya,
V03vinv171u:5049_0: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ prabhūtaṃ śambalam ādāya ekaikarātrinivāsena śrāvastīm
V03vinv171u:5049_1: anuprāptaḥ sa praviśann eva śrāvastīm ārāmeṇārāmam [A_412b] udyānenodyānam upavanenopavanaṃ
V03vinv171u:5050: kataraḥ sa pṛthivīpradeśo bhaviṣyati śrāvastyā nātidūre nātyāsanne divā alpākīrṇo 'lpavilāpo rātrāv alpaśabdo 'lpanirghoṣaḥ alpadaṃśamaśakavātātapasarīsṛpasaṃsparśaḥ,
V03vinv171u:5052_0: adrākṣīd anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetasya kumarasyārāmaṃ śrāvastyā nātidūre nātyāsanne
V03vinv171u:5052_1: divā alpākirṇam alpavilāpaṃ rātrāv alpaśabdam alpanirghoṣam alpadaṃśamaśakavātātapasarīsṛpasparśam;
V03vinv171u:5055: sa praviṣann eva svaṃ niveśanaṃ yena jetaḥ kumāras tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:5058: ahaṃ tatra bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ kārayāmi iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv171u:5061: dvir api trir apy anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetaṃ kumāram idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:5065: punar apy anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetaṃ kumāram idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:5066: kṛtārgho 'si kumāra ārāmasya; pratīccha hiraṇyasuvarṇam; mamārāmaḥ; kaḥ kṛtārghaḥ?
V03vinv171u:5067: tvaṃ kṛtārghaḥ; tau kṛtārgho na kṛtārgha iti vivādam āpannau,
V03vinv171u:5068: yena vyāvahārikapuruṣās tena saṃprasthitāḥ; atrāntare caturṇāṃ lokapālānām etad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:5069: ayam anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir udyukto bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ māpayitum;
V03vinv171u:5071: tato vyāvahārikapuruṣam ātmānam abhinirmāya arthādhikaraṇe niṣaṇṇāḥ;
V03vinv171u:5072: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetaś ca kumāro vyāvahārikasakāśam upasaṅkrāntau;
V03vinv171u:5073: athānāthapiṇḍako gṛhapatir vyāvahārikapuruṣāṇām etam arthaṃ vistareṇa nivedayati; te kathayanti:
V03vinv171u:5078: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ śakatair bhāraiḥ mūṭaiḥ piṭakair uṣṭrair gobhir gardbhaiḥ prabhūtaṃ suvarṇam abhinirhṛtya,
V03vinv171u:5082: tataḥ anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir etam arthaṃ cintayan muhūrtasṃ tūṣṇīm asthāt:
V03vinv171u:5085: nātiprabhūtaṃ yena ayam anāstīrṇaḥ pṛthivīpradeśaḥ āstariṣyati;
V03vinv171u:5089: kasmād ārāmakāraṇād iyantaṃ mahāntaṃ dhanaskandhaṃ parityajāmi;
V03vinv171u:5090: iti viditvā anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:5091: sacet te ha gṛhapate vipratisāraḥ pratīccha suvarṇam;
V03vinv171u:5094: api tv aham etam evārtham anucintayan muhūrtaṃ tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:5102: yatredānīm ayaṃ gṛhapatir ārāmakāraṇād iyantaṃ (SBV I 173)
V03vinv171u:5103: mahāntaṃ dhanaskandhaṃ parityajati; iti viditvā anāthapiṇḍadaṃ gṛhapatim idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:5106: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir jetasya kumārasya anāstīrṇaṃ pṛthivīpradeśam anuprayacchati:
V03vinv171u:5107: yatra jetaḥ kumāro bhagavato 'rthāya dvārakoṣṭhakaṃ māpayati
V03vinv171u:5110: athānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir bhagavato 'rthāya vihāraṃ māpayitum ārabdha iti tīvradveṣaparyākulīkṛtamanasas tīrthyās te saṃbhūya yenānāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis tenopasaṅkrāntāḥ;
V03vinv171u:5112: mā tvaṃ gṛhapate śramaṇasya gautamasya arthāyātra vihāraṃ kāraya; kiṃ kāraṇam?
V03vinv171u:5113: asmābhir nagarāṇi bhājitāni; śramaṇasya gautamasya rājagṛham; asmākaṃ śrāvastī; sa kathayati:
V03vinv171u:5122: ca yady asmān vādena parājayate kāraya vihāram iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv171u:5126: upasaṅkramyāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:5127: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram idam avocat:

V03vinv171u:5633: bhagavān āha: udāyin gaccha; na te sahasaiva rājakulaṃ praveṣṭavyam; dvāre sthitvā vaktavyam,
V03vinv171u:5634: śākyabhikṣur āgata iti; yadi kathayanti praviśeti,

V03vinv171u:5641: na kalpayatīti; yadi pṛcchanti kutra vāsaṃ kalpayatīti,
V03vinv171u:5642: vaktavyam araṇye vihāre vā; yadi pṛcchanti ka evaṃvidho vihāra iti,
V03vinv171u:5649: sa kathayati: bhagavan gacchāmīti; bhagavān āha: gaccheti; vacasā mahīpatīnāṃ samṛddhyati,

V03vinv171u:5653: āyuṣmata udāyinaḥ bhagavato 'ntike tīvraḥ prasādo jātaḥ;

V03vinv171u:5676: udāyin sarvārthasiddhasyāpi kumārasya evaṃvidha eva veṣaḥ?
V03vinv171u:5678: śrutvā rājā śuddhodanaḥ mūrchitaḥ pṛthivyāṃ nipatito mahatā jalaprakṣepeṇa pratyāgataprāṇaḥ kathayati:

V03vinv171u:5685: udāyī kathayaty araṇye vihāre vā; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv171u:5689: bhavanto nyagrodhārāme jetavanākāreṇa ṣodaśamahallakān vihārān māpayata;

V03vinv171u:5695: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmudgalyāyanam āmantrayate: gaccha maudgalyāyana bhikṣūṇām ārocaya,

V03vinv171u:5701: yo yuṣmākam utsahate pitāputrasamāgamaṃ draṣṭuṃ sa cīvarakāṇi pratigṛhṇātv iti;

V03vinv171u:5743: tribhir āveṇikaiḥ smṛtyupasthānair mahākaruṇayā ca samanvāgato,

V03vinv171u:5760: saced ahaṃ kapilavastu padbhyāṃ pravekṣyāmi māninaḥ śākyā aprasādaṃ pravedayiṣyante:

V03vinv171u:5762: yo hi nāmānekair devatāśatasahasrair anugamyamāna upair vihāyasā niṣkramya iyantaṃ kālaṃ duṣkaraśatasahasrāṇi caritvā amṛtam adhigamya idānīṃ padbhyāṃ praviṣṭa iti
V03vinv171u:5765: atha bhagavāṃs tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte pūrvasyāṃ diśy upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya caturvidham īryāpathaṃ kalpayati;

V03vinv171u:5997_1: ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśya tān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ

V03vinv171u:6016: The Buddha teaches to the Gods
V03vinv171u:6018: kimarthaṃ thagavatā laukikaṃ cittam utpāditam iti; tasyaitad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:6023: bhagavān śuddhāyaṃ devaparṣadi dharmaṃ deśayitukāma iti;
V03vinv171u:6025: viśvakarmā devaputraḥ śakrasya devendrasya pratiśrutya nyagrodhārāme catūratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ nirmiṇoti,

V03vinv171u:6035: tataḥ śakro devendro nyagrodhārāme mahatīṃ vibhūtiṃ kārayitvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;

V03vinv171u:6041: tiṣṭha [tiṣṭha] mahārāja mā pravikṣaḥ; kiṃ kāraṇam?
V03vinv171u:6044: atha rājā śuddhodanaḥ dakṣiṇaṃ dvāraṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv171u:6046: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha mahārāja mā pravikṣaḥ; rājā śuddhodanaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:6051: atha rājā śuddhodanaḥ paścimaṃ dvāraṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv171u:6060: atha rājā śuddhodana uttaraṃ dvāraṃ gataḥ;
V03vinv171u:6062: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha mahārāja mā pravikṣaḥ; rājā śuddhodanaḥ kathayati,
V03vinv171u:6068: aho batāhaṃ bhagavantam śuddhāyāṃ devaparśadi dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ paśyeyam iti;
V03vinv171u:6069: tato rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya yāsau līnā santatiḥ sā prativigatā;
V03vinv171u:6071: rājā śuddhodano yadi māṃ na paśyati,
V03vinv171u:6072: sthānam etad vidyate yad uṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣyati; tad (SBV I 198)
V03vinv171u:6074: bhagavatā yat tat catūratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ tat sphaṭikamayaṃ nirmitam;
V03vinv171u:6075: yena rājā śuddhodana anāvṛtaṃ buddhaśarīraṃ paśyati;
V03vinv171u:6076: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prītiprāmodyajātaḥ bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ
V03vinv171u:6079: atha rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
V03vinv171u:6080: yāṃ śrutvā rājñā śuddhodanena viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣāktkṛtam;
V03vinv171u:6082: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtam; na pitrā,
V03vinv171u:6095: tat tvayā kṛtam asmākaṃ cittaṃ mokṣaparāyaṇam //
V03vinv171u:6096: durgatibhyaḥ samuddṛtya svarge mokṣe ca te vayam /
V03vinv171u:6097: sthāpitā suprayatnena sādhu te duṣkaraṃ kṛtam //
V03vinv171u:6098: vaṇijā iva lobhena svargalobhena te vayam /
V03vinv171u:6100: atha rājā śuddhodanaḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:6104: atha rājā śuddhodano bhagavatas tūṣṇīṃbhāvena adhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrānto yena śuklodanas tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6106: kumāra rājyābhiṣekas te prāptaḥ; pratīccha rājyam; kasyārthe?
V03vinv171u:6107: yato bhagavataḥ sakāśāt satyāni dṛṣṭāni; katarasmin divase?
V03vinv171u:6109: mayā yam eva divasaṃ bhagavatā nyagrodhārāme dharmo deśitas tam eva divasaṃ saptasaptatyā śākyasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ satyāni dṛṣṭānīti;
V03vinv171u:6110: evaṃ droṇodano rājyaṃ pratīcchety uktaḥ; sa kathayati:
V03vinv171u:6111: yadā bhagavatā brahmāvarte udyāne dharmo deśitas tadā ṣaṭsaptatyā śākyasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ satyāni dṛṣṭānīti;
V03vinv171u:6112: evam amṛtodano rājyaṃ pratīcchety uktaḥ sa kathayati,
V03vinv171u:6113: mayāpi yadā bhagavatā rohītake udyāne dharmo deśitas tadā pañcasaptatyā śākyasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ satyāni dṛṣṭāni;
V03vinv171u:6114: yady evam idānīṃ kaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāpayāmaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6117: taiḥ saṃbhūya bhadrikaḥ śākyarājo rājyaiśvaryādhipatye abhiṣiktaḥ
V03vinv171u:6120: atha rājā śuddhodanas tām eva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kalyam evotthāya āsanakāni prajñāpya udakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālam ārocayati:
V03vinv171u:6124: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṅghapuraskṛto yena rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya bhaktābhisāras tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6125: upasaṅkramya purastād bhikṣusaṅghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6126: atha rājā śuddhodanaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ santarpayati,
V03vinv171u:6128_0: anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ santarpya saṃpravārya
V03vinv171u:6128_1: bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ sauvarṇaṃ bhṛṅgāraṃ gṛhītvā
V03vinv171u:6129: bhagavatā ca pañcāṅgopetena svareṇa dakṣiṇā ādiṣṭā:
V03vinv171u:6130: ito dānād dhi yat puṇyaṃ tac chākyān upagacchatu /
V03vinv171u:6131: prāpnuvantu padaṃ nityam īpsitān vā manorathān // iti;
V03vinv171u:6132: tatra bhagavān kapilavastuni viharati nyagrodhārāme; tathā sthavirair api sūtrānta upanibaddham,
V03vinv171u:6134: bhagavān kapilavastuny avasthitaḥ ekaṃ divasaṃ rājakule bhuktaḥ,
V03vinv171u:6138: rājñā śuddhodanena jaṭilā pravrajitāḥ bhikṣavo dṛṣṭāḥ;
V03vinv171u:6139: śānteryāpathatvāc cittaprāsādikā no tu kāyaprāsādikāḥ kaṣṭais tapovrataviśeṣaiḥ karśitaśarīrāḥ;
V03vinv171u:6141: kiṃ vāpīme jaṭilāḥ śānteryāpathatvāc cittaprāsādikāḥ no tu kāyaprāsādikāḥ;
V03vinv171u:6145: bhavanto yadi sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāro na pravrajito 'bhaviṣyat, ko 'bhaviṣyad?
V03vinv171u:6155: rājā evaṃ samājñāpayati mama viṣayanivāsibhiḥ śākyaiḥ kulaikikayā pravrajitavyam iti
V03vinv171u:6158: droṇodanasya dvau putrau aniruddho mahānāmā ca;
V03vinv171u:6160: aniruddhas tu upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
V03vinv171u:6162: putra rājñā ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritaṃ śākyaiḥ kulaikikayā pravrajitavyam iti;
V03vinv171u:6165: yas te priyaḥ putraḥ sukhāsīnas tiṣṭhati taṃ pravrājaya;
V03vinv171u:6173: tayā riktapiṭharikābhi [ḥ] peṭakaṃ pūrayitvā śuklena vastreṇa ācchādya mudrālakṣitaṃ kṛtvā preṣyadārikāyā haste preṣitaḥ; sandiṣṭā,
V03vinv171u:6175: vaktavyaṃ na kiṃcid iti; sā tam ādāya saṃprasthitā; (SBV I 201)
V03vinv171u:6176: śakrasya devendrasya adhastāj jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate; sa saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv171u:6177: yena nāma upāriṣṭaḥ pratyekabuddhaḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6181: yāvad asau dārikā tam ādāya aniruddhasya sakāśaṃ gatā;
V03vinv171u:6184: kumāra na kiṃcid iti; aniruddhaḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv171u:6187: nūnam atra nāma nakiṃcid bhojanaṃ prakṣiptam;
V03vinv171u:6193: sandiṣṭaṃ ca amba pratidivasam īdṛśaṃ nakiṃcinnāma bhojanaṃ preṣayitum arhasīti;
V03vinv171u:6195: tayā mahānāmno darśitam; putra dṛṣṭaṃ te?
V03vinv171u:6197: tan na tvaṃ mayā pūrvam evoktaḥ puṇyamaheśākhyas sa satvamanuṣyasubhagaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6198: mā tena saha spardhāṃ kuruṣveti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv171u:6199: amba puṇyamaheśākhyo vā bhavatu mā vā;
V03vinv171u:6201: yataś ca mahānāmā sarvāvasthaṃ nādhivāsitavān pravrajyāṃ,
V03vinv171u:6204: śākyaiḥ kulaikikayā pravrajitavyam iti; sa tvaṃ kiṃ pravrajasi,
V03vinv171u:6205: āhosvid gṛhe tiṣṭhasīti; sa kathayati: amba pravrajyāyāṃ ko 'nuśaṃasaḥ?
V03vinv171u:6222: tena khalu samayena bhadrikaḥ śākyarājo vīṇāṃ sārayati;
V03vinv171u:6227: sa dvāre sthitvā dauvārikaṃ puruṣam āmantrayate:
V03vinv171u:6229: bhadrikasya rājño nivedaya aniruddho dvāre tiṣṭhati devaṃ draṣṭukāma iti; dauvārikeṇa (SBV I 202)
V03vinv171u:6231: deva aniruddho dvāre tiṣṭhati [A_422b] devaṃ draṣṭukāma iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv171u:6238: yadā tava vīṇāṃ sārayatas tantrī chinnā;
V03vinv171u:6241: vīṇāyāṃ bhavān kṛtāvī; bhadrikaḥ śākyarājaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:6244: śākyaiḥ kulaikikayā pravrajitavyam iti; tad avalokito bhava; pravrajāmiti; rājā kathayati,
V03vinv171u:6260: kaccid aniruddhaḥ sukhaṃ supta iti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv171u:6261: deva na sukhaṃ supta iti; rājñābhihitam,
V03vinv171u:6268: kimartham tvayā jvaragandhāni vastrāṇi prajñaptāni; śayyākarmāntikenābhihitam:
V03vinv171u:6269: mama bhāṇḍāgārikena anupradattāni; rājñā bhāṇḍāgārika āhūyoktaḥ:
V03vinv171u:6276: deva vastre ūyamāne kiṃcic cheṣam; tan mayā jvaritena utam; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv171u:6277: kumāra kathaṃ tvayā vijñātam; sa kathayati,
V03vinv171u:6278: uṣṇasparśapratisaṃvedanāt; jvaragandhena ca; rājā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ kathayati: (SBV I 203)
V03vinv171u:6279: bhavanta aniruddho bhavati śākyasubhagaḥ; tato bhadrikena śākyarājenābhihitaḥ: yady ahaṃ pravrajāmi,
V03vinv171u:6282: yannu vayaṃ sarve saṃbhūya devadattaṃ protsāhayāma iti
V03vinv171u:6285: sa bhadrikena śākyarājenāhūtaḥ; tataḥ sarvaiḥ sambhūyābhihitaḥ:
V03vinv171u:6286: devadatta vayaṃ sarve pravrajāmaḥ; tvaṃ kiṃ kariṣyasi; devadattaḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv171u:6287: yadi vakṣyāmi na pravrajāmīti bhadrikaḥ śākyarājo na pravrajiṣyati;
V03vinv171u:6289: api nu mayā yam eva divasaṃ bhagavatā nyagrodhārāme ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ tadaiva me buddhir utpannā,
V03vinv171u:6291: tathaiva mayā anvāvartitavyaḥ; iti viditvā kathayati:
V03vinv171u:6292: deva yūyaṃ pravrajatha; [A_422a] ahaṃ kimarthaṃ tiṣṭhāmīti; bhadrikaḥ śākyarājaḥ saṃlakṣayati:
V03vinv171u:6294: pratijñāyāṃ sthāpayitvā mahājanakāyaḥ pratisaṃviditaḥ kartavya iti;
V03vinv171u:6295: tato rājñā tasya tad vacanaṃ patrābhilikhitaṃ kṛtvā kapilavastuni nagare ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam:
V03vinv171u:6300: yadi mayā vijñātam abhaviṣyat bhadrikaḥ śākyarājo niścayena pravrajed iti,
V03vinv171u:6301: na mayā pratijñātam abhaviṣyat; idānīṃ yadi na pravrajiṣyāmi,
V03vinv171u:6302: mṛṣāvādika iti kṛtvā rājyam api na lapsye;
V03vinv171u:6311: candanavāripariṣiktam ucchritadhvajapatākam āmuktapaṭṭadāmakalāpaṃ surabhidhūpaghaṭikopanibaddhaṃ nānāpuṣpāvakīrṇaṃ ramaṇīyam;
V03vinv171u:6313: śākyastriyaḥ śākyakumāryāś ca kutūhalajātā gavākṣavātāyanavedikāsv avasthitāḥ,
V03vinv171u:6316: naimittikā brāhamaṇā vipañcanakā āhūtāḥ śākyaparīkṣāṃ prati,
V03vinv171u:6318: atha śākyā mātāpitrāv avalokya hārakaṭakakeyūrādyalaṅkāravibhūṣitāḥ pratyekapratyekaṃ ratheṣv abhiruhya nirgantum ārabdhāḥ;
V03vinv171u:6325: tasya nirgacchataḥ śyenakena śakunakena cūḍāmaṇir apahṛtaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6327: yādṛśam asya nimittaṃ niyatam ayaṃ śāstari prahṛtya narakaparāyaṇo bhavatīti;
V03vinv171u:6330: ete 'pi mahāśrāvakeṣu vāgduścaritaṃ kṛtvā narakaparāyaṇā bhaviṣyanti iti;
V03vinv171u:6331: upanandasya hastiskandhābhirūḍhasya itaś cāmutaś ca vyavalokayato muktāhāraḥ patitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6332: sa hastiskandhād avatīrya gṛhītaḥ; so 'pi vyākṛtaḥ:
V03vinv171u:6334: tatas teṣāṃ śākyānāṃ bhadrikāniruddhadevadattapramukhāni pañcaśākyaśatāni udyānayātrāpratispardhayā śobhayā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntāni;
V03vinv171u:6336: saced ahaṃ śākyān ehibhikṣukayā pravrājayiṣyāmi kecid ārādhakā bhaviṣyanti,
V03vinv171u:6340: yanv ahaṃ sarvān eva bhikṣūn [A_422b] jñapticaturthena karmaṇā pravrājayeyam upasaṃpādayeyam;
V03vinv171u:6343: upasaṃpādayata jñapticaturthena karmaṇā iti; evaṃ bhadanteti te bhikṣavo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣuḥ
V03vinv171u:6346: śākyānām upālī nāma kalpakaḥ rājñā śuddodanena teṣāṃ pravrajatāṃ keśāvaropakaḥ preṣitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6347: bhadrikasya śākyarājasya keśān avatārayan so 'śrudurdinavadano bāṣpoparuddhyamānahṛdayo muhur (SBV I 205)
V03vinv171u:6348: niśvāsaparāyaṇaḥ keśān avatārayati; bhadrikaḥ śākyarājaḥ kathayati: upālin kimarthaṃ rodiṣi?
V03vinv171u:6350: deva mayā jambūdvīpapradhānānāṃ puruṣāṇām upasthānaṃ kṛtvā,
V03vinv171u:6351: idānīṃ prākṛtapuruṣāṇām upasthānaṃ kartavyaṃ bhaviṣyati; kāmaṃ prāṇaviyogaḥ,
V03vinv171u:6352: na yuṣmābhiḥ parityaktasya jīvitam iti; bhadrikaḥ śākyarājaḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:6355: ahaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā prākṛtapuruṣāṇām upasthānaṃ na kariṣyasi;
V03vinv171u:6356: iti viditvā tenaikasmin pradeśe paṭakaḥ prasāritaḥ,
V03vinv171u:6358: śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ kumārā eṣo 'smākam upālī kalpakaḥ kṛtopasthānaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6359: tad asya jīvikānimittam alaṅkāraṃ paṭe sthāpayata;
V03vinv171u:6361: tair hārārdhahārakaṭakakeyūrakuṇḍalānāṃ nānāratnapratyuptānām alaṅkāraviśeṣāṇāṃ paṭake mahān rāśiḥ kṛtaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6364: ime tāvat kumārāḥ kulavibhavayauvanopetāḥ sphītāny antaḥpurāṇi,
V03vinv171u:6366: aham asminn alaṅkāramātre sakto 'nayena vyasanam āpatsye;
V03vinv171u:6373: dharmatā hy eṣā yathā buddhā bhagavantas trī rātreḥ,
V03vinv171u:6376: adrākṣīd āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ upālinaṃ kalpakam atīva saṃvignam;
V03vinv171u:6377: dṛṣṭvā ca punar yenopālī kalpakas tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6379: kasmāt tvam upālin atīva saṃvignaḥ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparas tiṣṭhasīti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv171u:6380: katham ahaṃ bhadanta śāriputra na cintāparo bhavāmi yatredānīm amī kumārāḥ kulavibhavayauvanopetāḥ sphītāny antaḥpurāṇi sphītāni ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇy apāsya pravrajitāḥ;
V03vinv171u:6381: aham asminn alaṅkāramātre sakto 'nayena vyasanam āpatsye?
V03vinv171u:6382: yady ahaṃ na nīcakulotpannaḥ syām aham api svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajya udyujyeyaṃ,
V03vinv171u:6392: saced ākāṅkṣasi svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadāṃ bhikṣubhāvam,
V03vinv171u:6393: ehi bhagavatsakāśaṃ gacchāva; pravrājayiṣyati te bhagavān iti; tenādhivāsitam
V03vinv171u:6396: athāyuṣmān śāriputraḥ upālinaṃ kalpakam ādāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6397: upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:6398: ayaṃ bhadanta upālī ākāṅkṣate svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam;
V03vinv171u:6402: sa bhagavatā ābhāṣitaḥ ehi bhikṣo cara brahmacaryam iti;
V03vinv171u:6413: bhadrikena śākyarājena sāmīcīṃ kurvatā upālinaḥ pādau pratyabhijñātau,
V03vinv171u:6415: bhagavann eṣa upālī; kim asyāpi mayā pādayor nipatitavyam iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv171u:6435: madhyo 'vanamati; evam anupūrveṇa nipatitāḥ; devadatto na nipatati; bhagavān kathayati:
V03vinv171u:6437: nipateti; sa kathayati; tava kiṃ vidyate?
V03vinv171u:6439: sa na nipatatīti tatra devadattena bhagavatas tatprathamataḥ ājñā prativyūḍhā
V03vinv171u:6440: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
V03vinv171u:6441: paśya bhadanta bhadrikena śākyarājena upālino vandanāyāṃ kṛtāyāṃ ṣaḍvikāraṃ pṛthivīkampo jātaḥ iti; bhagavān āha:
V03vinv171u:6445: ṣaḍvikāraś ca pṛthivīkampo jātaḥ; tac chrūyatām
V03vinv171u:6447: Sundara, the student, and Bhadrā, the harlot
V03vinv171u:6448: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati,
V03vinv171u:6449: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
V03vinv171u:6450: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ bhadrā nāma rūpājīvinī prativasati;
V03vinv171u:6464: yāvad apareṇa samayena vārāṇasyāṃ parvā pratyupasthitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6465: sarvās striyo vastramālyālaṅkāravibhūṣitāḥ svakasvakeṣu krīḍāratiharṣabahulā avatiṣṭhante;
V03vinv171u:6468: adya vārāṇaseyā manuṣyā vastrālaṅkāravibhūṣitā svakasvakābhiḥ strībhiḥ sārdhaṃ paricārayiṣyanti;
V03vinv171u:6471: sundaraś ca māṇavakas taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6477: tasyā rūpayauvanacāturyaguṇān vikalpayan madāviṣṭaḥ kṛtsnāṃ rātriṃ jāgaritaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6478: prabhātāyāṃ rajanyām atyarthamiddharparyākulīkṛtanayanas tāvat supto yāvad ādhityodaya iti;
V03vinv171u:6479: sarvopayogāya lokena yadā sarvāṇi puṣpāṇy uccitāni tadā prativibuddhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6483: śirīṣapuṣpāṇy ādāya tasyāḥ sakāśam upasaṅkrāntaḥ; sā gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv171u:6490: kāmān khalu pratisevamānasya saṃyojanāny upacayaṃ gacchantīti sa pravṛddhakāmarāgo grīṣmaṇāṃ paścime māse vyabhre dine vigatabalāhake,
V03vinv171u:6492: nagarād ativiprakṛṣṭadeśeṣv araṇyeṣu vaktrāparavaktraṃ gāyan puṣpāṇy uccinoti;
V03vinv171u:6494: sa tīkṣṇārkaraśmisantāpitaḥ chāyāyāḥ śītalaṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6496: ūrdhvaṃ tapati ādityaḥ adhastād dahati vālukā /
V03vinv171u:6497: kasmād gāyasi gātrāṇi na te dahati ātapaḥ // iti;
V03vinv171u:6499: na māṃ tāpayaty ādityaḥ saṅkalpās tāpayanti mām /
V03vinv171u:6500: kāryākāryāṇi loke 'smiṃs tāpayanti tu nātapaḥ // iti;
V03vinv171u:6502: nūnam ayaṃ māṇavaḥ śaityakathāsu kṛtāvī yena sthite madhyāhnasamaye puṣpāṇy uccinotīti; sa tenābhihitaḥ:
V03vinv171u:6503: kuru māṇava śaityāṃ tāvat kathām; śṛṇomīti; sa saṃlakṣayati; nūnam asya rājñaḥ śarīradāhaḥ,
V03vinv171u:6504: yenaivaṃ vadatīti; tena tasya vicitrā śaityakathā kṛtā,
V03vinv171u:6508: bhavanto yo rājño kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya jīvitam anuprayacchati,
V03vinv171u:6515: sa tasmin śayitaḥ bhadrām anusmṛtya cintayati;
V03vinv171u:6516: tad upārdharājyaṃ gṛhṇāmi yatra bhadrā rūpājīvinī iti;
V03vinv171u:6518: kīdṛśaḥ sa rājā yatra upārdharājyaṃ bhuṅkte;
V03vinv171u:6519: yanv aham enam jīvitād vyaparopayeyam iti;
V03vinv171u:6521: [A_424a] alam anena rājyena yad rājānaṃ praghātya iti; gmathāṃ ca bhāṣate: (SBV I 209)
V03vinv171u:6522: aprāpte arthatarṣaḥ prāpte cārthe na tarṣavinivṛttiḥ /
V03vinv171u:6523: aprāpte ca vighātas tasmād arthe matir anarthāya // iti
V03vinv171u:6525: sa vipratisārajātaḥ śayanād avatīrya kṛṣṇājīnam āstīrya bhūmau śayitaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6531: dṛṣṭvā ca punar aprasādaṃ pravedayanto rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ kathayanti:
V03vinv171u:6532: deva nāsāv arhati rājyam; rājā kathayati, kimartham?
V03vinv171u:6534: deva yo hi nāma praṇītaṃ śayanāsanam apahāya bhūmau kṛṣṇājine śayitas tasya hīnādhimuktasya kiṃ rājyeneti; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv171u:6536: kāraṇenātra bhavitavyam; śabdayata iti; tair asau śabditaḥ:
V03vinv171u:6538: bho māṇava kimarthaṃ tvaṃ mahāśayanāsanād kṛṣṇājine śayita iti;
V03vinv171u:6539: tena yathāvṛttaṃ rājñe samākhyātam; tataḥ kathayati:
V03vinv171u:6542: yadi pravrajitvā kiñcid guṇagaṇam adhigacchasi mamārocayitavyam iti;
V03vinv171u:6544: tatas tena śāntaṃ pradeśaṃ gatvā anācāryakeṇa anupādhyāyakena pratyekabodhir anugatā;
V03vinv171u:6547: gacchāmi tāṃ pūrvikāṃ pratijñāṃ niryātayāmi iti;
V03vinv171u:6548: sa rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartum ārabdhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6549: rājā tasya pādayor nipatya gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv171u:6557: tenāsau sundaraproktāṃ gāthāṃ gāthāṃ grāhitaḥ; uktaś ca:
V03vinv171u:6558: gaṅgāpāla bhūyo bhūyaḥ mām etāṃ gāthāṃ smārayiṣyasīti;
V03vinv171u:6560: sa yadā rājño brahmadattasya śmaśrukarma karoti tadāsau middham avakrāmati;
V03vinv171u:6564: vada kaṃ te varam anuprayacchāmīti; sa kathayati,
V03vinv171u:6566: yadā gaṅgāpālo rājānaṃ gāthāṃ smārayati tadā rājñaḥ kāmakathāyām api cittaṃ na krāmati;
V03vinv171u:6570: mātula yadā te devo vareṇa pravārayati,
V03vinv171u:6572: yadi me devo 'bhiprasannaḥ tad asyā gāthāyā arthaṃ vistareṇa saṃprakāśayed iti;
V03vinv171u:6573: rājñā tasyā gāthāyā artho vistareṇa saṃvibhaktaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6575: deva kṛtopasthāno 'ham; pravrajāmy agārād anagārikām iti; rājā kathayati:
V03vinv171u:6576: yadi pravrājitaḥ kiñcid guṇagaṇam adhigamiṣyasi mama nivedayiṣyasīti; sa kathayati:
V03vinv171u:6582: sa yena rājā brahmadattas tena upasaṅkrāntaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6583: upasaṅkramya upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartum ārabhaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6588: rājā brahmadattaḥ gaṅgāpālasya ṛṣeḥ [pādayor nipatati] ṣaḍvikāraḥ pṛthivīkampo jātaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6591: pravibhajya hi yatraiṣa prāvrajat kṣurabhāṇḍikam // iti;
V03vinv171u:6592: rājā brahmadatto mātaram anusaṃjñapayan gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
V03vinv171u:6600: tapasā bhāti na vācya eṣa kiñcit // iti; (SBV I 211)
V03vinv171u:6601: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena brahmadatto nāma rājābhūd eṣa eva sa bhadrikaḥ śākyarājaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6602: yo 'sau gaṅgapālanāmā ṛṣir eṣa evāsāv upālī;
V03vinv171u:6603: tadāpi bhadrikena śākyarājena brahmadattabhūtena upālino gaṅgapālaṛṣibhūtasya praṇāme kṛte ṣaḍvikāraḥ pṛthivīkampo jātaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6604: etarhy api bhadrikena śākyarājena upālinaḥ pravrajitasya praṇāme kṛte ṣaḍvikāraḥ pṛthivīkampo jāta iti.
V03vinv171u:6610: atha bhagavān nandāṃ ca nandabalāṃ ca grāmikaduhitarau dhārmyayā kathayā sandarśayitvā samādāpayitvā samuttejayitvā saṃpraharṣayitvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ
V03vinv171u:6612: Marvellous deeds of the Buddha before Urubilvā Kāśyapa
V03vinv171u:6613: a) The Buddha subdues a nāga
V03vinv171u:6615: astīha magadheṣu janapadeṣu kaścic chramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā suśīlaḥ saṃmato yam aham anvāvartayeyaṃ yasmin me 'nvāvṛtte 'lpakṛcchreṇa mahājanakāyo 'nvāvartiṣyate;
V03vinv171u:6616: tena khalu samayenorubilvākāśyapo jaṭilo jīrṇo vṛddho mahallako;
V03vinv171u:6617: sa viṃśativarṣaśatiko jātyā māgadhakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ satkṛto gurukṛto mānito pūjito 'rhan saṃmataḥ;
V03vinv171u:6618: paṃcaśataparivāro nadyā nairaṃjanāyās tīra āśramapade śāmyate;
V03vinv171u:6620: ayam urubilvākāśyapo jaṭilo jīrṇo mahallakaḥ pūrvavad yāvac chāmyate;
V03vinv171u:6621_0: yanv aham urubilvākāśyapaṃ jaṭilam anvāvartayeyaṃ yasmin me 'nvāvṛtte 'lpakṛcchreṇa
V03vinv171u:6621_1: mahājanakāyo 'nvāvartiṣyate [CPS_24a.4] atha bhagavān yenorubilvākāśyapasya jaṭilasyāśramapadaṃ tenopajagāma;
V03vinv171u:6622: adrākṣīd urubilvlākāśyapo jaṭilo bhagavantaṃ dūrata eva;
V03vinv171u:6623: dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhagavato 'rthāyāsanaṃ prajñapya bhagavantam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:6628: athorubilvākāśyapo bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisāryaikānte nyaṣīdat; (SBV I 218)
V03vinv171u:6629: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ bhagavān urubilvākāśyapaṃ jaṭilam idam avocat:
V03vinv171u:6630: yadi te kāśyapa agurv ahaṃ tavāgnyāgāra ekarātrīṃ vihareyaṃ;
V03vinv171u:6634: aṅga tvaṃ kāśyapa anujānīhi na me sa viheṭayiṣyati;
V03vinv171u:6635: sacen mahāśramaṇa na te viheṭhayati tatra mahāśramaṇa vihara yathāsukham eva;
V03vinv171u:6636: [CPS_24a.9] atha bhagavān bahir agnyāgārasya pādau prakṣālya agnyāgāraṃ parviśya nyaṣīdat paryaṅkam ābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhāṃ smṛtim upasthāpya;
V03vinv171u:6637: adrākṣīd āśīviṣo nāgo bhagavantaṃ dūrata eva;
V03vinv171u:6642: athāśīviṣasya nāgasya krodhānubhāvena bhagavataś ca ṛddhyānubhāvena sarvo 'gnyāgāra ādīptaḥ pradīptaḥ saṃprajvalita ekajvalībhūto dhyāyati;
V03vinv171u:6643: adrākṣīd urubilvākāśyapo jaṭilo rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye nakṣatrāṇi vyavalokayamānaḥ sarvam agnyāgāram ādīptaṃ pradīptaṃ saṃprajvalitam ekajvalībhūtaṃ dhyāyantaṃ;
V03vinv171u:6649_0: dharmadeśanārthāya urubilvākāśyapasya jaṭilasya sapariṣatkasya yanv ahaṃ tadrūpān
V03vinv171u:6649_1: ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān abhisaṃskuryāṃ yathāśīviṣasya nāgasya tejasā tejaḥ paryādadyāṃ
V03vinv171u:6649_2: na cāsya kāyaḥ klāmyeta dāntaṃ ca taṃ kṛtvā pātreṇādāya urubilvākāśyapasya jaṭilasya prayaccheyam;
V03vinv171u:6650: atha bhagavān tadrūpān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān abhisaṃkaroti yathā samāhite citte āśīviṣasya nāgasya tejasā tejaḥ paryādadāti na cāsya kāyaḥ klāmyati;
V03vinv171u:6651: dāntaṃ ca taṃ kṛtvā pātreṇādāya yenorubilvākāśyapo jaṭilas tenopajagāma;
V03vinv171u:6652: [CPS_24a.17] adrākṣīd urubilvākāśyapo jaṭilo bhagavantaṃ dūrata eva;
V03vinv171u:6657: yasya te kāśyapa āśīviṣasya nāgasyānubhāvena tavāgnyāgār ....... sa mayā dāntaḥ kṛtvā pātreṇānītaḥ;
V03vinv171u:6659: āścaryaṃ yāvan maharddhiko mahāśramano mahānubhāvaḥ; api tv aham apy arhan
V03vinv171u:6661: b) The Buddha hinders the lighting of the fires of Kāśyapa's students
V03vinv171u:6662: [CPS_24b.1] tatredāniṃ bhagavān urubilvākāśyapasya jaṭilasyāśramapade viharati vanagulmake;
V03vinv171u:6663: tena khalu samayenorubilvākāśyapasya jaṭilasyāśramapade pañca māṇavaśatāni agniṃ paricaranti;
V03vinv171u:6666: atha te māṇavakā agniṃ prajvālayitvā paricartukāmā na śaknuvanti prajvālayitum;
V03vinv171u:6667: atha te māṇavakā yenorubilākāśyapo jaṭilas tenopajagmuḥ;
V03vinv171u:6669: iha vayam upādhyāyāgniṃ prajvālayitvā paricartukāmā na śaknumaḥ prajvālayitum;
V03vinv171u:6675: ihāsmakaṃ mahāśramaṇa te māṇavakā agniṃ prajvālayitvā paricartukāmā na śaknuvanti prajvālayitum;
V03vinv171u:6677: mahāśramaṇo 'smākaṃ sāmantake prativasati mā haiva tasyānubhāvo bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv171u:6680: atha so 'gniḥ svayam eva prajvalito yathāpitad buddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena;
V03vinv171u:6682: āścaryaṃ yāvan maharddhiko mahāśramaṇo mahānubhāvaḥ; api tv aham apy arhan
V03vinv171u:6684: c) The Buddha hinders the extinction of the fire of Kāśyapa's students
V03vinv171u:6685: [CPS_24c.1] tatredānīṃ bhagavān urubilvākāśyapasya jaṭilasyāśramapade viharati vanagulmake;
V03vinv171u:6686: atha te māṇavakā agniṃ paricaritvā nirvāpayitukāmā na śaknuvanti nirvāpayitum;
V03vinv171u:6687: atha te māṇavakā yenorubilākāśyapo jaṭilas tenopajagmuḥ;
V03vinv171u:6689: iha vayam upādhyāyāgniṃ paricaritvā nirvāpayitukāmā na śaknumo nirvāpayitum;
V03vinv171u:6695: ihāsmakaṃ mahāśramaṇa te māṇavakā agniṃ paricaritvā nirvāpayitukāmā na śaknuvanti nirvāpayitum;
V03vinv171u:6697: mahāśramaṇo 'smākaṃ sāmantake prativasati mā haiva tasyānubhāvo bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv171u:6700: atha so 'gniḥ svayam eva nirvṛto yathāpitad buddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena;
V03vinv171u:6702: āścaryaṃ yāvan maharddhiko mahāśramaṇo mahānubhāvaḥ; api tv aham apy arhan (SBV I 220)
V03vinv171u:6704: d) The Buddha hinders the lighting of Kāśyapas's fire
V03vinv171u:6705: [CPS_24d.1] tatredānīṃ bhagavān urubilvākāśyapasya jaṭilasyāśramapade viharati vanagulmake;
V03vinv171u:6706: tena khalu samayenorubilvākāśyapo jaṭilo 'gniṃ prajvālayitvā paricartukāmo na śaknoti prajvālayitum;
V03vinv171u:6712: ihāhaṃ mahāśramaṇāgniṃ prajvālayitvā paricartukāmo na śaknomi prajvālayitum; tasya me tad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:6713: mahāśramaṇo 'smākaṃ sāmantake prativasati mā haiva tasyānubhāvo bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv171u:6716: atha so 'gniḥ svayam eva prajvalito yathāpitad buddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena;
V03vinv171u:6718: āścaryaṃ yāvan maharddhiko mahāśramaṇo mahānubhāvaḥ; api tv aham apy arhan
V03vinv171u:6720: e) The Buddha hinders the extinction of Kāśyapa's fire
V03vinv171u:6721: [CPS_24e.1] tatredānīṃ bhagavān urubilvākāśyapasya jaṭilasyāśramapade viharati vanagulmake;
V03vinv171u:6722: tena khalu samayenorubilvākāśyapo jaṭilo 'gniṃ paricarya nirvāpayitukāmo na śaknoti nirvāpayitum;
V03vinv171u:6728: ihāhaṃ mahāśramaṇāgniṃ paricarya nirvāpayitukāmā na śaknomi nirvāpayitum; tasya me etad abhavat:
V03vinv171u:6729: mahāśramaṇo 'smākaṃ sāmantake prativasati mā haiva tasyānubhāvo bhaviṣyati;
V03vinv171u:6732: atha so 'gniḥ svayam eva nirvṛto yathāpitad buddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena;
V03vinv171u:6734: āścaryaṃ yāvan maharddhiko mahāśramaṇo mahānubhāvaḥ; api tv aham apy arhan
V03vinv171u:6736: f) The Buddha sets fire to the fire-house of Kāśyapa
V03vinv171u:6737: [CPS_24f.1] tatredānīṃ bhagavān urubilvākāśyapasya jaṭilasyāśramapade viharati vanagulmake;
V03vinv171u:6738: athāpareṇa samayenorubilvākāśyapasya jaṭilasya sarvo 'gnyāgāra ādīptaḥ pradīptaḥ saṃprajvalita ekajvālībhūto dhyāyati (SBV I 221)
V03vinv171u:6739: tam urubilvākāśyapaḥ sapariṣatko mahatā janakāyena sārdham udyato na śaknoti nirvāpayitum;
V03vinv171u:6745: jānīhi mahāśramaṇa ihāsmākaṃ mahāśramano sarvo 'gnyāgāra ādīptaḥ pradīptaḥ saṃprajvalita ekajvālībhūto dhyāyati;
V03vinv171u:6746: tam ahaṃ sapariṣatko mahatā janakāyena sārdham udyato na śaknomi nirvāpayitum;
V03vinv171u:6752: atha so 'gnyāgāraḥ svayam eva nirvṛto yathāpitad buddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena;
V03vinv171u:6754: āścaryaṃ yāvan maharddhiko mahāśramaṇo mahānubhāvaḥ; api tv aham apy arhan
V03vinv171u:6756: g) the four heavenly kings visit the Buddha
V03vinv171u:6757: [CPS_24g.1] tatredānīṃ bhagavān urubilvākāśyapasya jaṭilasyāśramapade viharati vanagulmake;
V03vinv171u:6758: atha taṃ rātriṃ catvāro mahārājāno 'tikrāntavarṇā abhikrāntāyāṃ rātryāṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopajagmuḥ;
V03vinv171u:6760: teṣām ayam eva rūpaātmabhāvas tadyathā caturṇām agniskandhānām ādīptānāṃ pradīptānāṃ saṃprajvalitānāṃ ekajvalībhūtānāṃ dhyāyatām;
V03vinv171u:6761_0: adrākṣīd urubilvākāśyapo jaṭilo rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye nakṣatrāṇi vyavalokayamāno
V03vinv171u:6761_1: bhagavataḥ purastāc catvāro mahānto 'gniskandhā ādīptāḥ pradīptāḥ saṃprajvalitā ekajvālībhūtā dhyāyanti;
V03vinv171u:6763: mā haiva mahāśramaṇo 'py agniṃ paricarati tathā hy asya purato catvāro mahānto 'gniskandhā ādīptāḥ pradīptāḥ saṃprajvalitā ekajvālībhūtā dhyāyanti;
V03vinv171u:6764: athorubilvākāśyapo jaṭila āśramapadam anvāhiṇḍya yena bhagavāṃs tenopajagāma;
V03vinv171u:6766_0: [CPS_24g.7] ihāhaṃ mahāśramaṇādrākṣaṃ rātryāḥ pratyūṣasamaye nakṣatrāṇi vyavalokayamāno
